</s> * </s> ; others </s> * the state of the world 's midwifery djibouti country profile from unfpa </s> * key development forecast for djibouti from international future . </s> * </s> * </s> category : djibouti </s> category:1977 establishment in djibouti </s> category : arabic-speaking country and territory </s> category : country in africa </s> category : east african country </s> category : former french colony </s> category : french-speaking country and territory </s> category : gulf of aden </s> category : horn african country </s> category : least developed country </s> category : member state of the organisation internationale de la francophonie </s> category : member state of the african union </s> category : member state of the arab league </s> category : member state of the organisation of islamic cooperation </s> category : member state of the united nation </s> category : republic </s> category : somali-speaking country and territory <article_end> <article_start> </s> togo ( ) , officially the togolese republic ( rpublique togolaise ) , is a country in west africa bordered by ghana to ghanatogo border , benin to benintogo border and burkina faso to burkina fasotogo border . the country extends south to the gulf of guinea , where it capital city lom is located . togo cover , making it one of the smallest country in africa , with a population of approximately 8 million , a well a one of the narrowest country in the world with a width of le than between ghana and it slightly larger eastern neighbor , benin . </s> from the 11th to the 16th century , various tribe entered the region from all direction . from the 16th century to the 18th century , the coastal region wa a major trading center for european to purchase slave , earning togo and the surrounding region the name `` the slave coast of west africa `` . in 1884 , german empire declared a region including present-day togo a a protectorate called togoland . after world war i , rule over togo wa transferred to france . togo gained it independence from france in 1960 . in 1967 , gnassingb eyadma led a successful military coup d'tat after which he became president of an anti-communist , single-party state . eventually , in 1993 , eyadma faced multiparty election , which were marred by irregularity , and he won the presidency three time . at the time of his death , eyadma wa the longest-serving leader in modern african history , having been president for 38 year . in 2005 , his son faure gnassingb wa elected president . he continues to hold the office </s> togo is a tropic , sub-saharan africa sub-saharan nation , whose economy depends highly on agriculture , with a climate that provides good growing season . while the official language is french , many other language are spoken , particularly those of the gbe language . the largest religious denomination consists of those with indigenous belief , and there are significant christian and muslim minority . togo is a member of the united nation , african union , organisation of islamic cooperation , south atlantic peace and cooperation zone , organisation internationale de la francophonie , and economic community of west african state . </s> <section_title_start> history <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> before colonization ( pre-1884 ) <section_title_end> </s> archaeological find indicate that ancient tribe were able to produce pottery and process iron . the name togo is translated from the ewe language a `` behind the river `` . not much is known of the period before arrival of the portuguese people in 1490 . during the period from the 11th century to the 16th century , various tribe entered the region from all direction : the ewe people from the west , and the gen language and fon language from the east . most of them settled in coastal area . </s> the slave trade began in the 16th century , and for the next two hundred year the coastal region wa a major trading centre for european in search of slave , earning togo and the surrounding region the name `` the slave coast of west africa `` . </s> <section_title_start> colonial era ( 18841960 ) <section_title_end> </s> in 1884 , a paper wa signed at togoville with the king mlapa iii , whereby germany claimed a protectorate over a stretch of territory along the coast and gradually extended it control inland . it border were defined after the capture of hinterland by german force and signing agreement with france and britain . in 1905 , this became the german colonial empire of togoland . the local population wa forced to work , cultivate cotton , coffee and cocoa and pay high tax . a railway and the port of lom were built for export of agricultural product . the german introduced modern technique of cultivation of cocoa bean , coffee and cotton and developed the infrastructure . </s> during the first world war , togoland wa invaded by united kingdom and france , proclaiming the anglo-french condominium . on 7 december 1916 , the condominium collapsed and togo wa divided into british and french zone . 20 july 1922 great britain received the league of nation mandate to govern the western part of togo and france to govern the eastern part . in 1945 , the country received the right to send three representative to the french parliament . </s> after world war ii , these mandate became united nation trust territory . the resident of british togoland 1956 british togoland status plebiscite to join the gold coast ( british colony ) a part of the new independent nation of ghana in 1957 . french togoland became an autonomous republic within the french union in 1959 , while france retained the right to control the defense , foreign relation and finance . </s> <section_title_start> independence to present day ( 1960present ) <section_title_end> </s> the togolese republic wa proclaimed on 27 april 1960 . in the togolese general election , 1961 in 1961 , sylvanus olympio became the first president , gaining 100 % of the vote in election boycotted by the opposition . on 9 april 1961 , the constitution of the togolese republic wa adopted , according to which the supreme legislative body wa the national assembly of togo . </s> in december 1961 , leader of opposition party were arrested because they were accused of the preparation of an anti-government conspiracy . a decree wa issued on the dissolution of the opposition party . olympio tried to reduce dependence on france by establishing cooperation with the united state , united kingdom , and west germany . he also rejected effort of french soldier who were demobilized after the algerian war and tried to get a position in the togolese army . these factor eventually led to a military coup on 13 january 1963 , during which he wa assassinated by a group of soldier under the direction of sergeant gnassingb eyadma . a state of emergency wa declared in togo . </s> the military handed over power to an interim government led by nicolas grunitzky . in may 1963 , grunitzky wa togolese general election , 1963 president of the republic . the new leadership pursued a policy of developing relation with france . his main aim wa to dampen the division between north and south , promulgate a new constitution , and introduce a multiparty system . </s> exactly four year later , on 13 january 1967 , eyadma gnassingb overthrew grunitzky in a bloodless coup and assumed the presidency . he created the rally of the togolese people , banned activity of other political party and introduced a one-party system in november 1969 . he wa reelected in togolese general election , 1979 and togolese presidential election , 1986 . in 1983 , the privatization program launched and in 1991 other political party were allowed . in 1993 , the eu froze the partnership , describing eyadema 's re-election in togolese presidential election , 1993 , togolese presidential election , 1998 and togolese presidential election , 2003 , a a seizure of power . in april 2004 , in brussels , talk were held between the european union and togo on the resumption of cooperation . </s> eyadma gnassingb suddenly died on 5 february 2005 , after 38 year in power , the longest rule of any dictator in africa . the military 's immediate installation of his son , faure gnassingb , a president provoked widespread international condemnation , except from france . some democratically elected african leader such a abdoulaye wade of senegal and olusegun obasanjo of nigeria supported the move , thereby creating a rift within the african union . </s> gnassingb left power and held election , which he won two month later . the opposition declared that the election result were fraudulent . the event of 2005 led to question regarding the government 's commitment to democracy that had been made in an attempt to normalize relation with the european union , which cut off aid in 1993 due to question about togo 's human right situation . in addition , up to 400 people were killed in the violence surrounding the presidential election , according to the united nation . around 40,000 togolese fled to neighboring country . gnassingb wa reelected in togolese presidential election , 2010 and togolese presidential election , 2015. </s> in late 2017 , anti-government protest in togo , 2017 anti-government protest erupted in togo , the biggest since those after the togolese presidential election , 2005 . protester demanded the resignation of gnassingb , who is part of a family they alleged ha been in power too long . the un condemned the resulting crackdown by togolese security force , and the gambia gambia 's foreign minister , ousainou darboe , had to issue a correction after saying that gnassingb should resign . </s> in the february 2020 , presidential election , faure gnassingb won his fourth presidential term in office a the president of togo . according to the official result , he won with a margin of around 72 % of the vote share . this enabled him to defeat his closest challenger , the former prime minister agbyom kodjo who had 18 % . on may 4 , 2020 , bitala madjoulba , the commander of a togolese military battalion , wa found dead in his office . the day of madjoulba 's death came right after the recently re-elected faure gnassingb gave his investiture . an investigation ha been opened for this case and all individual around his death are being questioned . </s> <section_title_start> geography <section_title_end> </s> togo ha an area equal to and is one of the smallest country in africa . it border the bight of benin in the south ; ghana lie to the west ; benin to the east ; and to the north , togo is bound by burkina faso . togo lie mostly between latitude 6th parallel north 6 and 11th parallel north 11n , and longitude prime meridian 0 and 2nd meridian east 2e . </s> the coast of togo in the gulf of guinea is 56 ; km ( 35 mile ) long and consists of lagoon with sandy beach . in the north , the land is characterized by a gently rolling savanna in contrast to the center of the country , which is characterized by hill . the south of togo is characterized by a guinean forest-savanna mosaic which reach to a coastal plain with extensive lagoon and marsh . </s> the highest mountain of the country is the mont agou at 986 metre ( 3235 ' ) above sea level . the longest river is the mono river with a length of 400 ; km ( 250 mile ) . it run from north to south . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> the climate is generally tropical with average temperature ranging from on the coast to about in the northernmost region , with a dry climate and characteristic of a tropical and subtropical grassland , savanna , and shrublands . to the south , there are two season of rain ( the first between april and july and the second between september and november ) , even though the average rainfall is not very high . </s> <section_title_start> flora and fauna <section_title_end> </s> togo contains three terrestrial ecoregions : eastern guinean forest , guinean forest-savanna mosaic , and west sudanian savanna . the coast of togo is characterized by marsh and mangrove . high human population growth is leading to rapid deforestation , endangering many specie . the country had a 2019 forest landscape integrity index mean score of 5.88/10 , ranking it 92nd globally out of 172 country . </s> at least four park and reserve have been established : abdoulaye faunal reserve , fazao malfakassa national park , fosse aux lion national park , koutammouko , and kran national park . the most frequently observed animal are giraffe , cape buffalo , [ and lion ] . few elephant remain . common [ [ bird are stork and crane ( bird ) . </s> <section_title_start> government <section_title_end> </s> the president is elected by universal and direct suffrage for 5 year . he is also the commander of the togolese armed force and ha the right to initiate legislation and dissolve parliament . executive power is exercised by the president and the government . the head of government is the prime minister , who is appointed by the president . </s> togo 's transition to democracy is stalled . it democratic institution remain nascent and fragile . president gnassingb eyadma , who ruled togo under a one-party system , died of a heart attack on 5 february 2005 . gravely ill , he wa being transported by plane to a foreign country for care . he died in transit while over tunisia . under the togolese constitution , the president of the parliament , fambar ouattara natchaba , should have become president of the country , pending a new presidential election to be called within sixty day . natchaba wa out of the country , returning on an air france plane from paris . </s> the togolese army , known a force armes togolaises ( fat ) , or togolese armed force , closed the nation 's border , forcing the plane to land in nearby benin . with an engineered power vacuum , the parliament voted to remove the constitutional clause that would have required an election within sixty day , and declared that eyadema 's son , faure gnassingb , would inherit the presidency and hold office for the rest of his father 's term . faure wa sworn in on 7 february 2005 , despite international criticism of the succession . </s> the african union described the takeover a a military coup d'tat . international pressure came also from the united nation . within togo , opposition to the takeover culminated in riot in which several hundred died . there were uprising in many city and town , mainly located in the southern part of the country . in the town of anho report of a general civilian uprising followed by a large scale massacre by government troop went largely unreported . in response , faure gnassingb agreed to hold togo presidential election , 2005 and on 25 february , gnassingb resigned a president , but soon afterward accepted the nomination to run for the office in april . </s> on 24 april 2005 , gnassingb wa elected president of togo , receiving over 60 % of the vote according to official result . his main rival in the race had been emmanuel bob-akitani from the union de force du changement ( ufc ) or union of force for change . however , electoral fraud wa suspected , due to a lack of european union or other independent oversight . parliament designated deputy president , bonfoh abbass , a interim president until the inauguration . on 3 may 2005 , faure gnassingb wa sworn in a the new president and the european union suspended aid to togo in support of the opposition claim , unlike the african union and the united state which declared the vote `` reasonably fair . `` the nigerian president and chair of the au , olusgun basanj , sought to negotiate between the incumbent government and the opposition to establish a coalition government , but rejected an au commission appointment of former zambian president , kenneth kaunda , a special au envoy to togo . in june , president gnassingb named opposition leader edem kodjo a the prime minister . </s> in october 2007 , after several postponement , election were held under proportional representation . this allowed the le populated north to seat a many mp a the more populated south . the president-backed party rally of the togolese people ( rpt ) won outright majority with the ufc coming second and the other party claiming inconsequential representation . again vote rigging accusation were leveled at the rpt supported by the civil and military security apparatus . despite the presence of an eu observer mission , canceled ballot and illegal voting took place , the majority of which in rpt stronghold . the election wa declared fair by the international community and praised a a model with little intimidation and few violent act for the first time since a multiparty system wa reinstated . on 3 december 2007 komlan mally of the rpt wa appointed to prime minister succeeding agboyibor . however , on 5 september 2008 , after only 10 month in office , mally resigned a prime minister of togo . </s> faure gnassingb won re-election in the march 2010 presidential election , taking 61 % of the vote against jean-pierre fabre from the ufc , who had been backed by an opposition coalition called frac ( republican front for change ) . though the march 2010 election wa largely peaceful , electoral observer noted `` procedural error `` and technical problem , and the opposition did not recognize the result , claiming irregularity had affected the outcome . periodic protest against faure gnassingb followed the election . in may 2010 , long-time opposition leader gilchrist olympio announced that he would enter into a power-sharing deal with the government , a coalition arrangement which provides the ufc with eight ministerial post . in june 2012 , electoral reform prompted protester to take to the street in lom for several day ; protester sought a return to the 1992 constitution that would re-establish presidential term limit . july 2012 , saw the surprise resignation of the prime minister , gilbert houngbo . day later , the commerce minister , kwesi ahoomey-zunu , wa named to lead the new government . in the same month , the home of opposition leader jean pierre fabre wa raided by security force , and thousand of protester again rallied publicly against the government crackdown . </s> <section_title_start> administrative division <section_title_end> </s> togo is divided into five region , which are subdivided in turn into 30 prefecture . from north to south the region are savanes region , togo , kara region , centrale region , togo , plateau region , togo and maritime region . </s> <section_title_start> foreign relation <section_title_end> </s> although togo 's foreign policy is nonaligned , it ha strong historical and cultural tie with western europe , especially france and germany . togo recognizes the people 's republic of china , north korea , and cuba . it re-established relation with israel in 1987. </s> togo pursues an active foreign policy and participates in many international organization . it is particularly active in west african regional affair and in the african union . relation between togo and neighboring state are generally good . </s> in 2017 , togo signed the un treaty on the prohibition of nuclear weapon . </s> <section_title_start> military <section_title_end> </s> the military of togo , in french fat ( force armes togolaises , `` togolese armed force `` ) , consists of the army , navy , air force , and gendarmerie . total military expenditure during the fiscal year of 2005 totalled 1.6 % of the country 's gdp . military base exist in lom , temedja , kara , togo , niamtougou , and dapaong . the current chief of the staff ( military ) is brigadier general titikpina atcha mohamed , who took office on 19 may 2009 . the air force is equipped with dassault/dornier alpha jet . </s> <section_title_start> human right record <section_title_end> </s> togo wa labeled `` not free `` by freedom house from 1972 to 1998 , and again from 2002 to 2006 , and ha been categorized a `` partly free `` from 1999 to 2001 and again from 2007 to the present . it ha very serious and longstanding human-rights problem . according to a united state department of state u.s. state department report based on condition in 2010 , these include `` security force use of excessive force , including torture , which resulted in death and injury ; official impunity ; harsh and life-threatening prison condition ; arbitrary arrest and detention ; lengthy pretrial detention ; executive influence over the judiciary ; infringement of citizen ' privacy right ; restriction on freedom of the press , freedom of assembly , and movement ; official corruption ; discrimination and violence against woman ; child abuse , including female genital mutilation ( fgm ) , and sexual exploitation of child ; regional and ethnic discrimination ; trafficking in person , especially woman and child ; societal discrimination against person with disability ; official and societal discrimination against homosexual person ; societal discrimination against person with human immunodeficiency virus ; and forced labor , including by child . `` lgbt right in togo same-sex sexual activity is illegal in togo , with a penalty of one to three year imprisonment . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> togo is among the smallest country in africa , but posse valuable phosphate deposit and a well-developed export sector based on agricultural product such a coffee ; cocoa bean ; and peanut ( groundnut ) , which together generate roughly 30 % of export earnings . cotton is the most important cash crop . the fertile land occupies 11.3 % of the country , most of which is developed . major crop are cassava , jasmine rice , maize and millet . other important sector are brewery and the textile industry . a permanent problem is the lack of electricity , because the country is able to produce only about a third of it consumption , the rest is covered by import from ghana and nigeria . low market price for togo 's major export commodity , however , coupled with the volatile political situation of the 1990s and early 2000s , had a negative effect on the economy . </s> togo is one of the least developed country ; the economic situation is still precarious . togo serf a a regional commercial and trade center . the government 's decade-long effort , supported by the world bank and the international monetary fund ( imf ) , to carry out economic reform , to encourage investment , and to create the balance between income and consumption ha stalled . political unrest , including private and public sector strike throughout 1992 and 1993 , jeopardized the reform program , shrank the tax base , and disrupted vital economic activity . </s> togo import machinery , equipment , petroleum product , and food . main import partner are france ( 21.1 % ) , the netherlands ( 12.1 % ) , cte d'ivoire ( 5.9 % ) , germany ( 4.6 % ) , italy ( 4.4 % ) , south africa ( 4.3 % ) and china ( 4.1 % ) . the main export are cocoa bean , coffee , re-export of good , phosphate and cotton . major export partner are burkina faso ( 16.6 % ) , china ( 15.4 % ) , the netherlands ( 13 % ) , benin ( 9.6 % ) and mali ( 7.4 % ) . </s> in term of structural reform , togo ha made progress in the liberalization of the economy , namely in the field of trade and port activity . however , the privatization program of the cotton sector , telecommunication and water supply ha stalled . the country currently ha no debt due to financial assistance from the outside while togo is likely among the most beneficiary country under the initiative help in heavily indebted poor country . </s> 12 january 1994 devaluation of the currency by 50 % provided an important impetus to renewed structural adjustment ; these effort were facilitated by the end of strife in 1994 and a return to overt political calm . progress depends on increased openness in government financial operation ( to accommodate increased social service outlay ) and possible downsizing of the armed force , on which the regime ha depended to stay in place . lack of aid , along with depressed cocoa price , generated a 1 % fall in gdp in 1998 , with growth resuming in 1999 . togo is a member of the organization for the harmonization of business law in africa ( ohada ) . </s> <section_title_start> agriculture <section_title_end> </s> agriculture is the backbone of the economy , although it is struggling with a chronic shortage of fund for the purchase of irrigation equipment and fertilizer , which ha significantly reduced agricultural output . agriculture generated 28.2 % of gdp in 2012 and employed 49 % of the working population in 2010 . the country is essentially self-sufficient in food production . livestock production is dominated by cattle breeding . </s> <section_title_start> mining <section_title_end> </s> mining generated about 33.9 % of gdp in 2012 and employed 12 % of the population in 2010 . togo ha the fourth largest phosphate deposit in the world . their production is 2.1 million ton per year . since the mid-90s , however , there ha been a decline in the mining industry and government will need to invest heavily to sustain it . the mining industry is facing difficulty due to falling phosphate price on world market and increasing foreign competition . there are also reserve of limestone , marble and salt . </s> industry provides only 20.4 % of togo 's national income , because it consists only of a few light industry and builder . large reserve of limestone allows togo to produce cement . </s> <section_title_start> transport <section_title_end> </s> * rail transport in togo </s> * transport in togo </s> <section_title_start> demographic <section_title_end> </s> { class= `` wikitable `` style= `` float : right ; margin-left : 10px `` </s> ! colspan= `` 4 `` style= `` text-align : center ; background : # cfb ; `` population </s> - </s> ! style= `` background : # cfb ; `` year </s> ! style= `` background : # cfb ; `` million </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 1950 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 1.4 </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 2000 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 5.0 </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` style= `` text-align : right ; `` </s> } </s> the november 2010 census gave togo a population of 6,191,155 , more than double the total counted in the last census . that census , taken in 1981 , showed the nation had a population of 2,719,567 . the capital and largest city , lom , grew from 375,499 in 1981 to 837,437 in 2010 . when the urban population of surrounding golfe prefecture is added , the lom agglomeration contained 1,477,660 resident in 2010. </s> other city in togo according to the new census were sokod ( 95,070 ) , kara ( 94,878 ) , kpalim ( 75,084 ) , atakpam ( 69,261 ) , dapaong ( 58,071 ) and tsvi ( 54,474 ) . with an estimated population of ( ) , togo is the 107th largest country by population . most of the population ( 65 % ) live in rural village dedicated to agriculture or pasture . the population of togo show a strong growth : from 1961 ( the year after independence ) to 2003 it quintupled . </s> <section_title_start> largest city <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> ethnic group <section_title_end> </s> in togo , there are about 40 different ethnic group , the most numerous of which are the ewe people in the south who make up 32 % of the population . along the southern coastline they account for 21 % of the population . also found are tem language and tchamba in the center and the kabye people in the north ( 22 % ) . the ouatchis are 14 % of the population . sometimes the ewe and ouatchis are considered the same , but the french who studied both group considered them different people . </s> other ethnic group include the mina , mossi people , the moba and bassar , the tchokossi of mango ( about 8 % ) . there is also a european & indian population who make up le than 1 % . </s> <section_title_start> religion <section_title_end> </s> according to a 2012 u government religious freedom report , in 2004 the university of lom estimated that 33 % of the population are traditional animist , 28 % are roman catholic , 20 % are sunni muslim , 9 % are protestant and another 5 % belonged to other christian denomination . the remaining 5 % were reported to include person not affiliated with any religious group . the report also noted that many christian and muslim continue to perform indigenous religious practice . </s> the cia world factbook meanwhile state that 44 % of the population are christian , 14 % are muslim with 36 % being follower of indigenous belief . </s> christianity began to spread from the middle of the 15th century , after the arrival of the portuguese and roman catholic missionary . german introduced protestantism in the second half of the 19th century , when a hundred missionary of the bremen missionary society were sent to the coastal area of togo and ghana . togo 's protestant were known a `` brema , `` a corruption of the word `` bremen . `` after world war i , german missionary had to leave , which gave birth to the early autonomy of the ewe evangelical church . </s> <section_title_start> language <section_title_end> </s> togo is a multilingual country . according to ethnologue , 39 distinct language are spoken in the country , many of them by community that number fewer than 100,000 member . of the 39 language , the sole official language is french . two spoken indigenous language were designated politically a national language in 1975 : ewe language ( egbe ; ev ) and kabiy language ; they are also the two most widely spoken indigenous language . </s> french is used in formal education , legislature , all form of medium , administration ( law ) and commerce . ewe is a language of wider communication in the south . tem language function to a limited extent a a trade language in some northern town . officially , ewe and kabiye are `` national language `` , which in the togolese context mean language that are promoted in formal education and used in the medium . </s> <section_title_start> health <section_title_end> </s> health expenditure in togo wa 5.2 % of gdp in 2014 , which rank the country in 45th place in the world . the infant mortality rate is approximately 43.7 death per 1,000 child in 2016 . male life expectancy at birth wa at 62.3 in 2016 , whereas it wa at 67.7 year for female . there were 5 physician per 100,000 people in 2008 according to a 2013 unicef report , 4 % of woman in togo have undergone female genital mutilation , which is a significantly lower percentage than other country in the region . </s> , the maternal mortality rate per 100,000 birth for togo is 368 , compared with 350 in 2010 and 539.7 in 1990 . the under 5 mortality rate , per 1,000 birth is 100 and the neonatal mortality a a percentage of under 5 's mortality is 32 . in togo the number of midwife per 1,000 live birth is 2 and the lifetime risk of death for pregnant woman is 1 in 67. </s> in 2016 , togo had 4100 ( 2400 - 6100 ) new hiv infection and 5100 ( 3100 - 7700 ) aids-related death . there were 100 000 ( 73 000 - 130 000 ) people living with hiv in 2016 , among whom 51 % ( 37 % - 67 % ) were accessing antiretroviral therapy . among pregnant woman living with hiv , 86 % ( 59 % - 95 % ) were accessing treatment or prophylaxis to prevent transmission of hiv to their child . an estimated < 1000 ( < 500 - 1400 ) child were newly infected with hiv due to mother-to-child transmission . among people living with hiv , approximately 42 % ( 30 % - 55 % ) had suppressed viral load . </s> <section_title_start> education <section_title_end> </s> education in togo is compulsory for six year . in 1996 , the gross primary enrollment rate wa 119.6 % , and the net primary enrollment rate wa 81.3 % . in 2011 , the net enrollment rate wa 94 % , one of the best in the west african sub-region . the education system ha suffered from teacher shortage , lower educational quality in rural area , and high repetition and dropout rate . </s> <section_title_start> culture <section_title_end> </s> togo 's culture reflects the influence of it many ethnic group , the largest and most influential of which are the ewe people , mina people , tem , tchamba and kabre . </s> despite the influence of christianity and islam , over half of the people of togo follow native animistic practice and belief . </s> ewe statuary is characterized by it famous statuette which illustrate the worship of the ibeji . sculpture and hunting trophy were used rather than the more ubiquitous african mask . the wood-carvers of kloto are famous for their `` chain of marriage `` : two character are connected by ring drawn from only one piece of wood . </s> the dyed fabric batik of the artisanal center of kloto represent stylized and colored scene of ancient everyday life . the loincloth used in the ceremony of the weaver of assahoun are famous . work of the painter sokey edorh are inspired by the immense arid extent , swept by the dry wind , and where the soil keep the print of the men and the animal . the plastic technician paul ahyi is internationally recognized today . he practiced the `` zota `` , a kind of pyroengraving , and his monumental achievement decorate lom . </s> the official togolese drink is called : fr : sodabi , a liquor that is created from the distillation of palm wine . </s> <section_title_start> sports <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> olympics <section_title_end> </s> on 12 august 2008 , benjamin boukpeti ( born to a togolese father and a french mother ) won a bronze medal in the men 's k1 kayak slalom , the first medal ever won by a member of the togolese team at the olympics . </s> <section_title_start> football <section_title_end> </s> football is the most recognized and national sport of togo . following suit with nigeria , ivory coast , cameroon , ghana and senegal , togo qualified for the world cup in 2006 . togo did not record a win in the group stage . togo also qualified for caf . bachirou salou wa the first known footballer who paved the way for all the international togolese soccer star . he successfully played in the german bundesliga for more than 14 year and is a living legend for the german club borussia mnchengladbach and msv duisburg , where they even perpetuated him in their stadium . salou gained 38 cap for togo during a nine-year span . he played 300 game and scored 69 goal in the german major league . </s> emmanuel adebayor is the most famous footballer for togo , scoring 30 goal for the national team and 97 in the english premier league . </s> <section_title_start> basketball <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> media <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> celebrations <section_title_end> </s> togo ha secular celebration . some of the celebration include 1 january `` fte nationale `` ( meaning national celebration in french ) and 27 april independence day . these celebration open a window for job opportunity and they attract more tourist . </s> <section_title_start> see also <section_title_end> </s> * index of togo-related article </s> * outline of togo </s> <section_title_start> references <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> country </s> category : member state of the african union </s> category : member state of the organisation internationale de la francophonie </s> category : member state of the organisation of islamic cooperation </s> category : member state of the united nation </s> category : republic </s> category : state and territory established in 1960 </s> category : west african country </s> category : country in africa <article_end> <article_start> </s> the republic of the congo ( rpublique du congo , repubilika ya kngo ) , also known a congo-brazzaville , the congo republic or simply either congo or the congo is a country located in the western coast of central africa . to the west lie gabon ; cameroon to it northwest and the central african republic to it northeast ; the democratic republic of the congo to the southeast and the angolan exclave of cabinda province to it south ; and the atlantic ocean to it southwest . the official language is french language . </s> the region wa dominated by bantu peoples-speaking tribe at least 3,000 year ago , who built trade link leading into the congo river basin . congo wa formerly part of the french colonial empire of french equatorial africa . the republic of the congo wa established on 28 november 1958 and gained independence from france in 1960 . it wa a marxistleninist state from 1969 to 1992 , under the name people 's republic of the congo . the sovereign state ha had multi-party election since 1992 , although a democratically elected government wa ousted in the 1997 republic of the congo civil war ( 199799 ) , and president denis sassou nguesso , who first came to power in 1979 , ha ruled for 35 of the past 40 year . </s> the republic of the congo is a member of the african union , the united nation , la francophonie , the economic community of central african state , and the non-aligned movement . it ha become the fourth-largest oil producer in the gulf of guinea , providing the country with a degree of prosperity despite political and economic instability in some area and unequal distribution of oil revenue nationwide . economy of the republic of the congo congo 's economy is heavily dependent on the oil sector , and economic growth ha slowed considerably since 2010s oil glut the post-2015 drop in oil price . with a population of 5.2 million , 88.5 % of the country practice religion in the republic of the congo . </s> <section_title_start> etymology <section_title_end> </s> the country s name mean `` [ land beside ] the congo river `` , adopted by the country upon independence in 1960 from the previous fifth french republic autonomous colony republic of the congo ( rpublique du congo ) established in 1958 , ultimately from the name of the original third french republic list of french colony french congo ( congo franais ) established in 1882 . the river itself derived it name from kingdom of kongo , a bantu people kingdom which occupied it mouth around the time of it discovery by the kingdom of portugal in 1483 or 1484 and whose name derived from it people , the bakongo , an endonym said to mean `` hunter `` ( mukongo , nkongo ) . </s> other name are sometimes known to a the french congo , middle congo and congo ( brazzaville ) with the latter inclusion of the country 's capital to distinguish it from democratic republic of the congo congo ( lopoldville ) or ( kinshasa ) to it south . brazzaville itself derives from the colony 's founder , pierre savorgnan de brazza , an italian nobleman whose title referred to the town of brazzacco , in the comune of moruzzo , whose name derived from the latin language brattius or braccius , both meaning `` arm `` . </s> <section_title_start> history <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> pre-colonial <section_title_end> </s> bantu people bantu-speaking people who founded tribe during the bantu expansion largely displaced and absorbed the earliest inhabitant of the region , the african pygmy people , about 1500bc . the bakongo , a bantu ethnic group that also occupied part of present-day angola , gabon , and the democratic republic of the congo , formed the basis for ethnic affinity and rivalry among those country . several bantu kingdomsnotably those of the kongo empire , the kingdom of loango , and the kingdom of anzikubuilt trade link leading into the congo river basin . </s> the kingdom of portugal explorer diogo co reached the mouth of the congo in 1484 . commercial relationship quickly grew between the inland bantu kingdom and european merchant who traded in various commodity , manufactured good , and also people captured and enslaved in the [ after century a a major hub for transatlantic trade , direct european colonization of the congo river delta began in the late 19th century , subsequently eroding the power of the bantu society in the region . </s> <section_title_start> french colonial era <section_title_end> </s> the area north of the congo river came under french sovereignty in 1880 a a result of pierre de brazza ] 's treaty with king makoko of the [ [ bateke . after the death of makoko , his widow queen ngalifourou upheld the term of the treaty and became an important ally to the coloniser . this congo colony became known first a french congo , then a middle congo in 1903. </s> in 1908 , france organized french equatorial africa ( aef ) , comprising the middle congo , french gabon , french chad , and oubangui-chari ( the modern central african republic ) . the french designated brazzaville a the federal capital . economic development during the first 50 year of colonial rule in congo centered on natural-resource extraction . the method were often brutal : construction of the congo-ocean railway following world war i ha been estimated to have cost at least 14,000 life . </s> during the nazi occupation of france during world war ii , brazzaville functioned a the symbolic capital of free france between 1940 and 1943 . the brazzaville conference of 1944 heralded a period of major reform in french colonial policy . congo benefited from the postwar expansion of colonial administrative and infrastructure spending a a result of it central geographic location within aef and the federal capital at brazzaville . it also had a local legislature after the adoption of the 1946 constitution that established the french fourth republic . </s> following the revision of the constitution of france that established the french fifth republic in 1958 , the aef dissolved into it constituent part , each of which became an autonomous colony within the french community . during these reform , middle congo became known a the republic of the congo in 1958 and published it first constitution in 1959 . antagonism between the mbochis ( who favored jacques opangault ) and the lari people ( congo ) s and kongo people ( who favored fulbert youlou , the first black mayor elected in french equatorial africa ) resulted in a series of riot in brazzaville in february 1959 , which the french army subdued . </s> new election took place in april 1959 . by the time the congo became independent in august 1960 , opangault , the former opponent of youlou , agreed to serve under him . youlou became the first president of the republic of the congo . since the political tension wa so high in pointe-noire , youlou moved the capital to brazzaville . </s> <section_title_start> post-independence era <section_title_end> </s> the republic of the congo became fully independent from france on 15 august 1960 . youlou ruled a the country 's first president until labour element and rival political party instigated a trois glorieuses ( 1963 ) three-day uprising that ousted him . the congolese military briefly took over the country , and installed a civilian provisional government headed by alphonse massamba-dbat . </s> under the 1963 constitution , massamba-dbat wa elected president for a five-year term . during alphonse massamba-dbat # congo under massamba-dbat ( 1963-1968 ) massamba-dbat 's term in office the regime adopted `` scientific socialism `` a the country 's constitutional ideology . in 1965 , congo established relation with the soviet union , the china people 's republic of china , north korea and north vietnam . on the night of february 14 to 15 , 1965 , three prominent public official of the republic of the congo were kidnapped : lazare matsocota ( prosecutor of the republic ) , joseph pouabou ( president of the supreme court ) and massoum anselme ( director of the congolese information agency ) . the body of two of these men were later found , mutilated , by the congo river . massamba-dbat 's regime also invited several hundred cuban army troop into the country to train his party 's militia unit and these troop helped his government survive a 1966 republic of the congo coup d'tat attempt coup d'tat in 1966 led by paratrooper loyal to future president marien ngouabi . nevertheless , massamba-dbat wa unable to reconcile various institutional , tribal and ideological faction within the country and his regime ended abruptly with a bloodless 1968 republic of the congo coup d'tat . </s> marie ngouabi , who had participated in the coup , assumed the presidency on 31 december 1968 . one year later , ngouabi proclaimed the congo africa 's first `` people 's republic `` , the people 's republic of the congo , and announced the decision of the national revolutionary movement to change it name to the congolese party of labour ( pct ) . he survived an 1972 republic of the congo coup d'tat attempt but wa assassinated on 16 march1977 . an 11-member military committee of the party ( cmp ) wa then named to head an interim government , with joachim yhombi-opango serving a president . two year later , yhombi-opango wa forced from power and denis sassou nguesso become the new president . </s> sassou nguesso aligned the country with the eastern bloc and signed a twenty-year friendship pact with the soviet union . over the year , sassou had to rely more on political repression and le on patronage to maintain his dictatorship . </s> pascal lissouba , who became congo 's first elected president ( 19921997 ) during the period of multi-party democracy , attempted to implement economic reform with imf backing to liberalize the economy . in june 1996 , the imf approved a three-year special drawing rights69.5m ( u $ 100m ) enhanced structural adjustment facility ( esaf ) and wa on the verge of announcing a renewed annual agreement when civil war broke out in congo in mid-1997 . </s> congo 's democratic progress wa derailed in 1997 , when lissouba and sassou started to fight for power in the republic of the congo civil war ( 1997-99 ) . a presidential election scheduled for july 1997 approached , tension between the lissouba and sassou camp mounted . on 5 june , president lissouba 's government force surrounded sassou 's compound in brazzaville and sassou ordered member of his private militia ( known a `` cobra `` ) to resist . thus began a four-month conflict that destroyed or damaged much of brazzaville and caused ten of thousand of civilian death . in early october , the angolan government began an invasion of congo to install sassou in power . in mid-october , the lissouba government fell . soon thereafter , sassou declared himself president . </s> in the controversial republic of the congo presidential election , 2002 , sassou won with almost 90 % of the vote cast . his two main rival , lissouba and bernard kolelas , were prevented from competing and the only remaining credible rival , andr milongo , advised his supporter to boycott the election and then withdrew from the race . a new constitution , agreed upon by republic of the congo constitutional referendum , 2002 , granted the president new power , extended his term to seven year , and introduced a new bicameral assembly . international observer took issue with the organization of the presidential election and the constitutional referendum , both of which were reminiscent in their organization of congo 's era of the one-party state . following the presidential election , fighting restarted in the pool department between government force and rebel led by pastor ntumi ; a peace treaty to end the conflict wa signed in april 2003. </s> sassou also won the following republic of the congo presidential election , 2009 . according to the congolese observatory of human right , a non-governmental organization , the election wa marked by `` very low `` turnout and `` fraud and irregularity `` . in march 2015 sassou announced that he wanted to run for yet another term in office and a republic of the congo constitutional referendum , 2015 in october resulted in a changed constitution which allowed him to run during the republic of the congo presidential election , 2016 . he won the election believed by many to be fraudulent . after violent protest in the capital , sassou attacked the pool region , where the ninja ( militia ) s of the civil war used to be based , in what wa believed to be a distraction . this led to a revival of the ninja rebel who launched attack against the army in april 2016 , leading 80,000 people to flee their home . a ceasefire deal wa signed in december 2017. </s> <section_title_start> government <section_title_end> </s> congo-brazzaville ha had a multi-party system multi-party political system since the early 1990s , although the system is heavily dominated by president denis sassou nguesso ; he ha lacked serious competition in the presidential election held under his rule . sassou nguesso is backed by his own congolese labour party ( parti congolais du travail ) a well a a range of smaller party . </s> sassou 's regime ha seen many political corruption revelation despite attempt to censor them . one french investigation found over 110 bank account and dozen of lavish property in france . sassou denounced embezzlement investigation a `` racist `` and `` colonial `` . denis christel sassou-nguesso , son of denis sassou nguesso , ha been named in association with the panama paper . </s> on 27 march 2015 , sassou nguesso announced that his government would hold a referendum on changing the country 's 2002 constitution to allow him to run for a third consecutive term in office . on 25 october the government held a referendum on allowing sassou nguesso to run in the next election . the government claimed that the proposal wa approved by 92 % of voter , with 72 % of eligible voter participating . the opposition , who boycotted the referendum , said that the government 's statistic were false and the vote wa a fake one . </s> the election raised question and wa accompanied by civil unrest and police shooting of protester ; at least 18 people were killed by security force during opposition rally leading up to the referendum held in october . </s> <section_title_start> media <section_title_end> </s> in 2008 , the primary medium were owned by the government , but privately run form of medium were being created . there is one government-owned television station and around 10 small private television channel . </s> <section_title_start> human rights <section_title_end> </s> many pygmy belong from birth to bantu peoples in a relationship many refer to a slavery . the congolese human right observatory say that the pygmy are treated a property in the same way a pet . on 30 december2010 , the parliament of the republic of the congo adopted a law for to promote and protect the right of indigenous people . this law is the first of it kind in africa , and it adoption is a historic development for indigenous people on the continent . </s> <section_title_start> administrative divisions <section_title_end> </s> the republic of the congo is divided into 12 department of the republic of the congo ( department ) . department are divided into commune and district . </s> these are : </s> <section_title_start> geography and climate <section_title_end> </s> congo is located in the central-western part of sub-saharan africa , along the equator , lying between latitude 4th parallel north 4n and 5th parallel south 5 , and longitude 11th meridian east 11 and 19th meridian east 19e . to the south and east of it is the democratic republic of the congo . it is also bounded by gabon to the west , cameroon and the central african republic to the north , and cabinda ( province ) ( angola ) to the southwest . it ha a short coast on the atlantic ocean . </s> the capital , brazzaville , is located on the congo river , in the south of the country , immediately across from kinshasa , the capital of the democratic republic of the congo . </s> the southwest of the country is a coastal plain for which the primary drainage is the kouilou-niari river ; the interior of the country consists of a central plateau between two basin to the south and north . forest are under increasing exploitation pressure . congo had a 2018 forest landscape integrity index mean score of 8.89/10 , ranking it 12th globally out of 172 country . </s> congo lie within four terrestrial ecoregions : atlantic equatorial coastal forest , northwestern congolian lowland forest , western congolian swamp forest , and western congolian forest-savanna mosaic . since the country is located on the equator , the climate is consistent year-round , with the average day temperature a humid and night generally between and . the average yearly rainfall range from in the niari valley in the south to over in central part of the country . the dry season is from june to august , while in the majority of the country the wet season ha two rainfall maximum : one in marchmay and another in septembernovember . </s> in 200607 , researcher from the wildlife conservation society studied gorilla in heavily forested region centered on the ouesso district of the sangha region . they suggest a population on the order of 125,000 western lowland gorilla , whose isolation from human ha been largely preserved by inhospitable swamp . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> the economy is a mixture of village agriculture and handicraft , an industrial sector based largely on petroleum , support service , and a government characterized by budget problem and overstaffing . petroleum extraction ha supplanted forestry a the mainstay of the economy . in 2008 , the oil sector accounted for 65 % of the gdp , 85 % of government revenue , and 92 % of export . the country also ha large untapped mining in the republic of the congo wealth . </s> in the early 1980s , rapidly rising oil revenue enabled the government to finance large-scale development project . gdp grew an average 5 % annually , one of the highest rate in africa . the government ha mortgaged a substantial portion of it petroleum earnings , contributing to a shortage of revenue . on 12 january1994 devaluation of cfa franc currency by 50 % resulted in inflation of 46 % in 1994 , but inflation ha subsided since . </s> economic reform effort continued with the support of international organization , notably the world bank and the international monetary fund . the reform program came to a halt in june 1997 when civil war erupted . when sassou nguesso returned to power at the end of the war in october 1997 , he publicly expressed interest in moving forward on economic reform and privatization and in renewing cooperation with international financial institution . however , economic progress wa badly hurt by slumping oil price and the resumption of armed conflict in december 1998 , which worsened the republic 's budget deficit . </s> the current administration presides over an uneasy internal peace and face difficult economic problem of stimulating recovery and reducing poverty , despite record-high oil price since 2003 . natural gas and diamond are also recent major congolese export , although congo wa excluded from the kimberley process in 2004 amid allegation that most of it diamond export were in fact being smuggled out of the neighboring democratic republic of the congo ; it wa re-admitted to the group in 2007. </s> the republic of the congo also ha large untapped base metal , gold , iron and phosphate deposit . the country is a member of the organization for the harmonization of business law in africa ( ohada ) . the congolese government signed an agreement in 2009 to lease 200,000 hectare of land to south african farmer to reduce it dependence on import . </s> the gdp of the republic of the congo grew by 6 % in 2014 and is expected to have grown by 7.5 % in 2015. </s> in 2018 , the republic of the congo joined the organization of petroleum exporting country . </s> <section_title_start> transportation <section_title_end> </s> transport in the republic of the congo includes land , air and water transportation . the country 's congoocean railway wa congoocean railway # history during the 1930s and largely remains in operation . there are also over 1000 ; km of paved road and two major international airport ( maya-maya airport and agostinho-neto international airport pointe-noire airport ) which have flight to destination in europe , africa , and the middle east . the country also ha a large port on the atlantic ocean at pointe-noire and others along the congo river at brazzaville and impfondo . </s> <section_title_start> demographics <section_title_end> </s> { class= `` wikitable `` style= `` float : right ; margin-left : 10px `` </s> +population </s> ! year </s> ! million </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 1950 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 0.8 </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 2000 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 3.2 </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` style= `` text-align : right ; `` </s> } </s> the republic of the congo 's sparse population is concentrated in the southwestern portion of the country , leaving the vast area of tropical jungle in the north virtually uninhabited . thus , congo is one of the most urbanized country in africa , with 70 % of it total population living in a few urban area , namely in brazzaville , pointe-noire or one of the small city or village lining the railway which connects the two city . in rural area , industrial and commercial activity ha declined rapidly in recent year , leaving rural economy dependent on the government for support and subsistence . </s> ethnically and linguistically the population of the republic of the congo is diverseethnologue recognises 62 spoken language in the countrybut can be grouped into three category . the kongo people are the largest ethnic group and form roughly half of the population . the most significant subgroup of the kongo are lari ( ethnic group ) , in brazzaville and pool region , and the vili people , around pointe-noire and along the atlantic coast . the second largest group are the bateke , who live to the north of brazzaville , with 17 % of the population . mbochi ( m boshi ) live in the northwest and in brazzaville and form 12 % of the population . pygmy make up 2 % of congo 's population . </s> before the 1997 war , about 9,000 european and other non-africans lived in congo , most of whom were french people ; only a fraction of this number remains . around 300 united state expatriate reside in the congo . </s> according to cia world factbook , the people of the republic of the congo are largely a mix of catholic ( 33.1 % ) , awakening ( religious movement ) ( 22.3 % ) and other protestant ( 19.9 % ) . follower of islam make up 1.6 % ; this is primarily due to an influx of foreign worker into the urban center . </s> according to a 201112 survey , total fertility rate wa 5.1 child born per woman , with 4.5 in urban area and 6.5 in rural area . </s> <section_title_start> health <section_title_end> </s> public expenditure health wa at 8.9 % of the gdp in 2004 , whereas private expenditure wa at 1.3 % . </s> , the hiv/aids prevalence wa at 2.8 % among 15- to 49-year-olds . health expenditure wa at u $ 30 per caput in 2004 . a large proportion of the population is undernourished , and malnutrition a problem in congo-brazzaville . there were 20 physician per 100,000 person in the early 2000s ( decade ) . </s> , the maternal mortality rate wa 560 deaths/100,000 live birth , and the infant mortality rate wa 59.34 deaths/1,000 live birth . female genital mutilation ( fgm ) is rare in the country , being confined to limited geographic area of the country . </s> <section_title_start> cultural heritage <section_title_end> </s> the republic of the congo ha a wide variety of natural landscape , ranging from the savanna plain in the north niari flooded forest , to the vast congo river , to rugged mountain and forest of mayombe , and including 170 ; km of beach along the atlantic coast . the numerous ethnic group , form of art , and political structure express a rich cultural diversity and </s> among the best known are kingdom of loango # name nail fetish , bembe people statuette that are full of expression ; the mask of the punu people and kwele people , kota people ( gabon ) reliquary , teke people fetish , and cemetery with monumental tomb are example of this variety . the lari people ( congo ) people also have unique artifact . </s> the republic of the congo also ha considerable colonial architectural heritage , which it is preserving . restoration of architectural work is underway in brazzaville , for example at the basilica of sainte-anne du congo , which wa completed in 2011. </s> because of problem with the communication network , the country is not ready to build on [ tourism ] . it is working to improve the network that support it hotel and related tourism facility in pointe noire and brazzaville . many site are difficult to reach in overland visit . some of the south 's most populous and developed location are often the least accessible . for example , the massive chaillu mountain are almost impossible to visit . </s> <section_title_start> arts <section_title_end> </s> congolese singer have become known internationally : the franco-congolese rapper passi 's work is broadcast in france , and he ha released several hit album , such a temptation , with the famous song `` i zap and i mate . `` other notable musician include , singer of the former group ; rapper calbo ( rapper ) of rsenik , of , mystic , rcfa , the group bisso na bisso and . </s> several writer from the republic of congo have become recognised elsewhere in africa and the french-speaking world , including alain mabanckou , jean-baptiste tati loutard , jeannette balou tchichelle , henri lope , lassy mbouity , and tchicaya u tam'si . </s> artist have struggled to build a film industry . after a promising start in the 1970s , the troubled political situation closed cinema and made film production difficult . instead of making feature film for distribution to theater , filmmaker generally directly stream their video production on the internet . </s> congolese culture , art , and medium have suffered from a lack of investment due to the unstable political condition and warfare . </s> <section_title_start> education <section_title_end> </s> public expenditure of the gdp wa le in 200205 than in 1991 . public education is theoretically free and mandatory for under-16-year-olds but , in practice , expense exist . in 2005 net primary enrollment rate wa 44 % , a significant drop from the 79 % in 1991 . education between age six and sixteen is compulsory . pupil who complete six year of primary school and seven year of secondary school obtain a baccalaureate . </s> the country ha university where student can obtain a bachelor 's degree in three year and a master 's in five . marien ngouabi universitywhich offer course in medicine , law , and other fieldsis the country 's only public university . </s> instruction at all level is in french language , and the educational system a a whole model the french system . </s> <section_title_start> see also <section_title_end> </s> * outline of the republic of the congo </s> * index of republic of the congorelated article </s> <section_title_start> references
