category : member state of the african union </s> category : member state of the united nation </s> category : republic </s> category : state and territory established in 1960 </s> category:1960 establishment in africa </s> category : country in africa <article_end> <article_start> </s> the marshall island , officially the republic of the marshall island ( aolepn aorkin aje ) , is an island country and an associated state of the united state near the equator in the pacific ocean , slightly west of the international date line . geographically , the country is part of the larger island group of micronesia . the country 's population of 58,413 people ( at the 2018 world bank census ) is spread out over 29 coral atoll , comprising 1,156 individual island and islet . the capital city and largest city is majuro . it ha the largest portion of it territory made of water of any sovereign state , at 97.87 % . </s> the island share maritime boundary with wake island to the north , kiribati to the southeast , nauru to the south , and federated state of micronesia to the west . about 52.3 % of marshall islander ( 27,797 at the 2011 census ) live on majuro . data from the united nation indicates an estimated population in of . in 2016 , 73.3 % of the population were defined a being `` urban `` . the un also indicates a population density of 295 per km2 ( 765 people per mi2 ) and it projected 2020 population is 59,190. </s> micronesian colonist reached the marshall island using canoe circa 2nd millennium bc , with interisland navigation made possible using marshall island stick chart . they eventually settled here . island in the archipelago were first explored by ethnic group in europe in the 1520s , starting with ferdinand magellan , a portuguese explorer in the service of spain , juan sebastin elcano and miguel de saavedra . spanish explorer alonso de salazar reported sighting an atoll in august 1526 . other expedition by spanish and english ship followed . the island derive their name from john marshall ( british captain ) , who visited in 1788 . the island were historically known by the inhabitant a `` jolet jen anij `` ( gift from god ) . </s> spain claimed the island in 1592 , and the european power recognized it sovereignty over the island in 1874 . they had been part of the spanish east indie formally since 1528 . later , spain sold some of the island to the german empire in 1885 , and they became part of german new guinea that year , run by the trading company doing business in the island , particularly the jaluit company . in world war i , the empire of japan occupied the marshall island , which , in 1920 , the league of nation combined with other former german territory to form the south sea mandate . during world war ii , the united state took control of the island in the gilbert and marshall island campaign in 1944 . nuclear testing began on bikini atoll in 1946 and concluded in 1958. </s> the u government formed the congress of micronesia in 1965 , a plan for increased self-governance of pacific island . the trust territory of the pacific island in may 1979 provided independence to the marshall island , whose constitution and president ( amata kabua ) were formally recognized by the u . full sovereignty or self-government wa achieved in a compact of free association with the united state . marshall island ha been a member of the pacific community ( spc ) since 1983 and a united nation member state since 1991 . politically , the marshall island is a parliamentary republic with an executive presidency in associated state with the united state , with the u providing defense , subsidy , and access to u.s.-based agency such a the federal communication commission and the united state postal service . with few natural resource , the island ' wealth is based on a service economy , a well a some fishing and agriculture ; aid from the united state represents a large percentage of the island ' gross domestic product . the country us the united state dollar a it currency . in 2018 , it also announced plan for a new cryptocurrency to be used a legal tender . </s> the majority of the citizen of the republic of marshall island , formed in 1982 , are of marshallese descent , though there are small number of immigrant from the united state , china , philippine , and other pacific island . the two official language are marshallese language , which is one of the oceanic language , and english language . almost the entire population of the island practice some religion : three-quarters of the country follows either the united church of christ congregational in the marshall island ( ucccmi ) or the assembly of god . </s> <section_title_start> history <section_title_end> </s> evidence suggests that around 3,000 year ago successive wave of human migrant from southeast asia spread across the western pacific ocean , populating it many small island . the marshall island were settled by micronesians in the 2nd millennium bc . little is known of the island ' early history . early settler traveled between the island by canoe using traditional stick chart . </s> the spain explorer alonso de salazar landed there in 1526 , and the archipelago came to be known a `` los pintado `` ( `` the painted ( one ) `` , possibly referring to the indigenous people people first found there ) , `` la hermanas `` ( `` the sister `` ) and `` los jardines `` ( `` the garden `` ) within the spanish empire . it first fell within the jurisdiction of the new spain , and wa then administered by madrid , through the captaincy general of the philippine , upon the latin american war of independence and the dissolution of new spain starting in 1821. </s> american whaling ship visited the island in the 19th century . the first on record wa the awashonks in 1835 and last wa the andrew hick in 1905. </s> the island were only formally possessed by spain for much of their colonial history , and on european map were grouped with the caroline island which today make up palau and the federated state of micronesia , or alternatively the `` nuevas filipinas `` ( `` new philippine `` ) . the island were mostly left to their own affair except for short-lived religious mission ( documented in 1668 and 1731 ) during the 16th and 17th century . they were largely ignored by european power except for cartographic demarcation treaty between the iberian empire ( portugal and castilian spain ) in 1529 , 1750 and 1777 . the archipelago corresponding to the present-day country wa independently named by adam johann von krusenstern , after kingdom of great britain explorer john marshall ( british captain ) , who visited them together with thomas gilbert ( captain ) in 1788 , en route from botany bay to guangzhou with two ship of the first fleet , and started to establish german and british trading post , which were not formally contested by spain . </s> the marshall island were formally claimed by spanish empire in 1874 through it capital in the east indie , manila . this marked the start of several strategic move by the german empire during the 1870s and 80 to annex them ( claiming them to be `` by chance unoccupied `` ) . this policy culminated in a tense naval episode in 1885 , which did not degenerate into a conflict due to the poor readiness of spain 's naval force and the unwillingness for open military action from the german side . </s> following papal mediation and german compensation of $ 4.5 million , spain reached an agreement with german empire in 1885 : the 1885 hispano-german protocol of rome . this accord established a protectorate and set up trading station on the island of jaluit ( jol ) and ebon atoll to carry out the flourishing copra ( dried coconut meat ) trade . marshallese iroij ( high chief ) continued to rule under indirect colonial german administration , rendered tacitly effective by the wording in the 1885 protocol , which demarcated an area subject to spanish sovereignty ( 0-11n , 133-164e ) omitting the eastern carolines , that is , the marshall and gilbert archipelago , where most of the german trading post were located . the dispute were rendered moot after the selling of the whole caroline archipelago to germany 13 year later . </s> at the beginning of world war i , japan assumed control of the marshall island . the japanese headquarters wa established at the german center of administration , jaluit . on january 31 , 1944 american force landed on kwajalein atoll and u.s. marine and army troop later took control of the island from the japanese on february 3 , following intense fighting on kwajalein and enewetak atoll atoll . in 1947 , the united state , a the occupying power , entered into an agreement with the un security council to administer much of micronesia , including the marshall island , a the trust territory of the pacific island . </s> from 1946 to 1958 , it served a the pacific proving ground for the united state and wa the site of 67 nuclear test on various atoll . the world 's first [ bomb ] , codenamed `` ivy mike `` , wa tested at the enewetak atoll in the marshall island on november 1 ( local date ) in 1952 , by the united state . </s> nuclear testing began in 1946 on bikini atoll after resident were evacuated . over the year , 67 weapon test were conducted , including the 15-megaton castle bravo hydrogen bomb test , which produced significant fallout in the region . the testing concluded in 1958 . over the year , just one of over 60 island wa cleaned by the u government , and the inhabitant are still waiting for the 2 billion dollar in compensation assessed by the nuclear claim tribunal . many of the islander and their descendant still live in exile , a the island remain contaminated with high level of radiation . </s> a significant radar installation wa constructed on kwajalein atoll . </s> on may 1 , 1979 , in recognition of the evolving political status of the marshall island , the united state recognized the constitution of the marshall island and the establishment of the government of the republic of the marshall island . the constitution incorporates both american and british constitutional concept . </s> there have been a number of local and national election since the republic of the marshall island wa founded . the united democratic party , running on a reform platform , won the 1999 parliamentary election , taking control of the presidency and cabinet . </s> the island signed a compact of free association with the united state in 1986 . trusteeship wa ended under united nation security council resolution 683 of december 22 , 1990 . until 1999 the islander received united state dollar u $ 180m for continued american use of kwajalein atoll , u $ 250m in compensation for nuclear testing , and u $ 600m in other payment under the compact . </s> despite the constitution , the government wa largely controlled by iroij . it wa not until 1999 , following political corruption allegation , that the aristocracy ( government ) government wa overthrown , with imata kabua replaced by the commoner kessai note . </s> the runit dome wa built on runit island to deposit u.s.-produced radioactive soil and debris , including lethal amount of plutonium . there are ongoing concern around deterioration of the waste site and a potential radioactive contamination . </s> <section_title_start> geography <section_title_end> </s> the marshall island sit atop ancient submerged volcano rising from the ocean floor , about halfway between hawaii and australia , north of nauru and kiribati , east of the federated state of micronesia , and south of the disputed u.s. territory of wake island , to which it also lay claim . the atoll and island form two group : the ratak chain ratak ( sunrise ) and the ralik chain ralik ( sunset ) . the two island chain lie approximately parallel to one another , running northwest to southeast , comprising about of ocean but only about of land mass . each includes 15 to 18 island and atoll . the country consists of a total of 29 atoll and five individual island situated in about of the pacific . the largest atoll with a land area of is kwajalein . it surround a lagoon . </s> twenty-four of the atoll and island are inhabited . the remaining atoll are uninhabited due to poor living condition , lack of rain , or nuclear contamination . the uninhabited atoll are : </s> * ailinginae atoll </s> * bikar atoll bikar ( bikaar ) atoll </s> * bikini atoll </s> * bokak atoll </s> * erikub atoll </s> * jemo island </s> * nadikdik atoll </s> * rongerik atoll </s> * toke atoll </s> * ujelang atoll </s> the average altitude above sea level for the entire country is . </s> <section_title_start> shark sanctuary <section_title_end> </s> in october 2011 , the government declared that an area covering nearly of ocean shall be reserved a a shark sanctuary . this is the world 's largest shark sanctuary , extending the worldwide ocean area in which shark are protected from . in protected water , all shark fishing is banned and all bycatch by-catch must be released . however , some have questioned the ability of the marshall island to enforce this zone . </s> <section_title_start> territorial claim on wake island <section_title_end> </s> the marshall island also lay claim to wake island . while wake island ha been administered by the united state since 1899 , the marshallese government refers to it by the name enen-kio . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> the climate ha a relatively dry season from december to april and a wet season from may to november . many pacific typhoon begin a tropical storm in the marshall island region , and grow stronger a they move west toward the mariana island and the philippine . </s> due to it very low elevation , the marshall island are threatened by the potential effect of sea level rise . according to the president of nauru , the marshall island are the most endangered nation in the world due to flooding from climate change . </s> population ha outstripped the supply of fresh water , usually from rainfall . the northern atoll get of rainfall annually ; the southern atoll about twice that . the threat of drought is commonplace throughout the island chain . </s> <section_title_start> fauna <section_title_end> </s> crab include [ crab ] s , and coconut crab . </s> <section_title_start> birds <section_title_end> </s> most bird found in the marshall island , with the exception of those few introduced by man , are either sea bird or a migratory specie . there are about 70 specie of bird , including 31 seabird . 15 of these specie actually nest locally . sea bird include the black noddy and the white tern . the only land bird is the [ sparrow ] , introduced by human . </s> <section_title_start> marine <section_title_end> </s> there are about 300 specie of fish , 250 of which are coral reef fish . </s> * turtle : chelonia mydas , eretmochelys imbricata , leatherback sea turtle , and olive ridley sea turtle . </s> * shark : there are at least 22 shark specie including : blue shark , silky shark , bigeye thresher shark , pelagic thresher shark , oceanic whitetip shark , and tawny nurse shark . </s> <section_title_start> arthropods <section_title_end> </s> * scorpion : liocheles australasiae , and isometrus maculatus . pseudoscorpion are occasionally found . </s> * spider : two : a scytodes , dictis striatipes ; and jaluiticola a genus ( biology ) of salticidae endemic to the marshall island . it only specie is jaluiticola hesslei . </s> * amphipod : one - talorchestia spinipalma . </s> * orthoptera : blattidae , american cockroach , short-horned grasshopper , gryllidae . </s> <section_title_start> demographics <section_title_end> </s> historical population figure for the marshall island are unknown . in 1862 , the population of the island wa estimated at 10,000 . in 1960 , the population of the island wa approximately 15,000 . the 2011 census counted 53,158 island resident . over two-thirds of the resident of the marshall island live in the capital city , majuro , and the secondary urban center , ebeye ( located in kwajalein atoll ) . this figure excludes marshall island native who have relocated elsewhere ; the compact of free association allows them to freely relocate to the united state and obtain work there . approximately 4,300 marshall island native relocated to springdale , arkansas in the united state ; this figure represents the largest population concentration of marshall island native outside their island home . </s> most resident of the marshall island are marshallese . marshallese people are of micronesian origin and are believed to have migrated from asia to the marshall island several thousand year ago . a minority of marshallese have some recent asian ancestry ( mainly japanese settlement in the marshall island ) . about one-half of the nation 's population life in majuro and ebeye . </s> the official language of the marshall island are english language and marshallese language . both language are widely spoken . </s> <section_title_start> religion <section_title_end> </s> major religious group in the republic of the marshall island include the united church of christ congregational in the marshall island , with 51.5 % of the population ; the assembly of god , 24.2 % ; the roman catholic ( term ) catholic church , 8.4 % ; and the church of jesus christ of latter-day saint in the marshall island the church of jesus christ of latter-day saint ( mormon ) , 8.3 % . also represented are bukot nan jesus ( also known a assembly of god part two ) , 2.2 % ; baptist , 1.0 % ; seventh-day adventist , 0.9 % ; full gospel , 0.7 % ; and the bah faith , 0.6 % . person nonreligious account for a very small percentage of the population . islam is also present through ahmadiyya which is based in majuro , with the first mosque opening in the capital in september 2012. </s> <section_title_start> health <section_title_end> </s> during the castle bravo test of the first deployable thermonuclear bomb , a miscalculation resulted in the explosion being over twice a large a predicted . the nuclear fallout spread eastward onto the inhabited rongelap atoll and rongerik atoll . these island were not evacuated before the explosion . many of the marshall island native have since suffered from radiation burn and radioactive dusting , suffering the similar fate a the japanese fisherman aboard the daigo fukury maru , but have received little , if any , compensation from the u.s. government . </s> <section_title_start> government <section_title_end> </s> the government of the marshall island operates under a mixed parliamentary-presidential system a set forth in it constitution of the marshall island . election are held every four year in universal suffrage ( for all citizen above 18 ) , with each of the twenty-four constituency ( see below ) electing one or more representative ( senator ) to the lower house of rmi 's unicameral legislature , the nitijela . ( majuro , the capital atoll , elect five senator . ) the president , who is head of state a well a head of government , is elected by the 33 senator of the nitijela . four of the five marshallese president who have been elected since the constitution wa adopted in 1979 have been traditional paramount chief . </s> in january 2016 , senator hilda heine wa elected by parliament a the first female president of the marshall island ; previous president casten nemra lost office after serving two week in a vote of no confidence . </s> legislative power lie with the nitijela . the upper house of parliament , called the council of iroij , is an advisory body comprising twelve paramount chief . the executive branch consists of the president and the presidential cabinet , which consists of ten minister appointed by the president with the approval of the nitijela . the twenty-four electoral district into which the country is divided correspond to the inhabited island and atoll . there are currently four political party in the marshall island : aelon kein ad ( aka ) , united people 's party ( marshall island ) united people 's party ( upp ) , kien eo am ( kea ) and united democratic party ( marshall island ) ( udp ) . rule is shared by the aka and the udp . the following senator are in the legislative body : </s> * ailinglaplap atoll christopher loeak ( aka ) , alfred alfred , jr. ( ind ) </s> * ailuk atoll maynard alfred ( udp ) </s> * arno atoll mike halferty ( kea ) , jejwadrik h. anton ( ind ) </s> * aur atoll hilda c. heine ( aka ) </s> * ebon atoll john m. silk ( udp ) </s> * enewetak atoll jack j. ading ( upp ) </s> * jabat island kessai h. note ( udp ) </s> * jaluit atoll casten nemra ( ind ) , daisy alik momotaro ( ind ) </s> * kili island eldon h. note ( udp ) </s> * kwajalein atoll michael kabua ( aka ) , david r. paul ( kea ) , alvin t. jacklick ( kea ) </s> * lae atoll thomas heine ( aka ) </s> * lib island jerakoj jerry bejang ( aka ) </s> * likiep atoll leander leander , jr. ( ind ) </s> * majuro atoll sherwood m. tibon ( kea ) , anthony muller ( kea ) , brenson s. wase ( udp ) , david kramer ( kea ) , kalani kaneko ( kea ) </s> * maloelap atoll bruce bilimon ( ind ) </s> * mejit dennis momotaro ( aka ) </s> * mili atoll wilbur heine ( aka ) </s> * namdrik atoll wise zackhras ( ind ) </s> * namu atoll tony aiseia ( aka ) </s> * rongelap atoll kenneth a. kedi ( ind ) </s> * ujae atoll atbi riklon ( ind ) </s> * utirik atoll amenta mathew ( kea ) </s> * wotho atoll david kabua ( aka ) </s> * wotje atoll litokwa tomeing ( upp ) </s> <section_title_start> foreign affair and defense <section_title_end> </s> the compact of free association with the united state give the u.s. sole responsibility for international defense of the marshall island . it give islander the right to emigrate to the united state and to work there . </s> the marshall island wa admitted to the united nation based on the united nation security council 's recommendation on august 9 , 1991 , in united nation security council resolution 704 and the united nation general assembly 's approval on september 17 , 1991 , in resolution 46/3 . in international politics within the united nation , the marshall island ha often voted consistently with the united state with respect to general assembly resolution . </s> on april 28 , 2015 , the iranian navy seized the marshall island-flagged mv maersk tigris near the strait of hormuz . the ship had been chartered by germany 's rickmers ship management , which stated that the ship contained no special cargo and no military weapon . the ship wa reported to be under the control of the iranian revolutionary guard according to the pentagon . tension escalated in the region due to the intensifying of saudiyemeni war saudi-led coalition attack in yemen . the pentagon reported that the destroyer us farragut ( ddg-99 ) and a maritime reconnaissance aircraft were dispatched upon receiving a distress call from the ship tigris and it wa also reported that all 34 crew member were detained . u defense department official have said that they would review u.s. defense obligation to the government of the marshall island in the wake of recent event and also condemned the shot fired at the bridge a `` inappropriate `` . it wa reported in may 2015 that tehran would release the ship after it paid a penalty . </s> in march 2017 , at the 34th regular session of the un human right council , vanuatu made a joint statement on behalf of the marshall island and some other pacific nation raising human right violation in the western new guinea , which ha been occupied by indonesia since 1963 , and requested that the un high commissioner for human right produce a report . indonesia rejected allegation . more than 100,000 papuan have died during a 50-year papua conflict . </s> since 1991 the republic of marshall island sea patrol , a division of marshall island police , ha operated the 160 ton patrol vessel rmis lomor ( 03 ) . lomor is one of 22 pacific forum patrol vessel australia provided to smaller nation in the pacific island forum . while some other nation ' mission for their vessel include sovereignty , protection , the term of the compact of free association restrict lomor to civilian mission , like fishery protection and search and rescue . </s> in 2021 , the government of australia and japan decided to fund two major law enforcement development of the marshall island . </s> in february 2021 , the marshall island announced it would be formally withdrawing from the pacific island forum in a joint statement with kiribati , nauru , and the federated state of micronesia after a dispute regarding henry puna 's election a the forum 's secretary-general . </s> <section_title_start> culture <section_title_end> </s> although the ancient skill are now in decline , the marshallese were once able navigation , using the celestial navigation and marshall island stick chart stick-and-shell chart . </s> <section_title_start> sport <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> association football <section_title_end> </s> the marshall island have a small club league , including koober a the most successful club . one tournament wa held by play soccer make peace . there is a small football association on the island of majuro . the sport of association football in it growth is new to the marshall island . the marshall island doe not have a football team presently . the marshall island is the only sovereign country in the world that doe not have a record of a national football match . </s> <section_title_start> marshall island baseball / softball federation <section_title_end> </s> softball and baseball are held under one sport federation in the marshall island . the president is jeimata nokko kabua . both sport are growing at a fast pace with hundred of marshallese people behind the marshall island baseball / softball federation . the marshall island achieved a silver medal in the micronesian game in 2012 , a well a medal in the spg game . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> the island have few natural resource , and their import far exceed export . according to the cia , the value of export in 2013 wa approximately $ 53.7 million while estimated import were $ 133.7 million . agricultural product include coconut , tomato , melon , taro , breadfruit , fruit , pig and chicken . industry is made of the production of copra and craft item , tuna processing and tourism . the gdp in 2016 wa an estimated $ 180 million , with a real growth rate of 1.7 % . the gdp per caput wa $ 3,300 . </s> the international monetary fund reported in mid-2016 that the economy of the republic had expanded by about 0.5 percent in the fiscal year 2015 thanks to an improved fishery sector . a surplus of 3 % of gdp wa recorded `` owing to record-high fishing license fee . growth is expected to rise to about 1.5 percent and inflation to about 0.5 percent in fy2016 , a the effect of the drought in earlier 2016 are offset by the resumption of infrastructure project . `` </s> in 2018 , the republic of marshall island passed the sovereign currency act of 2018 , which made it the first country to issue their own cryptocurrency and certify it a legal tender ; the currency is called the `` sovereign `` . </s> <section_title_start> shipping <section_title_end> </s> the marshall island play a vital role in the international shipping industry a a flag of convenience for commercial vessel . the marshallese registry began operation in 1990 , and is managed through a joint venture with international registry , inc. , a us-based corporation that ha office in major shipping center worldwide . a of 2017 , the marshallese ship registry wa the second largest in the world , after that of panama . </s> unlike some flag country , there is no requirement that a marshallese flag vessel be owned by a marshallese individual or corporation . following the 2015 seizure of the mv maersk tigris , the united state announced that it treaty obligation to defend the marshall island did not extend to foreign-owned marshallese flag vessel at sea . </s> a a result of ship-to-ship transfer by marshallese flag tanker vessel , the marshall island have statistically been one of the largest importer of crude oil from the united state , despite the fact that the island have no oil refining capacity . </s> <section_title_start> labor <section_title_end> </s> in 2007 , the marshall island joined the international labour organization , which mean it labor law will comply with international benchmark . this may affect business condition in the island . </s> <section_title_start> taxation <section_title_end> </s> the income tax ha two bracket , with rate of 8 % and 12 % . the corporate tax is 3 % of revenue . </s> <section_title_start> foreign assistance <section_title_end> </s> united state government assistance is the mainstay of the economy . under term of the amended compact of free association , the u.s. is committed to provide u $ 57.7 million per year in assistance to the marshall island ( rmi ) through 2013 , and then u $ 62.7 million through 2023 , at which time a trust fund , made up of u.s. and rmi contribution , will begin perpetual annual payouts . </s> the united state army maintains the ronald reagan ballistic missile defense test site on kwajalein atoll . marshallese land owner receive rent for the base . </s> <section_title_start> agriculture <section_title_end> </s> agricultural production is concentrated on small farm . the most important commercial crop is copra , followed by coconut , breadfruit , pandanus tectorius , banana , cyrtosperma merkusii and tacca leontopetaloides . the livestock consists primarily of pig and chicken . </s> <section_title_start> industry <section_title_end> </s> small-scale industry is limited to handicraft , fish processing , and copra . </s> <section_title_start> fishing <section_title_end> </s> majuro is the world 's busiest tuna transshipment port in the world , with 704 transshipment totaling 444,393 ton in 2015 . majuro is also a tuna processing center ; the pan pacific food plant export processed tuna to a number of country , primarily the united state under the bumble bee food brand . fishing license fee , primarily for tuna , provide noteworthy income for the government . </s> in 1999 , a private company built a tuna loining plant with more than 400 employee , mostly woman . but the plant closed in 2005 after a failed attempt to convert it to produce tuna steak , a process that requires half a many employee . operating cost exceeded revenue , and the plant 's owner tried to partner with the government to prevent closure . but government official personally interested in an economic stake in the plant refused to help . after the plant closed , it wa taken over by the government , which had been the guarantor of a $ 2 million loan to the business . </s> <section_title_start> energy <section_title_end> </s> on september 15 , 2007 , witon barry ( of the tobolar copra processing plant in the marshall island capital of majuro ) said power authority , private company , and entrepreneur had been experimenting with coconut oil a alternative to diesel fuel for vehicle , electricity generation , and ship . coconut tree abound in the pacific 's tropical island . copra , the meat of the coconut , yield coconut oil ( 1 liter for every 6 to 10 coconut ) . in 2009 , a 57 ; kw solar power plant wa installed , the largest in the pacific at the time , including new zealand . it is estimated that 330 ; kw of solar and 450 ; kw of wind power would be required to make the college of the marshall island energy self-sufficient . marshall energy company ( mec ) , a government entity , provides the island with electricity . in 2008 , 420 solar home system of 200 wp each were installed on ailinglaplap atoll , sufficient for limited electricity use . </s> <section_title_start> education <section_title_end> </s> the ministry of education ( marshall island ) is the education agency of the island . marshall island public school system operates the state school in the marshall island . </s> in the 19941995 school year the country had 103 elementary school and 13 secondary school . there were 27 private elementary school and one private high school . christian group operated most of the private school . </s> historically the marshallese population wa taught in english first with marshallese instruction coming later , but this wa reversed in the 1990s to keep the island ' cultural heritage and so child could write in marshallese . now english language instruction begin in grade 3 . christine mcmurray and roy smith wrote in disease of globalization : socioeconomic transition and health that this could potentially weaken the child 's english skill . </s> there are two tertiary education institution operating in the marshall island , the college of the marshall island and the university of the south pacific . </s> <section_title_start> transportation <section_title_end> </s> the marshall island are served by the marshall island international airport in majuro , the bucholz army airfield in kwajalein , and list of airport in the marshall island . </s> airline include united airline , nauru airline , air marshall island , and asia pacific airline ( united state ) . </s> <section_title_start> media and communications <section_title_end> </s> the marshall island have several am and fm radio station . am station are 1098 5 ; kw v7ab majuro ( radio marshall , national coverage ) and 1224 afn kwajalein ( both public radio ) a well a 1557 micronesia heatwave . the fm station are 97.9 v7ad majuro , v7aa 96.3 fm uliga and 104.1 v7aa majuro ( baptist religious ) . bbc world is broadcast on 98.5 fm majuro . the most recent station is power 103.5 which started broadcasting in 2016. </s> american force network station include 99.9 afn kwajalein ( country ) , 101.1 afn ( adult rock ) and 102.1 afn ( hot ac ) . </s> there is one broadcast television station , mbc-tv operated by the state . cable tv is available . on cable tv , most program are shown two week later than in north america but news in real time can be viewed on cnn , cnbc and bbc . american force radio and television also provides tv service to kwajalein atoll . </s> the marshall island national telecommunication authority ( nta ) provides telephone , cable tv ( mhtv ) , fax , cellular and internet service . the authority is a private corporation with significant ownership by the national government . </s> <section_title_start> newspapers <section_title_end> </s> loan ran kein , a marshallese language paper , wa published from 1953 to 1954 . the current national newspaper is a bilingual ( marshallese and english ) weekly , the marshall island journal . it ha been published since 1980. </s> <section_title_start> see also <section_title_end> </s> * outline of the marshall island </s> * index of marshall islands-related article </s> * pacific proving ground </s> * list of
