language , which is the most widely spoken uralic language in the world , and among the few non-indo-european language to be widely spoken in europe . hungary 's capital and list of city and town of hungary is budapest ; other major urban area include debrecen , szeged , miskolc , pc , and gyr . </s> the territory of present hungary wa for century inhabited by a succession of people , including celt , ancient rome , germanic people , hun , west slav and the avars ( carpathians ) . the foundation of the hungarian state were established in the late ninth century ad by the hungarian grand prince rpd following the hungarian conquest of the carpathian basin . his great-grandson stephen i of hungary ascended the throne in 1000 , converting his realm to a kingdom of hungary . by the 12th century , hungary became a regional power , reaching it kingdom of hungary ( 13011526 ) . following the battle of mohcs in 1526 , hungary wa partially ottoman hungary ( 15411699 ) . the country came under habsburg monarchy entirely at the turn of the 18th century , and later compromise of 1867 austrian empire to form the austrohungarian empire , a major european power . </s> the austro-hungarian empire collapsed after world war i , and the subsequent treaty of trianon established hungary 's current border , resulting in the loss of 71 % of it territory , 58 % of it population , and hungarian diaspora 32 % of ethnic hungarian . following the tumultuous hungary between the world war , hungary joined the axis power in world war ii , suffering significant damage and casualty . postwar hungary became a satellite state of the soviet union , which contributed to the establishment of a hungarian people 's republic ( 19491989 ) . following the failed hungarian revolution of 1956 against the soviet-backed government , hungary became a goulash communism , though still repressive , member of the eastern bloc . the seminal end of communism in hungary ( 1989 ) # attitude toward the warsaw pact opening of the previously-restricted border with austria in 1989 accelerated the collapse of the eastern bloc , and collapse of the soviet government . on 23 october 1989 , hungary became a democracy parliamentary republic . </s> hungary is considered a developed country with a world bank high-income economy high-income economy and a very high human development index . hungarian enjoy healthcare in hungary and tuition-free list of university in hungary . hungary 's culture of hungary history includes significant contribution to it hungarian art , music of hungary , hungarian literature , hungary at the olympics , science and technology in hungary.refers to the country a `` widely considered `` to be a `` home of music `` . it is the world tourism ranking thirteenth-most popular tourism in hungary in europe , drawing 15.8 ; million international tourist in 2017 , owing to attraction such a the largest hot spring cave system in the world , lake hvz , the lake balaton and the hortobgy national park . </s> hungary 's cultural , historical , and academic prominence classify it a a middle power in global affair . hungary joined the european union in 2004 and ha been part of the schengen area since 2007 . it is a member of numerous international organisation , including the united nation , nato , wto , world bank , international investment bank , the asian infrastructure investment bank , the council of europe , and the visegrd group . </s> <section_title_start> etymology <section_title_end> </s> the `` h `` in the name of hungary ( and latin hungaria ) is most likely due to founded historical association with the hun , who had settled hungary prior to the pannonian avars . the rest of the word come from the latinized form of medieval greek oungroi ( ) . the greek name wa borrowed from old church slavonic grin , in turn borrowed from oghur language oghur-turkic onogurs ( 'ten [ tribe of the ] ogurs ' ) . onogur wa the collective name for the tribe who later joined the bulgars tribal confederacy that ruled the eastern part of hungary after the avars . </s> the hungarian endonym is magyarorszg , composed of magyar ( 'hungarian ' ) and orszg ( 'country ' ) . the name `` magyar `` , which refers to the people of the country , more accurately reflects the name of the country in some other language such a turkish language , persian language and other language a magyaristan or land of magyar or similar . the word magyar is taken from the name of one of the seven major semi-nomadic hungarian tribe , magyeri . the first element magy is likely from proto-ugric * m- 'man , person ' , also found in the name of the mansi people ( m , mai , m ) . the second element eri , 'man , men , lineage ' , survives in hungarian frj 'husband ' , and is cognate with mari language erge 'son ' , finnish language archaic yrk 'young man ' . </s> <section_title_start> history <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> before 895 <section_title_end> </s> the roman empire conquered the territory west of the danube river between 35 and 9 ; bc . from 9 ; bc to the end of the 4th century ad , pannonia , the western part of the carpathian basin , wa part of the roman empire . after the western roman empire collapsed in the 5th century ad under the stress of the migration of germanic people and carpus ( people ) pressure , the migration period continued to bring many invader into central europe , beginning with the hun ( c. 370469 ) . the most powerful ruler of the hunnic empire wa attila the hun ( 434453 ) who later became a central figure in hungarian mythology . after the disintegration of the hunnic empire , the gepids , an eastern germanic tribe , who had been vassalized by the hun , established their own kingdom in the carpathian basin . other group which reached the carpathian basin in the migration period were the goth , vandal , lombard , and early slav . in the 560s , the pannonian avars founded the avar khaganate , a state that maintained supremacy in the region for more than two century . the frank under charlemagne defeated the avars in a series of campaign during the 790s . by the mid-9th century , the pannonian slav # principality , also known a lower pannonia , wa established west of the danube river a part of the frankish march of pannonia . the first bulgarian empire conquered the land east of the danube river and took over rule of the local slavic tribe and remnant of the avars . </s> <section_title_start> medieval hungary ( 8951526 ) <section_title_end> </s> the freshly unified magyar tribe led by rpd ( by tradition a descendant of attila ) , settled in the carpathian basin starting in 895 . according to the finno-ugric language finno-ugrian theory , they originated from an ancient uralic languages-speaking population that formerly inhabited the forested area between the volga river and the ural mountain . </s> a a federation of united tribe , hungarian conquest of the carpathian basin , some 50 year after the division of the carolingian empire at the treaty of verdun in 843 , before the unification of the kingdom of england anglo-saxon kingdom . initially , the rising principality of hungary ( `` western tourkia `` in medieval greek source ) wa a state created by a semi-nomadic people . it accomplished an enormous transformation into a christian realm during the 10th century . </s> this state wa well-functioning and the nation 's military power allowed the hungarian to conduct successful hungarian invasion of europe , from constantinople to a far a today 's spain . the hungarian defeated no fewer than hungarian invasion of europe between 907 and 910 . a later defeat at the battle of lechfeld in 955 signalled a provisory end to most campaign on foreign territory , at least towards the west . </s> <section_title_start> age of rpdian kings <section_title_end> </s> the year 972 marked the date when the ruling prince ( fejedelem ) gza , grand prince of the hungarian of the rpd dynasty officially started to integrate hungary into the christian western europe . his first-born son , stephen i of hungary , became the first king of hungary after defeating his paganism uncle koppny , who also claimed the throne . under stephen , hungary wa recognised a a catholic apostolic kingdom . applying to pope sylvester ii , stephen received the insignia of royalty ( including probably a part of the holy crown of hungary , currently kept in the hungarian parliament building ) from the papacy . </s> by 1006 , stephen consolidated his power , and started sweeping reform to convert hungary into a western feudalism . the country switched to using the latin language , and until a late a 1844 , latin remained the official language of hungary . around this time , hungary began to become a powerful kingdom . ladislaus i of hungary extended hungary 's frontier in transylvania and invaded kingdom of croatia ( medieval ) in 1091 . the croatian campaign culminated in the battle of gvozd mountain in 1097 and a croatia in personal union with hungary in 1102 , ruled by coloman of hungary i.e . knyves klmn . </s> the most powerful and wealthiest king of the rpd dynasty wa bla iii of hungary , who disposed of the equivalent of 23 tonne of pure silver a year . this exceeded the income of the french king ( estimated at 17 tonne ) and wa double the receipt of the english crown . </s> andrew ii of hungary issued the diploma andreanum which secured the special privilege of the transylvanian saxon and is considered the first autonomy law in the world . he led the fifth crusade to the holy land in 1217 , setting up the largest royal army in the history of crusade . his golden bull of 1222 wa the first constitution in continental europe . the lesser noble also began to present andrew with grievance , a practice that evolved into the institution of the parliament ( parlamentum publicum ) . </s> in 12411242 , the kingdom received a major blow with the mongolian invasion of hungary mongol ( tatar ) invasion . up to half of hungary 's then population of 2,000,000 were victim of the invasion . king bla iv let cumans and jassic people into the country , who were fleeing the mongol . over the century , they were fully assimilated into the hungarian population . </s> a a consequence , after the mongol retreated , king bla ordered the construction of hundred of stone castle and fortification , to defend against a possible second mongol invasion . the second mongol invasion of hungary in 1285 , but the newly built stone-castle system and new tactic ( using a higher proportion of heavily armed knight ) stopped them . the invading mongol force wa defeated near pest by the royal army of ladislaus iv of hungary . a with later invasion , it wa repelled handily , the mongol losing much of their invading force . </s> <section_title_start> age of elected king <section_title_end> </s> the kingdom of hungary reached one of it greatest extent during the rpdian king , yet royal power wa weakened at the end of their rule in 1301 . after a destructive period of interregnum ( 13011308 ) , the first capetian house of anjou king , charles i of hungary a bilineal descendant of the rpd dynasty successfully restored royal power , and defeated oligarch rival , the so-called `` little king `` . the second angevin hungarian king , louis i of hungary ( 13421382 ) , led many successful military campaign from lithuania to southern italy ( kingdom of naples ) , and wa also king of poland from 1370 . after king louis died without a male heir , the country wa stabilized only when sigismund , holy roman emperor ( 13871437 ) succeeded to the throne , who in 1433 also became holy roman emperor . sigismund wa also ( in several way ) a bilineal descendant of the rpd dynasty . </s> the first hungarian bible translation wa completed in 1439 . for half a year in 1437 , there wa an antifeudal and anticlerical peasant revolt in transylvania , the budai nagy antal revolt , which wa strongly influenced by hussite idea . </s> from a small noble family in transylvania , john hunyadi grew to become one of the country 's most powerful lord , thanks to his outstanding capability a a mercenary commander . he wa elected governor then regent . he wa a successful crusader against the ottoman turk , one of his greatest victory being the siege of belgrade ( 1456 ) in 1456. </s> the last strong king of medieval hungary wa the renaissance king matthias corvinus ( 14581490 ) , son of john hunyadi . his election wa the first time that a member of the nobility mounted to the hungarian royal throne without dynastic background . he wa a successful military leader and an enlightened patron of the art and learning . his library , the bibliotheca corviniana , wa europe 's greatest collection of historical chronicle , philosophic and scientific work in the 15th century , and second only in size to the vatican library . item from the bibliotheca corviniana were inscribed on unesco 's memory of the world register in 2005. </s> the serf and common people considered him a just ruler because he protected them from excessive demand from and other abuse by the magnate . under his rule , in 1479 , the hungarian army destroyed the ottoman and wallachian troop at the battle of breadfield . abroad he defeated the polish and german imperial army of frederick at breslau ( wrocaw ) . matthias ' mercenary standing army , the black army of hungary , wa an unusually large army for it time , and it conquered part of austria , vienna ( 1485 ) and part of bohemia . </s> <section_title_start> decline of hungary ( 14901526 ) <section_title_end> </s> king matthias died without lawful son , and the hungarian magnate procured the accession of the pole vladislaus ii of bohemia and hungary ( 14901516 ) , supposedly because of his weak influence on hungarian aristocracy . hungary 's international role declined , it political stability shaken , and social progress wa deadlocked . in 1514 , the weakened old king vladislaus ii faced a major peasant rebellion led by gyrgy dzsa , which wa ruthlessly crushed by the nobility in the kingdom of hungary , led by john zpolya . </s> the resulting degradation of order paved the way for ottoman pre-eminence . in 1521 , the strongest hungarian fortress in the south , nndorfehrvr ( today 's belgrade , serbia ) , siege of belgrade ( 1521 ) . the early appearance of protestantism further worsened internal relation in the country . </s> <section_title_start> ottoman war ( 15261699 ) <section_title_end> </s> after some ottoman war in europe with the hungarian and other state , the ottoman gained a decisive victory over the hungarian army at the battle of mohcs in 1526 , where louis ii of hungary died while fleeing . amid political chaos , the divided nobility in the kingdom of hungary elected two king simultaneously , john zpolya and ferdinand i , holy roman emperor of the habsburg dynasty . with the conquest of buda by the turk in 1541 , hungary wa divided into three part and remained so until the end of the 17th century . the north-western part , termed a royal hungary , wa annexed by the habsburg who ruled a king of hungary . the eastern part of the kingdom became independent a the principality of transylvania ( 15711711 ) , under ottoman ( and later habsburg ) suzerainty . the remaining central area , including the capital buda , wa known a the ottoman hungary . </s> the vast majority of the seventeen and nineteen thousand ottoman soldier in service in the ottoman fortress in the territory of hungary were orthodox and muslim balkan slav rather than ethnic turkish people . orthodox southern slav were also acting a akinjis and other light troop intended for pillaging in the territory of present-day hungary . in 1686 , the holy league ( 1684 ) holy league 's army , containing over 74,000 men from various nation , battle of buda ( 1686 ) from the turk . after some more crushing austro-turkish war of 171618 in the next few year , the entire kingdom of hungary wa removed from ottoman rule by 1718 . the last raid into hungary by the ottoman vassal crimean khanate from crimea took place in 1717 . the constrained habsburg counter-reformation effort in the 17th century reconverted the majority of the kingdom to catholicism . the ethnic composition of hungary wa fundamentally changed a a consequence of the prolonged warfare with the turk . a large part of the country became devastated , population growth wa stunted , and many smaller settlement perished . the austrian-habsburg government settled large group of serb and other slav in the depopulated south , and settled german of hungary ( called danube swabians ) in various area , but hungarian were not allowed to settle or re-settle in the south of the pannonian plain . </s> <section_title_start> from the 18th century to world war i ( 16991918 ) <section_title_end> </s> between 1703 and 1711 , there wa a large-scale uprising led by francis ii rkczi , who after the dethronement of the habsburg in 1707 at the diet of nod , took power provisionally a the ruling prince of hungary for the wartime period , but refused the hungarian crown and the title `` king `` . the uprising lasted for year . the hungarian kuruc army , although taking over most of the country , lost the main battle of trencsn ( 1708 ) . three year later , because of the growing desertion , defeatism and low morale , the kuruc force finally surrendered . </s> during the napoleonic war and afterwards , the hungarian diet had not convened for decade . in the 1820s , the emperor wa forced to convene the diet , which marked the beginning of a reform period ( 18251848 , reformkor ) . count istvn szchenyi , one of the most prominent statesman of the country , recognised the urgent need of modernisation and his message got through . the hungarian parliament wa reconvened in 1825 to handle financial need . a liberal party emerged and focused on providing for the peasantry . lajos kossuth a famous journalist at that time emerged a leader of the lower gentry in the parliament . a remarkable upswing started a the nation concentrated it force on modernisation even though the habsburg monarch obstructed all important liberal law relating to civil and political right and economic reform . many reformer ( lajos kossuth , mihly tncsics ) were imprisoned by the authority . </s> on 15 march 1848 , mass demonstration in pest and buda enabled hungarian reformist to push through a list of 12 point of the hungarian revolutionary of 1848 . under governor and president lajos kossuth and the first prime minister , lajos batthyny , the house of habsburg wa dethroned . </s> the habsburg ruler and his advisor skilfully manipulated the croatian , serbian and romanian peasantry , led by priest and officer firmly loyal to the habsburg , and induced them to rebel against the hungarian government , though the hungarian were supported by the vast majority of the slovak , german and rusyns nationality and by all the jew of the kingdom , a well a by a large number of polish , austrian and italian volunteer . in july 1849 the hungarian parliament proclaimed and enacted the first law of ethnic and minority right in the world . many member of the nationality gained the coveted highest position within the hungarian army , like general jnos damjanich , an ethnic serb who became a hungarian national hero through his command of the 3rd hungarian army corp or jzef bem , who wa polish and also became a national hero in hungary . the hungarian force ( royal hungarian landwehr ) defeated austrian army . to counter the success of the hungarian revolutionary army , habsburg emperor franz joseph i asked for help from the `` gendarme of europe `` , tsar nicholas i of russia , whose russian army invaded hungary . this made artr grgey surrender in august 1849 . the leader of the austrian army , julius jacob von haynau , became governor of hungary for a few month , and ordered the execution of the 13 martyr of arad , leader of the hungarian army , and prime minister batthyny in october 1849 . lajos kossuth escaped into exile . following the war of 18481849 , the whole country wa in `` passive resistance `` . </s> because of external and internal problem , reform seemed inevitable and major military defeat of austria forced the habsburg to negotiate the austro-hungarian compromise of 1867 , by which the dual monarchy of austriahungary wa formed . this empire had the second largest area in europe ( after the russian empire ) , and it wa the third most populous ( after russia and the german empire ) . the two realm were governed separately by two parliament from two capital city , with a common monarch and common external and military policy . economically , the empire wa a custom union . the old hungarian constitution wa restored , and franz joseph i wa crowned a king of hungary . the era witnessed impressive economic development . the formerly backward hungarian economy became relatively modern and industrialised by the turn of the 20th century , although agriculture remained dominant until 1890 . in 1873 , the old capital buda and buda were officially united with pest , hungary , thus creating the new metropolis of budapest . many of the state institution and the modern administrative system of hungary were established during this period . </s> after the assassination of archduke franz ferdinand in sarajevo , the hungarian prime minister istvn tisza and his cabinet tried to avoid the outbreak and escalating of a war in europe , but their diplomatic effort were unsuccessful . austriahungary drafted 9 ; million ( fighting force : 7.8 ; million ) soldier in world war i ( over 4 ; million from the kingdom of hungary ) on the side of germany , bulgaria and turkey . the troop raised in the kingdom of hungary spent little time defending the actual territory of hungary , with the exception of the brusilov offensive in june 1916 , and a few month later , when the romanian army made an attack into transylvania , both of which were repelled . in comparison , of the total army , hungary 's loss ratio wa more than any other nation of austria-hungary . the central power conquered serbia . romania declared war . the central power conquered southern romania and the romanian capital bucharest . in 1916 emperor franz joseph died , and the new monarch charles iv of hungary sympathized with the pacifist . with great difficulty , the central power stopped and repelled the attack of the russian empire . </s> the eastern front of the allied ( ally of world war i ) power completely collapsed . the austro-hungarian empire then withdrew from all defeated country . on the italian front , the austro-hungarian army made no progress against italy after january 1918 . despite great eastern success , germany suffered complete defeat on the more important western front . by 1918 , the economic situation had deteriorated ( strike in factory were organised by leftist and pacifist movement ) and uprising in the army had become commonplace . in the capital city , the austrian and hungarian leftist liberal movement ( the maverick party ) and their leader supported the separatism of ethnic minority . austria-hungary signed a general armistice in padua on 3 november 1918 . in october 1918 , hungary 's union with austria wa dissolved . </s> <section_title_start> between the world war ( 19181941 ) <section_title_end> </s> following the first world war , hungary underwent a period of profound political upheaval , beginning with the aster revolution in 1918 , which brought the social-democratic mihly krolyi to power a prime minister . the royal hungarian honvd still had more than 1,400,000 soldier when mihly krolyi wa announced a prime minister of hungary . krolyi yielded to u.s. president woodrow wilson 's demand for pacifism by ordering the disarmament of the hungarian army . this happened under the direction of bla linder , minister of war in the krolyi government . due to the full disarmament of it army , hungary wa to remain without a national defence at a time of particular vulnerability . during the rule of krolyi 's pacifist cabinet , hungary lost the control over approx . 75 % of it former pre-ww1 territory ( 325 411 ; km ) without fight and wa subject to foreign occupation . the little entente , sensing an opportunity , invaded the country from three sidesromania hungarian-romanian war transylvania , czechoslovakia annexed upper hungary ( today 's slovakia ) , and a joint kingdom of serbia-french army coalition annexed vojvodina and other southern region . in march 1919 , communist led by bla kun ousted the krolyi government and proclaimed the hungarian soviet republic ( tancskztrsasg ) , followed by a thorough red terror ( hungary ) campaign . despite some success on the czechoslovak front , kun 's force were ultimately unable to resist the romanian invasion ; by august 1919 , romanian troop occupied budapest and ousted kun . </s> in november 1919 , rightist force led by former austro-hungarian admiral mikls horthy entered budapest ; exhausted by the war and it aftermath , the populace accepted horthy 's leadership . in january 1920 , parliamentary election were held and horthy wa proclaimed regent of the reestablished kingdom of hungary ( 192046 ) , inaugurating the so-called `` horthy era `` ( horthy-kor ) . the new government worked quickly to normalize foreign relation while turning a blind eye to a white terror ( hungary ) that swept through the countryside ; extrajudicial killing of suspected communist and jew lasted well into 1920 . on 4 june of that year , the treaty of trianon established new border for hungary . the country lost 71 % of it territory and 66 % of it antebellum population , a well a many source of raw material and it sole port , rijeka . though the revision of the treaty quickly rose to the top of the national political agenda , the horthy government wa not willing to resort to military intervention to do so . </s> the initial year of the horthy regime were preoccupied by putsch attempt by charles iv of hungary , the austro-hungarian pretender ; continued suppression of communist ; and a migration crisis triggered by the trianon territorial change . though free election continued , horthy 's personality , and those of his personally selected prime minister , dominated the political scene . the government 's action continued to drift right with the passage of antisemitic law and , due to the continued isolation of the little entente , economic and then political gravitation towards kingdom of italy # fascist regime ( 19221943 ) and nazi germany . the great depression further exacerbated the situation and the popularity of fascist politician such a gyula gmbs and ferenc szlasi , promising economic and social recovery , rose . </s> horthy 's nationalist agenda reached it apogee in 1938 and 1940 , when the nazi rewarded hungary 's staunchly pro-germany foreign policy in the first vienna award and second vienna award , respectively , peacefully restoring ethnic-hungarian-majority area lost after trianon . in 1939 , hungary regained further territory from czechoslovakia slovak-hungarian war . hungary tripartite pact the axis power on 20 november 1940 , and in 1941 , participated in the german invasion of yugoslavia , gaining some of it former territory in the south . </s> <section_title_start> world war ii ( 19411945 ) <section_title_end> </s> hungary formally entered world war ii a an axis power on 26 june 1941 , declaring war on the soviet union after unidentified plane bombed koice , munkacheve , and rakhiv . hungarian troop fought on the eastern front ( world war ii ) for two year . despite battle of uman , the hungarian government began seeking a secret peace pact with ally ( world war ii ) after the hungarian second army suffered catastrophic loss ostrogozhskrossosh offensive in january 1943 . learning of the planned defection , german troop operation margarethe on 19 march 1944 to guarantee horthy 's compliance . in october , a the soviet front approached and the hungarian government made further effort to disengage from the war , german troop ousted horthy and installed a puppet government under szlasi 's fascist arrow cross party . szlasi pledged all the country 's capability in service of the german war machine . by october 1944 , the soviet had reached the river tisza , and despite battle of debrecen , succeeded in encircling and battle of budapest in december . </s> after german occupation , hungary holocaust in hungary in the holocaust . during the german occupation in mayjune 1944 , the arrow cross and hungarian police deported nearly 440,000 jew , mainly to auschwitz concentration camp . nearly all of them were murdered . the swedish diplomat raoul wallenberg managed to save a considerable number of hungarian jew by giving them swedish passport . rezs kasztner , one of the leader of the hungarian aid and rescue committee , bribed senior s officer such a adolf eichmann to allow some jew to escape . the horthy government 's complicity in the holocaust remains a point of controversy and contention . </s> the war left hungary devastated , destroying over 60 % of the economy and causing significant world war ii casualty # endnote hungary . in addition to the over 600,000 hungarian jew killed , a many a 280,000 other hungarian were raped , murdered and executed or deported for slave labour by czechoslovak , soviet red army troop , and yugoslav . </s> on 13 february 1945 , budapest surrendered ; by april , german troop left the country under soviet military occupation . 200,000 hungarian were expelled from czechoslovakia in exchange for 70,000 slovak living in hungary . 202,000 ethnic german were expelled to germany , and through the 1947 paris peace treaty , hungary wa again reduced to it immediate post-trianon border . </s> <section_title_start> communism ( 19451989 ) <section_title_end> </s> following the defeat of nazi germany , hungary became a soviet satellite of the soviet union . the soviet leadership selected mtys rkosi to front the stalinization of the country , and rkosi de facto ruled hungary from 1949 to 1956 . his government 's policy of militarization , industrialisation , collectivization , and war compensation led to a severe decline in living standard . in imitation of stalin 's kgb , the rkosi government established a secret political police , the state protection authority , to enforce the new regime . in the ensuing purge approximately 350,000 official and intellectual were imprisoned or executed from 1948 to 1956 . many freethinker , democrat , and horthy-era dignitary were secretly arrested and extrajudicially interned in domestic and foreign gulag . some 600,000 hungarian were deported to soviet labour camp , where at least 200,000 died . </s> after stalin 's death in 1953 , the soviet union pursued a programme of destalinization that wa inimical to rkosi , leading to his deposition . the following political cooling saw the ascent of imre nagy to the premiership , and the growing interest of student and intellectual in political life . nagy promised market liberalization and political openness , while rkosi opposed both vigorously . rkosi eventually managed to discredit nagy and replace him with the more hard-line ern ger . hungary joined the warsaw pact in may 1955 , a societal dissatisfaction with the regime swelled . following the firing on peaceful demonstration by soviet soldier and secret police , and rally throughout the country on 23 october 1956 , protester took to the street in budapest , initiating the hungarian revolution of 1956 . in an effort to quell the chaos , nagy returned a premier , promised free election , and took hungary out of the warsaw pact . </s> the violence nonetheless continued a revolutionary militia sprung up against the soviet army and the vh ; the roughly 3,000-strong resistance fought soviet tank using molotov cocktail and machine-pistols . though the preponderance of the soviet wa immense , they suffered heavy loss , and by 30 october 1956 , most soviet troop had withdrawn from budapest to garrison the countryside . for a time , the soviet leadership wa unsure how to respond to development in hungary but eventually decided to intervene to prevent a destabilization of the soviet bloc . on 4 november , reinforcement of more than 150,000 troop and 2,500 tank entered the country from the soviet union . nearly 20,000 hungarian were killed resisting the intervention , while an additional 21,600 were imprisoned afterwards for political reason . some 13,000 were interned and 230 brought to trial and executed . nagy wa secretly tried , found guilty , sentenced to death and executed by hanging in june 1958 . because border were briefly opened , nearly a quarter of a million people fled the country by the time the revolution wa suppressed . </s> <section_title_start> kdr era ( 19561988 ) <section_title_end> </s> after a second , briefer period of soviet military occupation , jnos kdr , nagy 's former minister of state , wa chosen by the soviet leadership to head the new government and chair the new ruling hungarian socialist worker ' party socialist worker ' party ( mszmp ) . kdr quickly normalized the situation . in 1963 , the government granted a general amnesty and released the majority of those imprisoned for their active participation in the uprising . kdr proclaimed a new policy line , according to which the people were no longer compelled to profess loyalty to the party if they tacitly accepted the socialist regime a a fact of life . in many speech , he described this a , `` those who are not against u are with u . `` kdr introduced new planning priority in the economy , such a allowing farmer significant plot of private land within the collective farm system ( hztji gazdlkods ) . the living standard rose a consumer good and food production took precedence over military production , which wa reduced to one-tenth of pre-revolutionary level . </s> in 1968 , the new economic mechanism ( nem ) introduced free-market element into socialist command economy . from the 1960s through the late 1980s , hungary wa often referred to a `` the happiest barrack `` within the eastern bloc . during the latter part of the cold war hungary 's gdp per caput wa fourth only to east germany , czechoslovak socialist republic , and the soviet union itself . a a result of this relatively high standard of living , a more liberalized economy , a le censored press , and le restricted travel right , hungary wa generally considered one of the more liberal country in which to live in central europe during communism . in the 1980s , however , living standard steeply declined again due to early 1980s recession to which communism wa unable to respond . by the time kdr died in 1989 , the soviet union wa in steep decline and a younger generation of reformist saw liberalization a the solution to economic and social issue . </s> <section_title_start> third republic ( 1989present ) <section_title_end> </s> hungary 's fall of communism to democracy and capitalism ( rendszervlts , `` regime change `` ) wa peaceful and prompted by economic stagnation , domestic political pressure , and changing relation with other warsaw pact country . although the mszmp began hungarian round table talk with various opposition group in march 1989 , the reburial of imre nagy a a revolutionary martyr that june is widely considered the symbolic end of communism in hungary . over 100,000 people attended the budapest ceremony without any significant government interference , and many speaker openly called for soviet troop to leave the country . free election were held 1990 hungarian parliamentary election , and the hungarian democratic forum , a major conservative opposition group , wa elected to the head of a coalition government . jzsef antall became the first democratically elected prime minister since world war ii . </s> with the removal of state subsidy and rapid privatization in 1991 , hungary wa affected by a severe economic recession . the antall government 's austerity measure proved unpopular , and the communist party 's legal and political heir , the hungarian socialist party , won the subsequent 1994 hungarian parliamentary election . this abrupt shift in the political landscape wa repeated in 1998 hungarian parliamentary election and 2002 hungarian parliamentary election ; each electoral cycle , the governing party wa ousted and the erstwhile opposition elected . like most other post-communist european state , however , hungary broadly pursued an european integration agenda , enlargement of nato nato in 1999 and the european union 2003 hungarian european union membership referendum . a a nato member , hungary wa involved in the yugoslav war . </s> in 2006 , 2006 protest in hungary erupted after it wa revealed that prime minister ferenc gyurcsny had claimed in szd speech that hungarian socialist party `` lied `` to win the 2006 hungarian parliamentary election . the popularity of left-wing party plummeted in the ensuing political upheaval , and in 2010 , viktor orbn 's national conservatism national-conservative fidesz wa 2010 hungarian parliamentary election to a parliamentary supermajority . the legislature consequently approved a constitution of hungary , among other sweeping governmental and legal change . although these development were met with and still engender controversy , fidesz secured a second parliamentary supermajority 2014 hungarian parliamentary election and a third 2018 hungarian parliamentary election . </s> in september 2018 , the european parliament voted to act against hungary , under the term of article 7 of the treaty on european union . proponent of the vote claimed that the hungarian government posed a democratic backsliding `` systematic threat `` to democracy and the rule of law . the vote wa carried with the support of 448 meps , narrowly clearing the two-thirds majority required . the vote marked the first the european parliament had triggered an article 7 procedure against an eu member state . pter szijjrt , the minister of foreign affair ( hungary ) , described the vote a `` petty revenge `` which had been provoked by hungary 's tough anti-migration policy . szijjrt alleged that the vote wa fraudulent because abstention were not counted which made it easier to reach the two-thirds majority required to pas the vote . </s> at the european election in may 2019 , viktor orbn 's fidesz party secured another a sweeping victory , receiving more than 50 % of the vote . </s> in march 2020 , during the ongoing covid-19 pandemic in hungary , the hungarian parliament passed a law granting the government the power to rule by decree to the extent it is necessary to diminish the consequence of the pandemic , suspending by-election and outlawing the `` spreading of misinformation `` . the government 's special authorisation is in force until the pandemic is declared to have ended . the law wa lifted on 16 june 2020. </s> <section_title_start> geography <section_title_end> </s> hungary 's geography ha traditionally been defined by it two main waterway , the danube and tisza river . the common tripartite division of the country into three sectionsdunntl ( `` beyond the danube `` , transdanubia ) , tiszntl ( `` beyond the tisza `` ) , and duna-tisza kze ( `` between the danube and tisza `` ) is a reflection of this . the danube flow northsouth right through the centre of contemporary hungary , and the entire country lie within it drainage basin . </s> transdanubia , which stretch westward from the centre of the country towards austria , is a primarily hilly region with a terrain varied by low mountain . these include the very eastern stretch of the alp , alpokalja , in the west of the country , the transdanubian mountain in the central region of transdanubia , and the mecsek mountain and villny mountain in the south . the highest point of the area is the rott-k in the alp , at . the little hungarian plain ( kisalfld ) is found in northern transdanubia . lake balaton and lake hvz , the largest lake in central europe and the largest thermal lake in the world , respectively , are in transdanubia a well . </s> the duna-tisza kze and tiszntl are characterised mainly by the great hungarian plain ( alfld ) , which stretch across most of the eastern and southeastern area of the country . to the north of the plain are the foothill of the carpathian mountain in a wide band near the slovakian border . the kkes at is the tallest mountain in hungary and is found here . </s> phytogeography , hungary belongs to the central european province of the circumboreal region within the boreal kingdom . according to the world wide fund for nature , the territory of hungary belongs to the terrestrial ecoregion of pannonian mixed forest . it had a 2019 forest landscape integrity index mean score of 2.25/10 , ranking it 156th globally out of 172 country . </s> hungary ha 10 national park , 145 minor nature reserve , and 35 landscape protection area . </s> hungary is a landlocked country . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> hungary ha a temperate climate , with generally warm summer with low overall humidity level but frequent rainshowers and cold snowy winter . average annual temperature is . temperature extreme are on 20 july 2007 at kiskunhalas in the summer and on 16 february 1940 miskolc-grmblytapolca in the winter . average high temperature in the summer is and average low temperature in the winter is . the average yearly rainfall is approximately . </s> hungary is ranked sixth in an environmental protection index by gw/climate action network . </s> <section_title_start> government and politics <section_title_end> </s> hungary is a unitary state , parliamentary democratic , representative democracy parliamentary republic . the hungarian political system operates under a framework reformed in 2012 ; this constitutional document is the constitution of hungary . amendment generally require a two-thirds majority of parliament ; the fundamental principle of the constitution ( a expressed in the article guaranteeing human dignity , the separation of power , the state structure , and the rule of law ) are valid in perpetuity . 199 member of parliament ( orszggylsi kpvisel ) are elected to the highest organ of state authority , the unicameralism national assembly of hungary ( national assembly ) , every four year in a single-round first-past-the-post voting first-past-the-post election with an election threshold of 5 % . </s> the president of hungary ( kztrsasgi elnk ) serf a the [ of state ] and is elected by the national assembly every five year . the president is invested primarily with representative responsibility and power : receiving foreign head of state , formally nominating the prime minister at the recommendation of the national assembly , and serving a commander-in-chief of the hungarian army . importantly , the president is also invested with veto power , and may send legislation to the 15-member constitutional court of hungary for review . the third most-significant governmental position in hungary is the list of speaker of the national assembly ( hungary ) , who is elected by the national assembly and responsible for overseeing the daily session of the body . </s> the prime minister of hungary ( miniszterelnk ) is elected by the national assembly , serving a the [ of government ] and exercising executive ( government ) . traditionally , the prime minister is the leader of the largest party in parliament . the prime minister selects government of hungary minister and ha the exclusive right to dismiss them , although cabinet nominee must appear before consultative open hearing before one or more parliamentary committee , survive a vote in the national assembly , and be formally approved by the president . the cabinet report to national assembly ( hungary ) . </s> in 2009 hungary , due to strong economic difficulty , had to request the help of the imf for about 9 ; billion . the debt-to-gdp ratio of hungary had it peak in 2011 when it stood at 83 % and decreased since then . according to eurostat , the government debt of hungary amount to 25.119 ; billion huf or 74.1 % of it gross domestic product in 2016 . the government achieved a budget deficit 1.9 % of the gdp in 2015 . hungary 's credit rating by credit rating agency standard & poor 's , moody 's and fitch rating stand at investment grade bbb with a stable outlook in 2016. </s> on transparency international 's 2019 corruption perception index hungary 's public sector ha deteriorated from a score of 51 in 2015 to 44 in 2019 making it the 2nd most corrupt eu member at pair with romania and behind bulgaria . </s> following a decade of fidesz-kdnp rule lead by viktor orbn , freedom house 's nation in transit 2020 report reclassified hungary from a democracy to a transitional or [ regime ] . according to the report , `` the right-wing alliance ... ha gradually undermined the rule of law in hungary and established tight control over the country s independent institution ... [ it ] ha steadily rewritten the hungarian constitution , and eliminated democratic safeguard statutorily embodied in the constitutional court , prosecutor office , medium authority , and state audit office ... `` . it also limited parliamentary oversight , independent news medium , non-governmental organization and academic freedom , while consolidating power around the central government . </s> <section_title_start> political party <section_title_end> </s> since the fall of communism , hungary ha a multi-party system . the 2018 hungarian parliamentary election took place on 8 april 2018 . this parliamentary election wa the 7th since the 1990 hungarian parliamentary election 1990 first multi-party election . the result wa a victory for fideszchristian democratic people 's party ( hungary ) alliance , preserving it two-thirds majority with viktor orbn remaining prime minister . it wa the second election according to the new constitution of hungary which went into force on 1 january 2012 . the new electoral law also entered into force that day . the voter elected 199 mp instead of previous 386 lawmaker . the current political landscape in hungary is dominated by the conservative fidesz , who have a near supermajority , and two medium-sized party , the left-wing democratic coalition ( hungary ) ( dk ) and liberal momentum movement . </s> the democratic character of the hungarian parliament wa reestablished with revolution of 1989 and the end of communist dictatorship in 1989 . today 's parliament is still called orszggyls just like in royal time , but in order to differentiate between the historical royal diet is referred to a `` national assembly `` now . the diet of hungary wa a legislative institution in the kingdom of hungary in the middle age from the 1290s , and in it successor state , royal hungary and the land of the crown of saint stephen throughout the early modern period . the article of the 1790 diet set out that the diet should meet at least once every 3 year , but , since the diet wa called by the habsburg monarchy , this promise wa not kept on several occasion thereafter . a a result of the austro-hungarian compromise of 1867 austro-hungarian compromise , it wa reconstituted in 1867 . the latin term natio hungarica ( `` hungarian nation `` ) wa used to designate the political elite which had participation in the diet , consisting of the hungarian nobility , the catholic clergy , and a few enfranchised burgher , regardless of language or ethnicity . </s> <section_title_start> law and judicial system <section_title_end> </s> the judicial system of hungary is a civil law ( legal system ) system divided between court with regular civil and criminal jurisdiction and administrative court with jurisdiction over litigation between individual and the public administration . hungarian law is codified and based on law of germany and in a wider sense , civil law or roman law . the court system for civil and criminal jurisdiction consists of local court ( jrsbrsg ) , regional appellate court ( tltbla ) , and the supreme court ( kria ) . hungary 's highest court are located in budapest . </s> law enforcement in hungary is split among the rendrsg and the national tax and custom administration . the hungarian police is the main and largest state law enforcement agency in hungary . it carry nearly all general police duty such a criminal investigation , patrol activity , traffic policing , border control . it is led by the national police commissioner under the control of the ministry of interior ( hungary ) . the body is divided into county police department which are also divided into regional and town police department . the national police also have subordinate agency with nationwide jurisdiction , such a the `` nemzeti nyomoz iroda `` ( national bureau of investigation ) , a civilian police force specialised in investigating serious crime , and the gendarmerie-like , militarised `` kszenlti rendrsg `` ( stand-by police ) mainly dealing with riot and often reinforcing local police force . due to hungary 's accession to the schengen treaty , the police and border guard were merged into a single national corp , with the border guard becoming police officer . this merger took place in january 2008 . the custom and excise authority remained subject to the ministry of finance under the national tax and custom administration . </s> <section_title_start> administrative division <section_title_end> </s> hungary is a unitary state divided into 19 county of hungary ( megye ) . in addition , the capital of hungary ( fvros ) , budapest , is an independent entity . the county and the capital are the 20 nomenclature of territorial unit for statistic third-level unit of hungary . the state are further subdivided into 174 district of hungary ( jr ) . the district are further divided into list of city and town of hungary , of which 23 are designated town with county right ( megyei jog vros ) , sometimes known a `` urban county `` in english . the local authority of these town have extended power , but these town belong to the territory of the respective district instead of being independent territorial unit . county and district council and municipality have different role and separate responsibility relating to local government . the role of the county are basically administrative and focus on strategic development , while preschool , public water utility , garbage disposal , elderly care and rescue service are administered by the municipality . </s> since 1996 , the county and city of budapest have been grouped into seven region of hungary for statistical and development purpose . these seven region constitute nomenclature of territorial unit for statistic ' second-level unit of hungary . they are central hungary , central transdanubia , northern great plain , northern hungary , southern transdanubia , southern great plain , and western transdanubia . </s> <section_title_start> foreign relation <section_title_end> </s> the foreign policy of hungary is based on four basic commitment : to atlanticism atlantic co-operation , to european integration , to international development and to international law . the economy of hungary is fairly open and relies strongly on international trade . </s> hungary ha been a member of the united nation since december 1955 and a member of the european union , nato , the organisation for economic co-operation and development , the visegrd group , the wto , the world bank , the asian infrastructure investment bank and the international monetary fund . hungary took on the presidency of the council of the european union for half a year in 2011 and the next will be in 2024 . in 2015 , hungary wa the fifth largest oecd non-dac donor of development aid in the world , which represents list of development aid country donor 0.13 % of it gross national income . </s> hungary 's capital city , budapest , is home to more than 100 embassy and representative body a an international political actor . hungary host the main and regional headquarters of many international organisation a well , including european institute of innovation and technology , european police college , united nation high commissioner for refugee , food and agriculture organization of the united nation , international centre for democratic transition , institute of international education , international labour organization , international organization for migration , international federation of red cross and red crescent society , regional environmental center for central and eastern europe , danube commission ( 1948 ) and others . </s> since 1989 , hungary 's top foreign policy goal ha been achieving integration into western economic and security organisation . hungary joined the partnership for peace programme in 1994 and ha actively supported the ifor and sfor mission in bosnia . hungary since 1989 ha also improved it often frosty neighbourly relation by signing basic treaty with romania , slovakia , and ukraine . these renounce all outstanding territorial claim and lay the foundation for constructive relation . however , the issue of hungarian diaspora right in romania , slovakia and serbia periodically cause bilateral tension to flare up . since 2017 , the hungaryukraine relation rapidly deteriorated over the issue of the hungarian in ukraine . hungary since 1989 ha signed all of the organization for security and co-operation in europe document , and served a the osce 's chairman-in-office in 1997. </s> <section_title_start> military <section_title_end> </s> the list of head of state of hungary hold the title of commander-in-chief of the nation 's armed force . the minister of defence ( hungary ) jointly with general staff of the armed force of the republic of hungary administers the armed force , including the hungarian ground force and the hungarian air force . since 2007 , the hungarian armed force ha been under a unified command structure . the ministry of defence maintains the political and civil control over the army . a subordinate joint force command coordinate and command the hdf . in 2016 , the armed force had 31,080 personnel on active duty , the operative reserve brought the total number of troop to fifty thousand . in 2016 , it wa planned that military spending the following year would be $ 1.21 ; billion , about 0.94 % of the country 's gdp , well below the nato target of 2 % . in 2012 , the government adopted a resolution in which it pledged to increase defence spending to 1.4 % of gdp by 2022. </s> military service is voluntary , though conscription may occur in wartime . in a significant move for modernisation , hungary decided in 2001 to buy 14 jas 39 gripen fighter aircraft for about 800 ; million eur . hungarian national cyber security center wa re-organised in 2016 in order to become more efficient through cyber security . </s> in 2016 , the hungarian military had about 700 troop stationed in foreign country a part of international peacekeeping force , including 100 hdf troop in the nato-led isaf force in afghanistan , 210 hungarian soldier in kosovo under command of kosovo force , and 160 troop in bosnia and herzegovina . hungary sent a 300-strong logistics unit to iraq in order to help the u occupation with armed transport convoy , though public opinion opposed the country 's participation in the war . one soldier wa killed in action by a roadside bomb while serving in iraq . </s> during the 18th and 19th century , hussar rose to international fame and served a a model for light cavalry in many european country . in 184849 , hungarian force achieved success against better-trained and equipped austrian force , despite the austrian advantage in number . in 1872 , the ludovica military academy officially began training cadet . by 1873 , the hungarian military consisted of over 2,800 officer and 158,000 men organised into eighty-six infantry battalion and fifty-eight mounted squadron . during world war i , out of the eight million men mobilized by austro hungarian empire , over one million died . during the 1930s and early 1940s , hungary wa preoccupied with regaining the territory and population lost a a result of the trianon peace treaty at versailles in 1920 . conscription wa introduced on a national basis in 1939 . the peacetime strength of the royal hungarian army grew to 80,000 men organised into seven corp command . during world war ii , the hungarian second army wa heavily depleted fighting on the bank of the don river ( russia ) in december 1942 during the battle for stalingrad . during the socialist and the warsaw pact era ( 19471989 ) , the entire 200,000 strong southern group of force wa garrisoned in hungary , complete with artillery , tank regiment , air force and missile troop with nuclear weapon . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> hungary is an oecd [ economy high-income ] mixed economy with list of country by human development index and skilled labour force with the list of country by income equality in the world . furthermore , it is the list of country by economic complexity according to the economic complexity index . the hungarian is the list of country by gdp ( ppp ) 57th-largest economy in the world ( out of 188 country measured by imf ) with $ 265.037 ; billion output , and rank list of country by gdp ( ppp ) per caput measured by purchasing power parity . hungary is an export-oriented market economy with a heavy emphasis on foreign trade , thus the country is the list of country by export in the world . the country ha more than $ 100 ; billion export in 2015 with high , $ 9.003 ; billion balance of trade , of which 79 % went to the eu and 21 % wa extra-eu trade . hungary ha a more than 80 % private sector economy with list of country by tax revenue a percentage of gdp 39,1 % overall taxation , which provides the basis for the country 's welfare state . on the expenditure side , [ consumption ] is the main component of gdp and account for 50 percent of it total use , followed by gross fixed capital formation with 22 percent and government expenditure with 20 percent . hungary continues to be one of the leading nation for attracting foreign direct investment in central and eastern europe , the inward fdi in the country wa $ 119.8 ; billion in 2015 , while hungary invests more than $ 50 ; billion abroad . , the key trading partner of hungary were germany , austria , romania , slovakia , france , italy , poland and czech republic . major industry include food processing , pharmaceutical , motor vehicle , information technology , chemical , metallurgy , machinery , electrical good , and tourism ( in 2014 hungary welcomed 12.1 ; million international tourist ) . </s> hungary is the largest electronics producer in central and eastern europe . electronics manufacturing and research are among the main driver of innovation and economic growth in the country . in the past 20 year hungary ha also grown into a major centre for mobile technology , information security , and related hardware research . </s> the employment rate in the economy wa 68.3 % in 2017 , the employment structure show the characteristic of post-industrial society post-industrial economy , 63.2 % of employed workforce work in service sector , the industry contributed by 29.7 % , while agriculture with 7.1 % . unemployment rate wa 4.1 % in 2017 september , down from 11 % during the financial crisis of 200708 . </s> hungary is part of the internal market which represents more than 508 ; million consumer . several domestic commercial policy are determined by agreement among european union member and by eu legislation . </s> large list of company of hungary are included in the bux , the hungarian stock market index listed on budapest stock exchange . well-known company include the fortune global 500 firm mol group , the otp bank , gedeon richter plc . , magyar telekom , cig pannonia , fhb mortgage bank , zwack liqueur and more . besides this hungary ha a large portion of specialised small and medium enterprise , for example a significant number of automotive supplier and technology startup company among others . </s> budapest is the financial and business capital of hungary . the capital is a significant economic hub , classified a an alpha world city in the study by the globalization and world city research network and it is the second fastest-developing urban economy in europe a gdp per caput in the city increased by 2.4 per cent and employment by 4.7 per cent compared to the previous year in 2014 . on the national level , budapest is the primate city of hungary regarding business and economy , accounting for 39 % of the national income , the city ha a gross metropolitan product more than $ 100 ; billion in 2015 , making it one of the largest regional economy in the european union . budapest is also among the top 100 gdp performing city in the world , measured by pricewaterhousecoopers and in a global city competitiveness ranking by economist intelligence unit , budapest stand before tel aviv , lisbon , moscow and johannesburg among others . furthermore , hungary 's corporate tax rate is only 9 % , which is relatively low for eu state . </s> hungary maintains it own currency , the hungarian forint ] ( huf ) , although the economy fulfills the [ [ maastricht criterion with the exception of public debt , list of country by public debt with the level of 75.3 % in 2015 . the hungarian national bankfounded in 1924 , after the dissolution of austria-hungary austro-hungarian empireis currently focusing on price stability with an inflation target of 3 % . </s> <section_title_start> science and technology <section_title_end> </s> hungary 's achievement in science and technology have been significant , and research and development effort form an integral part of the economy of hungary country 's economy . hungary spent 1.4 % of it gross domestic product ( gdp ) on civil research and development in 2015 , which is the list of country by research and development spending . hungary rank 32nd among the most innovative country in the bloomberg innovation index , standing before hong kong , iceland or malta . the global innovation index place hungary 33rd among the country of the world in 2016 . in 2014 , hungary counted 2,651 full-time equivalent researcher per million inhabitant , steadily increasing from 2,131 in 2010 and compare with 3,984 in the u or 4,380 in germany . hungary 's [ tech ] nology industry ha benefited from both the country 's skilled workforce and the strong presence of foreign high-tech firm and research center . hungary also ha one of the highest rate of filed patent , the sixth highest ratio of high-tech and medium high-tech output in the total industrial output , the 12th highest research foreign direct investment inflow , placed 14th in research talent in business enterprise and ha the 17th best overall innovation efficiency ratio in the world . </s> the key actor of research and development in hungary is the national research , development and innovation office ( nrdi office ) , which is a national strategic and funding of science funding agency for scientific research , development and innovation , the primary source of advice on rdi policy for the government of hungary , and the primary rdi funding agency . it role is to develop rdi policy and ensure that hungary adequately invest in rdi by funding excellent research and supporting innovation to increase competitiveness and to prepare the rdi strategy of the hungarian government , to handle the national research , development and innovation fund , and represents the hungarian government and a hungarian rdi community in international organisation . </s> scientific research in the country is supported partly by industry and partly by the state , through the list of university in hungary and by scientific state-institutions such a hungarian academy of science . hungary ha been the home of some of the most prominent researcher in various scientific discipline , notably physic , mathematics , chemistry and engineering . a of 2018 , list of hungarian nobel laureate have been recipient of a nobel prize . until 2012 three individual : csoma , jnos bolyai and tihanyi were included in the unesco memory of the world register a well a the collective contribution : tabula hungariae and bibliotheca corviniana . contemporary , internationally well-known hungarian scientist include : mathematician lszl lovsz , physicist albert-lszl barabsi , physicist ferenc krausz , and biochemist rpd pusztai . hungary is famous for it excellent mathematics education which ha trained numerous outstanding scientist . famous hungarian mathematician include father farkas bolyai and son jnos bolyai , who wa one of the founder of non-euclidean geometry ; paul erds , famed for publishing in over forty language and whose erds number are still tracked , and john von neumann , a key contributor in the field of quantum mechanic and game theory , a pioneer of digital computing , and the chief mathematician in the manhattan project . notable hungarian invention include the lead dioxide match ( jnos irinyi ) , a type of carburetor ( dont bnki , jnos csonka ) , the electric ( ac ) train engine and generator ( klmn kand ) , [ ( dennis gabor ] ) , the [ [ kalman filter ( rudolf e. klmn ) , and rubik 's cube ( ern rubik ) . </s> <section_title_start> transport <section_title_end> </s> hungary ha a highly developed road , railway , air and water transport system . budapest , the capital , serf a an important hub for the hungarian state railway ( mv ) . the capital is served by three large train station called eastern railway station ( budapest ) ( eastern ) , western railway station ( budapest ) ( western ) , and southern railway station ( budapest ) ( southern ) plyaudvars . szolnok is the most important railway hub outside budapest , while tiszai railway station in miskolc and the main station of szombathely , gyr , szeged , and szkesfehrvr are also key to the network . </s> budapest , debrecen , miskolc , and szeged have tram network . the budapest metro is the second-oldest underground rapid transit system in the world ; it line 1 ( budapest metro ) date from 1896 . the system consists of four line . a regional rail system , hv , operates in the budapest metropolitan area . </s> hungary ha a total length of approximately motorway ( autplya ) . motorway section are being added to the existing network , which already connects many major economically important city to the capital . </s> the most important port is budapest . other important one include dunajvros and baja , hungary . </s> there are five international airport in hungary : budapest liszt ferenc international airport ( informally called `` ferihegy `` after it previous name ) , debrecen international airport , srmellk international airport ( also called hvz-balaton airport ) , gyr-pr international airport gyr-pr , and pcs-pogny international airport pcs-pogny . the national carrier , malv hungarian airline , operated flight to over 60 , mostly european city , but ceased operation in 2012 . low-budget airline wizzair is based in hungary , at ferihegy . </s> <section_title_start> demographic <section_title_end> </s> hungary 's population wa 9,937,628 according to the 2011 census , making it the fifth most populous country in central and eastern europe and demographic of the european union medium-sized member state of the european union . population density stand at 107 inhabitant per square kilometre , which is about two time higher than the list of sovereign state and dependent territory by population density . more than one quarter of the population lived in the budapest metropolitan area , 6,903,858 people ( 69.5 % ) in list of city and town of hungary overall . </s> like most other european country , hungary is experiencing sub-replacement fertility ; it estimated total fertility rate of 1.43 child per woman is well below the replacement rate of 2.1 , albeit higher than it nadir of 1.28 in 1999 , and remains considerably below the high of 5.59 child born per woman in 1884 . a a result , it population ha been gradually declining and rapidly ageing . in 2011 , the conservative government began a programme to increase the birth rate with a focus on ethnic magyar by reinstating 3 year maternity leave a well a boosting part-time job . the fertility rate ha gradually increased from 1.27 child born/woman in 2011 . the natural decrease in the first 10 month of 2016 wa only 25,828 which wa 8,162 le than the corresponding period in 2015 . in 2015 , 47.9 % of birth were to unmarried woman . hungary ha one of the oldest population in the world , with the average age of 42.7 year . life expectancy wa 71.96 year for men and 79.62 year for woman in 2015 , growing continuously since the end of communism in hungary ( 1989 ) . </s> hungary recognises two sizeable minority group , designated a `` national minority `` because their ancestor have lived in their respective region for century in hungary : a german of hungary of about 130,000 that life throughout the country , and a romani people in hungary numerous around 300,000 that mainly resides in northern hungary . some study indicate a considerably larger number of romani in hungary ( 876,000 people c. 9 % of the population . ) . according to the 2011 census , there were 8,314,029 ( 83.7 % ) ethnic hungarian , 308,957 ( 3.1 % ) romani people , 131,951 ( 1.3 % ) german , 29,647 ( 0.3 % ) slovak , 26,345 ( 0.3 % ) romanian , and 23,561 ( 0.2 % ) croat in hungary ; 1,455,883 people ( 14.7 % of the total population ) did not declare their ethnicity . thus , hungarian made up more than 90 % of people who declared their ethnicity . in hungary , people can declare more than one ethnicity , so the sum of ethnicity is higher than the total population . </s> today approximately hungarian diaspora 5 ; million hungarian live outside hungary . </s> <section_title_start> urbanization <section_title_end> </s> hungary ha 3,152 locality a of july 15 , 2013 . 346 town ( hungarian term : vros , plural : vrosok ; the terminology doe n't distinguish between city and town the term town is used in official translation ) and 2,806 village ( hungarian : kzsg , plural : kzsgek ) . the number of town can change , since village can be elevated to town status by act of the president . the capital budapest ha a special status and is not included in any county while 23 of the town are so-called urban county ( megyei jog vros town with county right ) . all county seat except budapest are urban county . </s> four of the city ( budapest , miskolc , gyr , and pc ) have agglomeration , and the hungarian statistical office distinguishes seventeen other area in earlier stage of agglomeration development . </s> the largest city is the capital , budapest , the smallest town is plhza with 1038 inhabitant ( 2010 ) . the largest village is solymr ( population : 10,123 a of 2010 ) there are more than 100 village with fewer than 100 inhabitant while the smallest village have fewer than 20 inhabitant . </s> <section_title_start> language <section_title_end> </s> hungarian language is the official language and predominant spoken language in hungary . hungarian is the language of europe with around 13 ; million native speaker and it is one of 24 official and working language of the european union . outside hungary it is also spoken by community of hungarian people in neighbouring country and by hungarian diaspora community worldwide . according to the 2011 census , 9,896,333 people ( 99.6 % ) speak hungarian in hungary , of whom 9,827,875 people ( 99 % ) speak it a a first language , while 68,458 people ( 0.7 % ) speak it a a second language . english ( 1,589,180 speaker , 16.0 % ) , and german ( 1,111,997 speaker , 11.2 % ) are the most widely spoken foreign language , while there are several recognised minority language in hungary ( armenian language , bulgarian language , croatian language , german language , greek language , romanian language , romani language , rusyn language , serbian language , slovak language , slovenian language , and ukrainian language ) . </s> hungarian ( magyar ) is a member of the uralic language , unrelated to any neighbouring language and distantly related to finnish language and estonian language . it is the largest of the uralic language in term of the number of speaker and the only one spoken in central europe . there are sizeable population of hungarian speaker in romania , the czech and slovak republic , the former yugoslavia , ukraine , israel , and the u.s . smaller group of hungarian speaker live in canada , slovenia , and austria , but also in australia , brazil , argentina , mexico , venezuela and chile . standard hungarian is based on the variety spoken in the capital of budapest , although use of the standard dialect is enforced , hungarian ha a number of urban and rural dialect . </s> <section_title_start> religion <section_title_end> </s> hungary is a historically christianity country . hungarian historiography identifies the foundation of the hungarian state with stephen i of hungary stephen i 's baptism and coronation with the szentkorona in a.d. 1000 . stephen promulgated roman catholicism a the state religion , and his successor were traditionally known a the apostolic king . the catholic church in hungary remained strong through the century , and the archbishop of esztergom wa granted extraordinary temporal privilege a prince-primate ( hercegprms ) of hungary . </s> although contemporary hungary ha no official religion and recognises freedom of religion a a fundamental right , the hungarian constitution `` recognizes christianity 's nation-building role `` in it preamble and in article vii affirms that `` the state may cooperate with the church for community goal . `` </s> the 2011 census showed that the majority of hungarian were christian ( 54.2 % ) , with catholic church in hungary ( katolikusok ) ( 37.1 % ) and hungarian reformed calvinist ( reformtusok ) ( 11.1 % ) making up the bulk of these alongside lutheran ( evanglikusok ) ( 2.2 % ) , greek catholic ( 1.8 % ) , and other christian ( 1.3 % ) . jewish ( 0.1 % ) , buddhist ( 0.1 % ) and muslim ( 0.06 % ) community are in the minority . 27.2 % of the population did not declare a religious affiliation while 16.7 % declared themselves explicitly irreligious , another 1.5 % atheist . </s> during the initial stage of the protestant reformation , most hungarian adopted first lutheranism and then calvinism in the form of the hungarian reformed church . in the second half of the 16th century , the jesuit led a counterreformation campaign and the population once again became predominantly catholic . this campaign wa only partially successful , however , and the ( mainly reformed ) hungarian nobility were able to secure freedom of worship for christian . in practice this meant cuius regio , eius religio ; thus , most individual locality in hungary are still identifiable a historically catholic , lutheran , or reformed . the country 's eastern region , especially around debrecen ( the `` calvinist rome `` ) , remain almost completely reformed , a trait they share with historically contiguous hungarian in romania across the romanian border . </s> eastern orthodox church in hungary is associated with the country 's ethnic minority : armenian , bulgarian , greek , romanian , rusyns , ukrainian , and serb . </s> historically , hungary wa home to a history of the jew in hungary with a pre-world war ii population of more than 800,000 , but it is estimated that just over 564,000 hungarian jew were killed between 1941 and 1945 during the holocaust in hungary . between 15 may and 9 july 1944 alone , over 434,000 jew were deported on 147 train , most of them to auschwitz , where about 80 percent were gassed on arrival . some jew were able to escape , but most were either deported to concentration camp , where they were killed , or murdered in hungary by arrow cross party member . from over 800,000 jew living within hungary 's border in 19411944 , about 255,500 are thought to have survived . there are about 120,000 jew in hungary today . </s> <section_title_start> education <section_title_end> </s> education in hungary is predominantly public , run by the minister of education ( hungary ) . preschool-kindergarten education is compulsory education and provided for all child between three and six year old , after which school attendance is also compulsory education until the age of sixteen . primary education usually last for eight year . secondary education includes three traditional type of school focused on different academic level : the gymnasium ( school ) enrolls the most gifted child and prepares student for university study ; the secondary vocational school for intermediate student last four year and the technical school prepares pupil for vocational training and the world of work . the system is partly flexible and bridge exist , graduate from a vocational school can achieve a two year programme to have access to vocational higher education for instance . the trend in international mathematics and science study ( timss ) rated 1314-year-old pupil in hungary among the best in the world for math and science . </s> most of the list of university in hungary are public university , and student traditionally study without fee payment . the general requirement for university is the matura . the hungarian public [ education ] system includes university and other higher education institute , that provide both education curriculum and related degree up to doctoral degree and also contribute to research activity . health insurance for student is free until the end of their study . english and german language is important in hungarian higher education , there are a number of degree programme that are taught in these language , which attracts thousand of student exchange program every year . hungary 's higher education and training ha been ranked 44 out of 148 country in the global competitiveness report 2014. </s> hungary ha a long tradition of higher education reflecting the existence of established knowledge economy . the established list of university in hungary include some of the list of oldest university in continuous operation , the first wa the university of pc founded in 1367 which is still functioning , although , in the year 1276 , the university of veszprm wa destroyed by the troop of peter i csk , but it wa never rebuilt . sigismund established buda university in 1395 . another , universitas istropolitana , wa established 1465 in pozsony by mattias corvinus . </s> nagyszombat university wa founded in 1635 and moved to buda in 1777 and it is called etvs lornd university today . the world 's first institute of technology wa founded in selmecbnya , kingdom of hungary in 1735 , it legal successor is the university of miskolc . the budapest university of technology and economics is considered the oldest institute of technology in the world with university rank and structure , it legal predecessor the institutum geometrico-hydrotechnicum wa founded in 1782 by joseph ii , holy roman emperor . </s> hungary rank fourth ( above neighbour romania , and after china , the united state and russia ) in the all-time medal count at the international mathematical olympiad with 336 total medal , dating back to 1959. </s> <section_title_start> health <section_title_end> </s> hungary maintains a universal health care system largely financed by government national health insurance . according to the oecd , 100 % of the
