population is list of country by health insurance coverage , which is absolutely free for child , student , pensioner , poverty , disability , and church employee . hungary spends 7.2 % of gdp on healthcare , spending $ 2,045 per caput , of which $ 1,365 is provided by the government . </s> hungary is one of the main destination of medical tourism in europe , particularly in dental tourism , in which it share is 42 % in europe and 21 % worldwide . plastic surgery is also a key sector , with 30 % of the client coming from abroad . hungary is well known for it spa culture and is home to culture of hungary # spa culture , which attract `` spa tourism `` . </s> in common with other developed country , cardiovascular disease is a leading cause of mortality , accounting for 49.4 % ( 62,979 ) of all death in 2013 . however , this number peaked in 1985 with 79,355 death , and ha been declining continuously since the fall of communism . the second leading cause of death is cancer with 33,274 ( 26.2 % ) , which ha been stagnant since the 1990s . death from accident dropped from 8,760 in 1990 to 3,654 in 2013 ; the number of suicide ha declined precipitously from 4,911 in 1983 to 2,093 in 2013 ( 21.1 per 100,000 people ) , the lowest since 1956 . there are considerable health disparity between the western and eastern part of hungary ; [ disease ] , [ stroke ] , and [ [ suicide is prevalent in the mostly agricultural and low-income great hungarian plain region in the east , but infrequent in the high-income , middle class area of western transdanubia and central hungary . </s> smoking is a leading cause of death in the country , although it is in steep decline : the proportion of adult smoker declined to 19 % in 2013 from 28 % in 2012 , owing to strict regulation such a a nationwide smoking ban in every indoor public place and the limiting of tobacco sale to state-controlled `` national tobacco shop `` . </s> hungary rank a the global peace index in the world , with a homicide rate of 1.3 per 100,000 people . </s> <section_title_start> culture <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> architecture <section_title_end> </s> hungary is home to the largest synagogue in europe ( dohny street synagogue ) , built in 1859 in moorish revival style with a capacity of 3,000 people , the largest medicinal bath in europe ( szchenyi medicinal bath ) , completed in 1913 in modern renaissance style and located in the budapest city park , the biggest building in hungary with it length ( the parliament building ) , one of the largest basilica in europe ( esztergom basilica ) , the second largest territorial abbey in the world ( pannonhalma archabbey ) , and the largest early christian necropolis outside italy ( pc ) . </s> notable architectural style in hungary include historicism and art nouveau , or rather several variant of art nouveau . in contrast to historicism , hungarian art nouveau is based on the national architectural characteristic . taking the eastern origin of the hungarian into account , dn lechner ( 18451914 ) , the most important figure in hungarian art nouveau , wa initially inspired by indian and syrian architecture , and later by traditional hungarian decorative design . in this way , he created an original synthesis of architectural style . by applying them to three-dimensional architectural element , he produced a version of art nouveau that wa specific to hungary . </s> turning away from the style of lechner , yet taking inspiration from his approach , the group of `` young people `` ( fiatalok ) , which included kroly k and dezs zrumeczky , were to use the characteristic structure and form of traditional hungarian architecture to achieve the same end . </s> besides the two principal style , budapest also display local version of trend originating from other european country . the sezession from vienna , the german jugendstil , art nouveau from belgium and france , and the influence of english and finnish architecture are all reflected in the building constructed at the turn of the 20th century . bla lajta initially adopted lechner 's style , subsequently drawing his inspiration from english and finnish trend ; after developing an interest in the ancient egypt style , he finally arrived at modern architecture . aladr rkay took almost the same route . istvn medgyaszay developed his own style , which differed from lechner 's , using stylised traditional motif to create decorative design in concrete . in the sphere of applied art , those chiefly responsible for promoting the spread of art nouveau were the school and museum of decorative art , which opened in 1896. </s> foreigner have unexpectedly `` discovered `` that a significantly large portion of the citizen live in old and architecturally valuable building . in the budapest downtown area almost all the building are about one hundred year old , with thick wall , high ceiling , and motif on the front wall . </s> <section_title_start> music <section_title_end> </s> hungarian music consists mainly of traditional hungarian folk music and music by prominent composer such a liszt and bartk , considered to be among the greatest hungarian composer . other renowned composer are ern dohnnyi , franz schmidt , zoltn kodly , gabriel von wayditch , rudolf wagner-rgeny , lszl lajtha , franz lehr , imre klmn , sndor veress and mikls rzsa . hungarian traditional music tends to have a strong dactyl ( poetry ) rhythm , a the language is invariably stressed on the first syllable of each word . </s> hungary ha renowned composer of contemporary classical music , gyrgy ligeti , gyrgy kurtg , peter etvs , zoltn kodly and zoltn jeney among them . one of the greatest hungarian composer , bla bartk , wa also among the most significant musician of the 20th century . his music wa invigorated by the theme , mode , and rhythmic pattern of the hungarian and neighbouring folk music tradition he studied , which he synthesised with influence from his contemporary into his own distinctive style . </s> hungary ha made many contribution to the field of folk music , popular music and european classical music . hungarian folk music is a prominent part of the national identity and continues to play a major part in hungarian music . hungarian folk music ha been significant in former country part that belong ; since the 1920 treaty of trianon ; to neighbouring country such a romania , slovakia , poland and especially in southern slovakia and transylvania ; both region have significant number of hungarian . </s> after the establishment of a music academy led by ferenc erkel and franz liszt hungary produced an important number of art musician : </s> * pianist : ern von dohnnyi , ervin nyiregyhzi , andor fldes , tam vsry , gyrgy sndor , gza anda , annie fischer , gyrgy cziffra , edward kilenyi , balint vazsonyi , andrs schiff , zoltn kocsis , dezs rnki , jen jand and others . </s> * violist : joseph joachim , leopold auer , jen hubay , jelly d'arnyi , joseph szigeti , sndor vgh , emil telmanyi , zathurecky , zsigmondy , franz von vecsey , zoltn szkely , tibor varga ( violinist ) and newcomer antal szalai , vilmos szabadi , kristf barti ( b . 79 ) and others . </s> * opera singer : astrid varnay , jzsef simndy , jlia vrady , julia hamari , kolos kovts ( bluebeard in bartk 's bluebeard ) </s> * conductor : eugene ormandy , george szell , antal dorti , jnos ferencsik , fritz reiner , sir georg solti , istvn kertsz ( conductor ) , ferenc fricsay , zoltn rozsnyai , sndor vgh , arpad joo , dm fischer , ivn fischer , pter etvs , zoltn kocsis , tam vsry , gilbert varga and others </s> * string quartet : budapest quartet , hungarian quartet , vgh quartet , takcs quartet , kodly quartet , der quartet , festetics quartet , </s> broughton claim that hungary 's `` infectious sound ha been surprisingly influential on neighboring country ( thanks perhaps to the common austro-hungarian history ) and it 's not uncommon to hear hungarian-sounding tune in romania , slovakia and poland `` .refers to the country a `` widely considered `` to be a `` home of music `` . it is also strong in the szabolcs-szatmr-bereg szabolcs-szatmr area and in the southwest part of transdanubia , near the border with croatia . the busjrs carnival in mohcs is a major hungarian folk music event , formerly featuring the long-established and well-regarded bogyiszl orchestra . </s> hungarian european classical music ha long been an `` experiment , made from hungarian antecedent and on hungarian soil , to create a conscious musical culture [ using the ] musical world of the folk song `` . `` every experiment , made from hungarian antecedent and on hungarian soil , to create a conscious musical culture ( music written by composer , a different from folk music ) , had instinctively or consciously striven to develop widely and universally the musical world of the folk song . folk poetry and folk music were deeply embedded in the collective hungarian people 's culture , and this unity did not cease to be effective even when it wa given from and expression by individual creative artist , performer and poet . `` although the hungarian upper class ha long had cultural and political connection with the rest of europe , leading to an influx of european musical idea , the rural peasant maintained their own tradition such that by the end of the 19th century hungarian composer could draw on rural peasant music to ( re ) create a hungarian classical style . for example , bartk collected folk song from across central and eastern europe , including romania and slovakia , while kodly wa more interested in creating a distinctively hungarian musical style . </s> during the era of communist rule in hungary ( 19441989 ) , a song committee scoured and censored popular music for trace of subversion and ideological impurity . since then , however , the hungarian music industry ha begun to recover , producing successful performer in the field of jazz such a trumpeter rudolf tomsits , pianist-composer kroly binder and , in a modernised form of hungarian folk , ferenc seb and mrta sebestyn . the three giant of hungarian rock , ill ( band ) , metr ( band ) and omega ( band ) , remain very popular , especially omega , which ha following in germany and beyond a well a in hungary . older veteran underground band such a beatrice ( band ) , from the 1980s , also remain popular . </s> <section_title_start> literature <section_title_end> </s> in the earliest time , hungarian language wa written in a old hungarian script runic-like script ( although it wa not used for literature purpose in the modern interpretation ) . the country switched to the latin alphabet after being christianized under the reign of stephen i of hungary ( 10001038 ) . </s> the oldest remained written record in hungarian language is a fragment in the establishing charter of the abbey of tihany ( 1055 ) which contains several hungarian term , among them the word feheruuaru rea meneh hodu utu rea , `` up the military road to szkesfehrvr `` the rest of the document wa written in latin . </s> the oldest remaining complete text in hungarian language is the funeral sermon and prayer ( halotti beszd s knyrgs ) ( 11921195 ) , a translation of a latin sermon . </s> the oldest remaining poem in hungarian is the old hungarian 'lamentations of mary ' ( magyar mria-siralom ) , also a ( not very strict ) translation from latin , from the 13th century . it is also the oldest surviving uralic language poem . </s> among the first chronicle about hungarian history were gesta hungarorum ( `` deed of the hungarian `` ) by the unknown author usually called anonymus , and gesta hunnorum et hungarorum ( `` deed of the hun and the hungarian `` ) by simon kzai . both are in latin . these chronicle mix history with legend , so historically they are not always authentic . another chronicle is the kpes krnika ( illustrated chronicle ) , which wa written for louis i of hungary . </s> renaissance literature flourished under the reign of matthias corvinus of hungary ( 14581490 ) . janus pannonius , although he wrote in latin , count a one of the most important person in hungarian literature , being the only significant hungarian humanist poet of the period . the first printing house wa also founded during matthias ' reign , by andrs hess , in buda . the first book printed in hungary wa the chronica hungarorum . </s> the most important poet of the period wa blint balassi ( 15541594 ) and nikola zrinski ( 16201664 ) . </s> balassi 's poetry show medieval influence , his poem can be divided into three section : love poem , war poem and religious poem . zrnyi 's most significant work , the epic peril of sziget ( `` peril of sziget `` , written in 1648/49 ) is written in a fashion similar to the iliad , and recount the heroic battle of szigetvr , where his great-grandfather died while defending the castle of szigetvr . </s> among the religious literary work the most important is the bible translation by gspr kroli ( the second hungarian bible translation in the history ) , the protestant pastor of gnc , in 1590 . the translation is called the bible of vizsoly , after the town where it wa first published . ( see bible translation into hungarian for more detail . ) </s> the hungarian enlightenment took place about fifty year after the french age of enlightenment . the first enlightened writer were archduchess maria theresa of austria ( 17171780 ) 's bodyguard ( gyrgy bessenyei , jnos batsnyi and others ) . the greatest poet of the time were mihly csokonai vitz and dniel berzsenyi . </s> the greatest figure of the language reform wa ferenc kazinczy . the hungarian language became feasible for all type of scientific explanation from this time , and furthermore many new word were coined for describing new invention . </s> hungarian literature ha recently gained some renown outside the border of hungary ( mostly through translation into german , french and english ) . some modern hungarian author have become increasingly popular in germany and italy especially sndor mrai , pter esterhzy , pter ndas and imre kertsz . the latter is a contemporary jewish writer who survived the holocaust and won the nobel prize for literature in 2002. </s> the older classic of hungarian literature and hungarian poetry have remained almost totally unknown outside hungary . jnos arany , a famous 19th-century hungarian poet , is still much loved in hungary ( especially his collection of ballad ) , among several other `` true classic `` like sndor petfi , the poet of the revolution of 1848 , endre ady , mihly babits , dezs kosztolnyi , attila jzsef , mikls radnti and jnos pilinszky . other well-known hungarian author are lszl krasznahorkai , ferenc mra , gza grdonyi , zsigmond mricz , gyula illys , albert wa , mikls szentkuthy , magda szab and stephen vizinczey . </s> <section_title_start> cuisine <section_title_end> </s> traditional dish such a the world-famous goulash ( gulys stew or gulys soup ) feature prominently in hungarian cuisine . dish are often flavoured with paprika ( ground red pepper ) , a hungarian innovation . the paprika powder , obtained from a special type of pepper , is one of the most common spice used in typical hungarian cuisine . thick , heavy hungarian sour cream called tejfl is often used to soften the dish ' flavour . the famous hungarian hot river fish soup called fisherman 's soup or [ is usually a rich mixture of several kind of poached fish . </s> other dish are chicken paprikash , foie gras ] made of goose liver , [ [ prklt stew , vadas , ( game stew with vegetable gravy and sptzle ) , trout with almond and salty and sweet dumpling , like trs csusza , ( dumpling with fresh quark ( cheese ) cheese and thick sour cream ) . dessert include the iconic dobos cake , strudel ( rtes ) , filled with apple , cherry , poppy seed or cheese , palacsinta , plum dumpling ( kle ) , somli dumpling , dessert soup like chilled sour cherry soup and sweet chestnut puree , gesztenyepr ( cooked chestnut mashed with sugar and rum and split into crumb , topped with whipped cream ) . pretzel and kifli are widely popular pastry . </s> the csrda is the most distinctive type of hungarian inn , an old-style tavern offering traditional cuisine and beverage . boroz usually denotes a cosy old-fashioned wine tavern , pince is a beer or wine cellar and a srz is a pub offering draught beer and sometimes meal . the bisztr is an inexpensive restaurant often with self-service . the bf is the cheapest place , although one may have to eat standing at a counter . pastry , cake and coffee are served at the confectionery called cukrszda , while an eszpressz is a caf . </s> plinka is a fruit brandy , distilled from fruit grown in the orchard situated on the great hungarian plain . it is a spirit native to hungary and come in a variety of flavour including apricot ( barack ) and cherry ( cseresznye ) . however , plum ( szilva ) is the most popular flavour . beer go well with many traditional hungarian dish . the five main hungarian beer brand are : borsod brewery , soproni , arany szok , kbnyai , and dreher brewery . in hungary , people traditionally do not clink their glass or mug when drinking beer . there is an urban legend in hungarian culture that austrian general clinked their beer glass to celebrate the execution of the 13 martyr of arad in 1849 . many people still follow the tradition , although younger people often disavow it , citing that the vow wa only meant to last 150 year . </s> wine : a hugh johnson ( wine ) say in the history of wine , the territory of hungary is ideal for wine-making and the country can be divided to six wine region : north-transdanubia , lake balaton , south-pannnia , duna-region or alfld , upper-hungary and tokaj-hegyalja . the roman brought vine to pannonia , and by the 5th century ad , there are record of extensive vineyard in what is now hungary . the hungarian brought their wine-making knowledge from the east . according to ahmad ibn rustah , the hungarian tribe were familiar with wine-making long time before the hungarian conquest of the carpathian basin . </s> hungarian wine region offer a great variety of style : the main product of the country are elegant and full-bodied dry white with good acidity , although complex sweet white ( tokaj ) , elegant ( eger ) and full-bodied robust red ( villny and szekszrd ) . the main variety are : olaszrizling , hrslevel , furmint , pinot gris or szrkebart , chardonnay ( white ) , kkfrankos ( or blaufrankisch in german ) , kadarka , portugieser , zweigelt , cabernet sauvignon , cabernet franc and merlot . the most famous wine from hungary are tokaji asz and egri bikavr . tokaji , meaning `` of tokaj `` , or `` from tokaj `` in hungarian , is used to label wine from the wine region of tokaj-hegyalja . tokaji wine ha received accolade from numerous great writer and composer including beethoven , liszt , schubert and goethe ; joseph haydn 's favourite wine wa a tokaji . louis xv and frederick the great tried to outdo one another when they entertained guest with tokaji . napoleon iii , the last emperor of france , ordered 3040 barrel of tokaji at the french royal court every year . gustav iii , king of sweden , loved tokaji . in russia , customer included peter the great and empress elizabeth , while catherine the great actually established a russian garrison in the town of tokaj with the aim of assuring regular wine delivery to st. petersburg . </s> for over 150 year , a blend of forty hungarian herb ha been used to create the liqueur unicum . unicum is a bitter , dark-coloured liqueur that can be drunk a an apritif or after a meal , thus helping the digestion . </s> <section_title_start> recreation <section_title_end> </s> hungary is a land of thermal water . a passion for spa culture and hungarian history have been connected from the very beginning . hungarian spa feature ancient rome , greek architecture , architecture of turkey , and northern country architectural element . </s> because of an advantageous geographical location , good quality thermal water can be found in great quantity on over 80 % of hungary 's territory . approximately 1,500 thermal spring can be found in hungary ( more than 100 just in the capital area ) . there are approximately 450 public bath in hungary . </s> the ancient rome heralded the first age of spa in hungary . the remains of their bath complex are still to be seen in buda . spa culture wa revived during the turkish invasion and the thermal spring of buda were used for the construction of a number of bathhouse , some of which such a ( kirly bath , rudas bath ) are still functioning . </s> in the 19th century , the advancement in deep drilling and medical science provided the springboard for a further leap in bathing culture . grand spa such a gellrt bath , lukcs bath , margaret island , and szchenyi medicinal bath are a reflection of this resurgence in popularity . the szchenyi thermal bath is the largest spa complex in europe and it wa the first thermal bath built in the pest side of budapest . this building is a noted example of modern renaissance style . located on the buda side of budapest , the gellrt spa is the most famous and luxurious thermal complex of the capital city . </s> <section_title_start> folk art <section_title_end> </s> ugrs ( jumping dance ) are old style dance dating back to the middle age . </s> solo or couple dance accompanied by old style music , shepherd and other solo man 's dance from transylvania , and marching dance along with remnant of medieval weapon dance belong in this group . </s> karikz is a circle dance performed by woman only accompanied by singing of folk song . </s> csrds are new style dance developed in the 1819th century . csrds is the hungarian name for the national dance , with hungarian embroidered costume and energetic music . from the men 's intricate bootslapping dance to the ancient woman 's circle dance , csrds demonstrates the infectious exuberance of the hungarian folk dancing still celebrated in the village . </s> verbunkos is a solo man 's dance evolved from the recruiting performance of the austria-hungary austro-hungarian army . </s> the legnyes is a men 's solo dance done by the ethnic hungarian people living in the kalotaszeg region of transylvania . although usually danced by young men , it can be also danced by older men . the dance is generally performed freestyle by one dancer at a time in front of a band . woman participate in the dance by standing in line to the side , and singing or shouting verse while the men dance . each man performs a number of point ( dance phrase ) , typically four to eight without repetition . each point consists of four part , each lasting four count . the first part is usually the same for everyone ( there are only a few variation ) . </s> it wa in the beginning of the 18th-century that the present style of hungarian folk art took shape , incorporating both renaissance and baroque element , depending on the area , a well a persian sassanide influence . flower and leaf , sometimes a bird or a spiral ornament , are the principal decorative theme . the most frequent ornament is a flower with a centrepiece resembling the eye of a peacock 's feather . </s> nearly all the manifestation of folk art practiced elsewhere in europe also flourished among the [ people magyar ] peasantry at one time or another , their ceramic and textile being the most highly developed of all . </s> the finest achievement in their textile art are the embroidery which vary from region to region . those of kalotaszeg in transylvania are charming product of oriental design , sewn chiefly in a single colour ; red , blue , or black . soft in line , the embroidery are applied on altar cloth , pillow-cases and sheet . </s> in hungary proper , srkz in transdanubia and the mezkvesd in the great hungarian plain produce the finest embroidery . in the tolna ( county ) region the woman 's cap show black and white design a delicate a lace , and give evidence of the people 's wonderfully subtle artistic feeling . the embroidery motif applied to woman 's wear have also been transposed to tablecloth and runner suitable for modern use a wall decoration . </s> these vessel , made of black clay , reflect more than three hundred year of traditional transdanubian folk pattern and shape . no two are precisely alike , since all work is done by hand , including both the shaping and the decorating . the imprint are made by the thumb or a finger of the ceramist who make the piece . </s> <section_title_start> porcelain <section_title_end> </s> founded in 1826 , herend porcelain is one of the world 's largest ceramic factory , specialising in luxury hand painted and gilded porcelain . in the mid-19th century it wa purveyor to the habsburg dynasty and aristocratic customer throughout europe . many of it classic pattern are still in production . after the fall of communism in hungary , the factory wa privatised and is now 75 % owned by it management and worker , exporting to over 60 country of the world . </s> zsolnay porcelain manufacture is a hungarian manufacturer of porcelain , pottery , ceramic , tile and stoneware . the company introduced the eosin glazing process and pyrogranite ceramic . </s> the zsolnay factory wa established by mikls zsolnay in pc , hungary , to produce stoneware and ceramic in 1853 . in 1863 , his son , vilmos zsolnay ( 18281900 ) joined the company and became it manager and director after several year . he led the factory to worldwide recognition by demonstrating it innovative product at world fair and international exhibition , including the 1873 world fair in vienna , then at the 1878 world fair in paris , where zsolnay received a grand prix . </s> <section_title_start> sport <section_title_end> </s> hungary at the olympics have been successful contender in the olympic game , only ten country have won more olympic medal than hungary , with a total of 498 medal ranking eighth in an all-time olympic game medal count . hungary ha the third-highest number of olympic medal per caput and second-highest number of gold medal per caput in the world . hungary ha historically excelled in olympic water sport . in water polo the hungarian team is the water polo at the summer olympics and in list of olympic medalist in swimming ( men ) are fourth most successful overall , while list of olympic medalist in swimming ( woman ) are eighth most successful overall . they have also seen success in canoeing and kayaking canoeing and kayaking at the summer olympics . </s> hungary won it first gold medal in winter olympics in 2018 in men short track speed skating with a team of four : csaba burjn , sndor liu , shaoang liu , viktor knoch . </s> in 2015 the assembly of the hungarian olympic committee and the general assembly of budapest decided to bid for the 2024 summer olympics but eventually awarded to paris . budapest ha also lost several bid to host the game , in 1916 summer olympics , 1920 summer olympics , 1936 summer olympics , 1944 summer olympics , and 1960 summer olympics to berlin , antwerp , london , and rome , respectively . </s> hungary hosted many global sport event in the past , among others the 1997 world amateur boxing championship , 2000 world fencing championship , 2001 world allround speed skating championship , 2008 world interuniversity game , 2008 world modern pentathlon championship , 2010 itu world championship series , 2011 iihf world championship , 2013 world fencing championship , 2013 world wrestling championship , 2014 world master athletics championship , 2017 world aquatic championship and 2017 world judo championship , only in the last two decade . besides these , hungary wa the home of many european-level tournament , like 2006 european aquatic championship , 2010 european aquatic championship , 2013 european judo championship , 2013 european karate championship , 2017 european rhythmic gymnastics championship and will be the host of 4 match in the uefa euro 2020 , which will be held in the 67,889-seat new multi-purpose stadium multi-purpose new pusks ferenc stadium . </s> the hungarian grand prix in formula one ha been held at the hungaroring just outside budapest , which circuit ha fia grade 1 license . since 1986 , the race ha been a round of the fia formula one world championship . at the 2013 hungarian grand prix , it wa confirmed that hungary will continue to host a formula 1 race until 2021 . the track wa completely resurfaced for the first time in early 2016 , and it wa announced the grand prix 's deal wa extended for a further five year , until 2026. </s> chess is also a popular and successful sport in hungary , the hungarian player are the 10th most powerful overall on the ranking of world chess federation . there are about 54 grandmaster ( chess ) and 118 international master in hungary , which is more than in france or united kingdom . world top junior player is the hungarian richrd rapport currently on the fide world ranking , while judit polgr generally considered the glossary of chess # strength female chess player of all time . some of the world 's best sabre ( fencing ) athlete have historically also hailed from hungary , and in 2009 , the hungary men 's national ice hockey team qualified for their first iihf world championship , in 2015 , they qualified for their second world championship in the top division . </s> <section_title_start> football <section_title_end> </s> hungary ha won three olympic football title , finished runner-up in the 1938 fifa world cup and 1954 fifa world cup , and third in 1964 european nation ' cup . hungary revolutionised the sport in the 1950s , laying the tactical fundamental of total football and dominating international football with the magical magyar ( `` golden team `` ) , which included ferenc pusks , top goalscorer of the 20th century , to whom fifa dedicated it newest award , the fifa ferenc pusks award . the side of that era ha the second world football elo rating # all-time highest rating all-time highest football elo ranking in the world , with 2166 , and one of the longest undefeated run in football history , remaining unbeaten in 31 game spanning more than four year . </s> the post-golden age decade saw a gradually weakening hungary , though recently there is renewal in all aspect . the hungarian child 's football federation wa founded in 2008 , a youth development thrives . for the first time in hungarian football 's history , they hosted the 2010 uefa futsal championship in budapest and debrecen , the first time the hungarian football federation staged a uefa final tournament . also , the national team have produced some surprise success such a beating euro 2004 winner greece national football team 32 and 2006 fifa world cup winner italy national football team 31 . during uefa euro 2016 hungary won uefa euro 2016 group f and were eventually defeated in the round of 16. </s> <section_title_start> see also <section_title_end> </s> * outline of hungary </s> * index of hungary-related article </s> <section_title_start> note
