battle of tell el kebir and militarily occupying the country . following this , the khedivate became a de facto british protectorate under nominal ottoman sovereignty . </s> in 1899 the anglo-egyptian condominium agreement wa signed : the agreement stated that sudan would be jointly governed by the khedivate of egypt and the united kingdom . however , actual control of sudan wa in british hand only . </s> in 1906 , the denshawai incident prompted many neutral egyptian to join the nationalist movement . </s> <section_title_start> sultanate of egypt ( 19141922 ) <section_title_end> </s> in 1914 the ottoman empire entered world war i in alliance with the central empire ; khedive abbas ii of egypt ( who had grown increasingly hostile to the british in preceding year ) decided to support the motherland in war . following such decision , the british forcibly removed him from power and replaced him with his brother hussein kamel of egypt . </s> hussein kamel declared egypt 's independence from the ottoman empire , assuming the title of sultanate of egypt . shortly following independence , egypt wa declared a protectorate of the united kingdom . </s> after world war i , saad zaghlul and the wafd party led the egyptian nationalist movement to a majority at the local legislative assembly . when the british exiled zaghlul and his associate to malta on 8 march 1919 , the country arose in it egyptian revolution of 1919 . the revolt led the united kingdom coalition government ( 19161922 ) to issue a unilateral declaration of egyptian independence unilateral declaration of egypt 's independence on 22 february 1922. </s> <section_title_start> kingdom of egypt ( 19221953 ) <section_title_end> </s> following independence from the united kingdom , sultan fuad i of egypt assumed the title of kingdom of egypt ; despite being nominally independent , the kingdom wa still under british military occupation and the uk still had great influence over the state . </s> the kingdom of egypt drafted and implemented a 1923 constitution of egypt in 1923 based on a parliamentary system system . the nationalist wafd party won a landslide victory in the 192324 egyptian parliamentary election 19231924 election and saad zaghloul wa appointed a the new prime minister . </s> in 1936 , the anglo-egyptian treaty of 1936 anglo-egyptian treaty wa concluded and british troop withdrew from egypt , except for the suez canal . the treaty did not resolve the question of anglo-egyptian sudan , which , under the term of the existing anglo-egyptian condominium agreement of 1899 , stated that sudan should be jointly governed by egypt and britain , but with real power remaining in british hand . </s> britain used egypt a a base for allied operation throughout the region , especially the battle in north africa against italy and germany . it highest priority were control of the eastern mediterranean , and especially keeping the suez canal open for merchant ship and for military connection with india and australia . the government of egypt , and the egyptian population , played a minor role in the second world war . when the war began in september 1939 , egypt declared martial law and broke off diplomatic relation with germany . it did not declare war on germany , but the prime minister associated egypt with the british war effort . it broke diplomatic relation with italy in 1940 , but never declared war , even when the italian army invaded egypt . king farouk took practically a neutral position , which accorded with elite opinion among the egyptian . the egyptian army did no fighting . it wa apathetic about the war , with the leading officer looking on the british a occupier and sometimes holding some private sympathy with the axis . in june 1940 the king dismissed prime minister aly maher , who got on poorly with the british . a new coalition government wa formed with the independent hassan pasha sabri a prime minister . </s> following a ministerial crisis in february 1942 , the ambassador sir mile lampson , 1st baron killearn , pressed farouk to have a wafd party or wafd-coalition government replace hussein sirri pasha 's government . on the night of 4 february 1942 , abdeen palace incident of 1942 . farouk capitulated , and nahhas formed a government shortly thereafter . however , the humiliation meted out to farouk , and the action of the wafd in cooperating with the british and taking power , lost support for both the british and the wafd among both civilian and , more importantly , the military of egypt . </s> most british troop were withdrawn to the suez canal area in 1947 ( although the british army maintained a military base in the area ) , but nationalist , anti-british feeling continued to grow after the war . anti-monarchy sentiment further increased following the disastrous performance of the kingdom in the first arab-israeli war . the 1950 election saw a landslide victory of the nationalist wafd party and the king wa forced to appoint mostafa el-nahas a new prime minister . in 1951 egypt unilaterally withdrew from the anglo-egyptian treaty of 1936 anglo-egyptian treaty of 1936 and ordered all remaining british troop to leave the suez canal . </s> a the british refused to leave their base around the suez canal , the egyptian government cut off the water and refused to allow food into the suez canal base , announced a boycott of british good , forbade egyptian worker from entering the base and sponsored guerrilla attack , turning the area around the suez canal into a low level war zone . on 24 january 1952 , egyptian guerrilla staged a fierce attack on the british force around the suez canal , during which the egyptian auxiliary police were observed helping the guerrilla . in response , on 25 january , general george erskine sent out british tank and infantry to surround the auxiliary police station in ismailia and gave the policeman an hour to surrender their arm on the ground the police were arming the guerrilla . the police commander called the interior minister , fouad serageddin , nahas 's right-hand man , who wa smoking cigar in his bath at the time , to ask if he should surrender or fight . serageddin ordered the police to fight `` to the last man and the last bullet `` . the resulting battle saw the police station levelled and 43 egyptian policeman killed together with 3 british soldier . the ismailia incident outraged egypt . the next day , 26 january 1952 wa cairo fire `` black saturday `` , a the anti-british riot wa known , that saw much of downtown cairo which the khedive ismail the magnificent had rebuilt in the style of paris , burned down . farouk blamed the wafd for the black saturday riot , and dismissed nahas a prime minister the next day . he wa replaced by aly maher pasha . </s> on july 2223 , 1952 , the free officer movement ( egypt ) , led by muhammad naguib and gamal abdel nasser , launched a coup d'tat ( egyptian revolution of 1952 ) against the king . farouk i abdicated the throne to his son fuad ii of egypt , who wa , at the time , a seven month old baby . the royal family left egypt some day later and the council of regency , led by prince muhammad abdel moneim wa formed , the council , however , held only nominal authority and the real power wa actually in the hand of the egyptian revolutionary command council , led by naguib and nasser . </s> popular expectation for immediate reform led to the worker ' riot in kafr dawar on 12 august 1952 , which resulted in two death sentence . following a brief experiment with civilian rule , the free officer abrogated the monarchy and the 1923 constitution and declared egypt a republic on 18 june 1953 . naguib wa proclaimed a president , while nasser wa appointed a the new prime minister . </s> <section_title_start> republic of egypt ( 19531958 ) <section_title_end> </s> following the egyptian revolution of 1952 by the free officer movement ( egypt ) , the rule of egypt passed to military hand and all political party were banned . on 18 june 1953 , the egyptian republic wa declared , with general muhammad naguib a the first president of the republic , serving in that capacity for a little under one and a half year . </s> <section_title_start> president nasser ( 19561970 ) <section_title_end> </s> naguib wa forced to resign in 1954 by gamal abdel nassera pan-arabist and the real architect of the 1952 movementand wa later put under [ arrest ] . after naguib 's resignation , the position of president wa vacant until the election of gamal abdel nasser in 1956. </s> in october 1954 egypt and the united kingdom agreed to abolish the anglo-egyptian sudan anglo-egyptian condominium agreement of 1899 and grant sudan independence ; the agreement came into force on 1 january 1956. </s> nasser assumed political power a president in june 1956 . british force completed their withdrawal from the occupied suez canal zone on 13 june 1956 . he nationalised the suez canal on 26 july 1956 ; his hostile approach towards israel and economic nationalism prompted the beginning of the second arab-israeli war ( suez crisis ) , in which israel ( with support from france and the united kingdom ) occupied the sinai peninsula and the canal . the war came to an end because of u and ussr diplomatic intervention and the status quo wa restored . </s> <section_title_start> united arab republic ( 19581971 ) <section_title_end> </s> in 1958 , egypt and syria formed a sovereign union known a the united arab republic . the union wa short-lived , ending in 1961 when syria seceded , thus ending the union . during most of it existence , the united arab republic wa also in a loose confederation with mutawakkilite kingdom of yemen ( or the mutawakkilite kingdom of yemen ) , known a the united arab state . in 1959 , the all-palestine government of the gaza strip , an egyptian client state , wa absorbed into the united arab republic under the pretext of arab union , and wa never restored . the arab socialist union ( egypt ) , a new nasserist state-party wa founded in 1962. </s> in the early 1960s , egypt became fully involved in the north yemen civil war . the egyptian president , gamal abdel nasser , supported the yemeni republican with a many a 70,000 egyptian troop and chemical weapon . despite several military move and peace conference , the war sank into a stalemate . egyptian commitment in yemen wa greatly undermined later . </s> in mid may 1967 , the soviet union issued warning to gamal abdel nasser of an impending israeli attack on syria . although the chief of staff mohamed fawzi ( general ) verified them a `` baseless `` , nasser took three successive step that made the war virtually inevitable : on 14 may he deployed his troop in sinai near the border with israel , on 19 may he expelled the un peacekeeper stationed in the sinai peninsula border with israel , and on 23 may he closed the strait of tiran to israeli shipping . on 26 may gamal abdel nasser declared , `` the battle will be a general one and our basic objective will be to destroy israel `` . </s> israel re-iterated that the strait of tiran closure wa a casus belli . this prompted the beginning of the third arab-israeli war ( six-day war ) in which israel attacked egypt , and occupied sinai peninsula and the gaza strip , which egypt had occupation of the gaza strip by egypt since the 1948 arabisraeli war . during the 1967 war , an emergency law in egypt wa enacted , and remained in effect until 2012 , with the exception of an 18-month break in 1980/81 . under this law , police power were extended , constitutional right suspended and censorship legalised . </s> at the time of the fall of the egyptian monarchy in the early 1950s , le than half a million egyptian were considered upper class and rich , four million middle class and 17 million lower class and poor . fewer than half of all primary-school-age child attended school , most of them being boy . nasser 's policy changed this . land reform and distribution , the dramatic growth in university education , and government support to national industry greatly improved social mobility and flattened the social curve . from academic year 195354 through 196566 , overall public school enrolment more than doubled . million of previously poor egyptian , through education and job in the public sector , joined the middle class . doctor , engineer , teacher , lawyer , journalist , constituted the bulk of the swelling middle class in egypt under nasser . during the 1960s , the egyptian economy went from sluggish to the verge of collapse , the society became le free , and nasser 's appeal waned considerably . </s> <section_title_start> arab republic of egypt ( 1971present ) <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> president sadat ( 19701981 ) <section_title_end> </s> in 1970 , president nasser died of a heart attack and wa succeeded by anwar sadat . sadat switched egypt 's cold war allegiance from the soviet union to the united state , expelling soviet advisor in 1972 . he launched the infitah economic reform policy , while clamping down on religious and secular opposition . in 1973 , egypt , along with syria , launched the fourth arab-israeli war ( yom kippur war ) , a surprise attack to regain part of the sinai territory israel had captured 6 year earlier . it presented sadat with a victory that allowed him to regain the sinai later in return for peace with israel . </s> in 1975 , sadat shifted nasser 's economic policy and sought to use his popularity to reduce government regulation and encourage foreign investment through his program of infitah . through this policy , incentive such a reduced tax and import tariff attracted some investor , but investment were mainly directed at low risk and profitable venture like tourism and construction , abandoning egypt 's infant industry . even though sadat 's policy wa intended to modernise egypt and assist the middle class , it mainly benefited the higher class , and , because of the elimination of subsidy on basic foodstuff , led to the 1977 egyptian bread riot . </s> in 1977 , sadat dissolved the arab socialist union and replaced it with the national democratic party ( egypt ) . </s> sadat made a historic visit to israel in 1977 , which led to the 1979 egyptisrael peace treaty in exchange for israeli withdrawal from sinai . sadat 's initiative sparked enormous controversy in the arab world and led to egypt 's expulsion from the arab league , but it wa supported by most egyptian . assassination of anwar sadat by an islamic extremist in october 1981. </s> <section_title_start> president mubarak ( 19812011 ) <section_title_end> </s> hosni mubarak came to power after the assassination of sadat in a referendum in which he wa the only candidate . </s> hosni mubarak reaffirmed egypt 's relationship with israel yet eased the tension with egypt 's arab neighbour . domestically , mubarak faced serious problem . even though farm and industry output expanded , the economy could not keep pace with the population boom . mass poverty and unemployment led rural family to stream into city like cairo where they ended up in crowded slum , barely managing to survive . </s> on 1986 egyptian conscript riot security police started rioting , protesting against report that their term of duty wa to be extended from 3 to 4 year . hotel , nightclub , restaurant and casino were attacked in cairo and there were riot in other city . a day time curfew wa imposed . it took the army 3 day to restore order . 107 people were killed . </s> in the 1980s , 1990s , and 2000s , terrorist attack in egypt became numerous and severe , and began to target christian copt , foreign tourist and government official . in the 1990s an islamist group , al-gama ' a al-islamiyya , engaged in an extended campaign of violence , from the murder and attempted murder of prominent writer and intellectual , to the repeated targeting of tourist and foreigner . serious damage wa done to the largest sector of egypt 's economytourismand in turn to the government , but it also devastated the livelihood of many of the people on whom the group depended for support . </s> during mubarak 's reign , the political scene wa dominated by the national democratic party ( egypt ) , which wa created by sadat in 1978 . it passed the 1993 syndicate law , 1995 press law , and 1999 nongovernmental association law which hampered freedom of association and expression by imposing new regulation and draconian penalty on violation . a a result , by the late 1990s parliamentary politics had become virtually irrelevant and alternative avenue for political expression were curtailed a well . </s> on 17 november 1997 , luxor massacre 62 people , mostly tourist , were massacred near luxor . </s> in late february 2005 , mubarak announced a reform of the presidential election law , paving the way for multi-candidate poll for the first time since the free officer movement ( egypt ) . however , the new law placed restriction on the candidate , and led to mubarak 's easy re-election victory . voter turnout wa le than 25 % . election observer also alleged government interference in the election process . after the election , mubarak imprisoned ayman nour , the runner-up . </s> human right watch 's 2006 report on egypt detailed serious human right violation , including routine torture , arbitrary detention and trial before military and state security court . in 2007 , amnesty international released a report alleging that egypt had become an international centre for torture , where other nation send suspect for interrogation , often a part of the war on terror . egypt 's foreign ministry quickly issued a rebuttal to this report . </s> constitutional change voted on 19 march 2007 prohibited party from using religion a a basis for political activity , allowed the drafting of a new anti-terrorism law , authorised broad police power of arrest and surveillance , and gave the president power to dissolve parliament and end judicial election monitoring . in 2009 , dr. ali el deen hilal dessouki , medium secretary of the national democratic party ( national democratic party ( egypt ) ) , described egypt a a `` pharaonic `` political system , and democracy a a `` long-term goal `` . dessouki also stated that `` the real center of power in egypt is the military `` . </s> <section_title_start> revolution ( 2011 ) <section_title_end> </s> on 25 january 2011 , egyptian revolution of 2011 began against mubarak 's government . on 11 february 2011 , mubarak resigned and fled cairo . jubilant celebration broke out in cairo 's tahrir square at the news . the egyptian military then assumed the power to govern . mohamed hussein tantawi , chairman of the supreme council of the armed force , became the de facto interim [ of state ] . on 13 february 2011 , the military dissolved the parliament and suspended the constitution . </s> a egyptian constitutional referendum , 2011 wa held on 19 march 2011 . on 28 november 2011 , egypt held it 201112 egyptian parliamentary election since the previous regime had been in power . turnout wa high and there were no report of major irregularity or violence . </s> <section_title_start> president morsi ( 20122013 ) <section_title_end> </s> mohamed morsi wa egyptian presidential election , 2012 on 24 june 2012 . on 2 august 2012 , egypt 's prime minister hisham qandil announced his 35-member cabinet comprising 28 newcomer , including four from the muslim brotherhood . </s> liberal and secular group walked out of the constituent assembly of egypt because they believed that it would impose strict islamic practice , while muslim brotherhood backer threw their support behind morsi . on 22 november 2012 , president morsi issued a temporary declaration immunising his decree from challenge and seeking to protect the work of the constituent assembly . </s> the move led to massive protest and violent action throughout egypt . on 5 december 2012 , ten of thousand of supporter and opponent of president morsi clashed , in what wa described a the largest violent battle between islamist and their foe since the country 's revolution . mohamed morsi offered a `` national dialogue `` with opposition leader but refused to cancel the egyptian constitutional referendum , 2012. </s> <section_title_start> political crisis ( 2013 ) <section_title_end> </s> on 3 july 2013 , june 2013 egyptian protest with autocratic excess of morsi 's muslim brotherhood government , the military 2013 egyptian coup d'tat morsi from office , dissolved the shura council and installed a temporary interim government . </s> on 4 july 2013 , 68-year-old chief justice of the supreme constitutional court of egypt adly mansour wa sworn in a acting president over the new government following the removal of morsi . the new egyptian authority cracked down on the muslim brotherhood and it supporter , jailing thousand and forcefully dispersing pro-morsi and/or pro-brotherhood protest . many of the muslim brotherhood leader and activist have either been sentenced to death or life imprisonment in a series of mass trial . </s> on 18 january 2014 , the interim government instituted a egyptian constitution of 2014 following a referendum approved by an overwhelming majority of voter ( 98.1 % ) . 38.6 % of registered voter participated in the referendum a higher number than the 33 % who voted in a referendum during morsi 's tenure . </s> <section_title_start> president el-sisi ( 2014present ) <section_title_end> </s> on 26 march 2014 , field marshal abdel fattah el-sisi , egyptian defence minister and commander-in-chief egyptian armed force , retired from the military , announcing he would stand a a candidate in the egyptian presidential election , 2014 . the poll , held between 26 and 28 may 2014 , resulted in a landslide victory for el-sisi . sisi wa sworn into office a president of egypt on 8 june 2014 . the muslim brotherhood and some liberal and secular activist group boycotted the vote . even though the interim authority extended voting to a third day , the 46 % turnout wa lower than the 52 % turnout in the 2012 election . </s> a new parliamentary election wa held in december 2015 , resulting in a landslide victory for pro-sisi party , which secured a strong majority in the newly formed house of representative ( egypt ) . </s> in 2016 , egypt entered in a diplomatic crisis with italy following the murder of giulio regeni : in april 2016 , prime minister matteo renzi recalled the italian ambassador from cairo because of lack of co-operation from the egyptian government in the investigation . the ambassador wa sent back to egypt in 2017 by the new prime minister paolo gentiloni . </s> el-sisi wa 2018 egyptian presidential election re-elected in 2018 , facing no serious opposition . in 2019 , a series of constitutional amendment were approved by the parliament , further increasing the president 's and the military 's power , increasing presidential term from 4 year to 6 year and allowing el-sisi to run for other two mandate . the proposal 2019 egyptian constitutional referendum . </s> the dispute between egypt and ethiopia over the grand ethiopian renaissance dam escalated in 2020 . egypt see the dam a an existential threat , fearing that the dam will reduce the amount of water it receives from the nile . </s> <section_title_start> geography <section_title_end> </s> egypt lie primarily between latitude 22nd parallel north 22 and 32nd parallel north 32n , and longitude 25th meridian east 25 and 35th meridian east 35e . at , it is the world 's 30th-largest country . due to the extreme aridity of egypt 's climate , population centre are concentrated along the narrow nile valley and delta , meaning that about 99 % of the population us about 5.5 % of the total land area . 98 % of egyptian live on 3 % of the territory . </s> egypt is bordered by libya to the west , the sudan to the south , and the gaza strip and israel to the east . egypt 's important role in geopolitics stem from it strategic position : a transcontinental nation , it posse a land bridge ( the isthmus of suez ) between africa and asia , traversed by a navigable waterway ( the suez canal ) that connects the mediterranean sea with the indian ocean by way of the red sea . </s> apart from the nile valley , the majority of egypt 's landscape is desert , with a few oasis scattered about . wind create prolific dune that peak at more than high . egypt includes part of the sahara desert and of the libyan desert . these desert protected the kingdom of the pharaoh from western threat and were referred to a the `` red land `` in ancient egypt . </s> town and city include alexandria , the second largest city ; aswan ; asyut ; cairo , the modern egyptian capital and largest city ; el mahalla el kubra ; giza , the site of the pyramid of khufu ; hurghada ; luxor ; kom ombo ; port safaga ; port said ; sharm el sheikh ; suez , where the south end of the suez canal is located ; zagazig ; and minya , egypt . oasis include bahariya oasis , dakhla oasis , farafra , egypt , kharga oasis and siwa oasis . protectorate include ra mohamed national park , zaranik protectorate and siwa . </s> on 13 march 2015 , plan for a proposed new capital of egypt were announced . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> most of egypt 's rain fall in the winter month . south of cairo , rainfall average only around per year and at interval of many year . on a very thin strip of the northern coast the rainfall can be a high a , mostly between october and march . snow fall on sinai 's mountain and some of the north coastal city such a damietta , baltim and sidi barrani , and rarely in alexandria . a very small amount of snow fell on cairo on 13 december 2013 , the first time in many decade . frost is also known in mid-sinai and mid-egypt . egypt is the driest and the sunniest country in the world , and most of it land surface is desert . </s> egypt ha an unusually hot , sunny and dry climate . average high temperature are high in the north but very to extremely high in the rest of the country during summer . the cooler mediterranean wind consistently blow over the northern sea coast , which help to get more moderated temperature , especially at the height of the summertime . the khamaseen is a hot , dry wind that originates from the vast desert in the south and blow in the spring or in the early summer . it brings scorching sand and dust particle , and usually brings daytime temperature over and sometimes over in the interior , while the relative humidity can drop to 5 % or even le . the absolute highest temperature in egypt occur when the khamaseen blow . the weather is always sunny and clear in egypt , especially in city such a aswan , luxor and asyut . it is one of the least cloudy and least rainy region on earth . </s> prior to the construction of the aswan dam , the nile flooded annually ( colloquially the gift of the nile ) replenishing egypt 's soil . this gave egypt a consistent harvest throughout the year . </s> the potential rise in sea level due to global warming could threaten egypt 's densely populated coastal strip and have grave consequence for the country 's economy , agriculture and industry . combined with growing demographic pressure , a significant rise in sea level could turn million of egyptian into environmental refugee by the end of the 21st century , according to some climate expert . </s> <section_title_start> biodiversity <section_title_end> </s> egypt signed the rio convention on biological diversity on 9 june 1992 , and became a party to the convention on 2 june 1994 . it ha subsequently produced a biodiversity action plan , which wa received by the convention on 31 july 1998 . where many center for biological diversity biodiversity action plan neglect biological kingdom apart from animal and plant , egypt 's plan wa unusual in providing balanced information about all form of life . </s> the plan stated that the following number of specie of different group had been recorded from egypt : algae ( 1483 specie ) , animal ( about 15,000 specie of which more than 10,000 were insect ) , fungi ( more than 627 specie ) , monera ( 319 specie ) , plant ( 2426 specie ) , protozoan ( 371 specie ) . for some major group , for example lichen-forming fungi and nematode worm , the number wa not known . apart from small and well-studied group like amphibian , bird , fish , mammal and reptile , the many of those number are likely to increase a further specie are recorded from egypt . for the fungi , including lichen-forming specie , for example , subsequent work ha shown that over 2200 specie have been recorded from egypt , and the final figure of all fungi actually occurring in the country is expected to be much higher . for the grass , 284 native and naturalised specie have been identified and recorded in egypt . </s> <section_title_start> government <section_title_end> </s> the house of representative ( egypt ) , whose member are elected to serve five-year term , specialises in legislation . election in egypt were last held between 201112 egyptian parliamentary election which wa later dissolved . egyptian parliamentary election , 2015 wa announced to be held within 6 month of the constitution 's ratification on 18 january 2014 , and were held in two phase , from 17 october to 2 december 2015 . originally , the parliament wa to be formed before the president wa elected , but interim president adly mansour pushed the date . the egyptian presidential election , 2014 , took place on 2628 may 2014 . official figure showed a turnout of 25,578,233 or 47.5 % , with abdel fattah el-sisi winning with 23.78 million vote , or 96.9 % compared to 757,511 ( 3.1 % ) for hamdeen sabahi . </s> after a wave of public discontent with autocratic excess of the muslim brotherhood government of president mohamed morsi , on 3 july 2013 then-egyptian army rank abdel fattah el-sisi announced the removal of morsi from office and the suspension of the egyptian constitution of 2012 . a 50-member constitution committee wa formed for modifying egyptian constitution of 2014 which wa later published for egyptian constitutional referendum , 2014 and wa adopted on 18 january 2014. </s> in 2013 , freedom house rated political right in egypt at 5 ( with 1 representing the most free and 7 the least ) , and civil liberty at 5 , which gave it the freedom rating of `` partly free `` . </s> egyptian nationalism predates it arab counterpart by many decade , having root in the 19th century and becoming the dominant mode of expression of egyptian anti-colonial activist and intellectual until the early 20th century . the ideology espoused by islamism such a the muslim brotherhood is mostly supported by the lower-middle stratum of egyptian society . </s> egypt ha the oldest continuous parliamentary tradition in the arab world . the first popular assembly wa established in 1866 . it wa disbanded a a result of the british occupation of 1882 , and the british allowed only a consultative body to sit . in 1923 , however , after the country 's independence wa declared , a new constitution provided for a parliamentary monarchy . </s> <section_title_start> military and foreign relation <section_title_end> </s> the military is influential in the political and economic life of egypt and exempts itself from law that apply to other sector . it enjoys considerable power , prestige and independence within the state and ha been widely considered part of the egyptian `` state within a state `` . </s> according to the former chair of israel 's knesset foreign affair and defense committee , yuval steinitz , the egyptian air force ha roughly the same number of modern warplane a the israeli air force and far more western tank , artillery , anti-aircraft battery and warship than the israel defense force . egypt is speculated by israel to be the second country in the region with a spy satellite , egyptsat 1 in addition to egyptsat 2 launched on 16 april 2014. </s> the egyptunited state relation provides egypt with annual united state foreign military financing , which in 2015 amounted to u $ 1.3 billion . in 1989 , egypt wa designated a a major non-nato ally of the united state . nevertheless , tie between the two country have partially soured since the 2013 egyptian coup d'tat of islamist president mohamed morsi , with the obama administration denouncing egypt over it crackdown on the muslim brotherhood , and cancelling future military exercise involving the two country . there have been recent attempt , however , to normalise relation between the two , with both government frequently calling for mutual support in the war on terror . however , following 2016 united state presidential election of republican party ( united state ) donald trump a the president of the united state , the two country were looking to improve the egypt-united state relation egyptian-american relation . al-sisi and trump had met during the opening of the seventy-first session of the united nation general assembly in september 2016 . the absence of egypt in president trump 's executive order 13769 towards seven muslim country wa noted in washington although the congress ha voiced human right concern over the handling of dissident . on 3 april 2017 al-sisi met with trump at the white house , marking the first visit of an egyptian president to washington in 8 year . trump praised al-sisi in what wa reported a a public relation victory for the egyptian president , and signaled it wa time for a normalization of the relation between egypt and the u . </s> the egyptian military ha dozen of factory manufacturing weapon a well a consumer good . the armed force ' inventory includes equipment from different country around the world . equipment from the former soviet union is being progressively replaced by more modern u , french , and british equipment , a significant portion of which is built under license in egypt , such a the m1 abrams tank . relation with egyptrussia relation have improved significantly following mohamed morsi 's removal and both country have worked since then to strengthen military and trade tie among other aspect of bilateral co-operation . chinaegypt relation have also improved considerably . in 2014 , egypt and china established a bilateral `` comprehensive strategic partnership `` . in july 2019 , un ambassador of 37 country , including egypt , have signed a joint letter to the unhrc defending china 's xinjiang re-education camp in the xinjiang region . </s> the permanent [ of the arab league headquarters ] of the arab league are located in cairo and the body 's secretary general ha traditionally been egyptian . this position is currently held by former foreign minister ahmed aboul gheit . the arab league briefly moved from egypt to tunis in 1978 to protest the egyptisrael peace treaty , but it later returned to cairo in 1989 . gulf monarchy , including the egyptunited arab emirate relation and egyptsaudi arabia relation , have pledged billion of dollar to help egypt overcome it economic difficulty since the overthrow of morsi . </s> following the yom kippur war and the subsequent peace treaty , egypt became the first arab nation to establish egyptisrael relation with israel . despite that , israel is still widely considered a a hostile state by the majority of egyptian . egypt ha played a historical role a a mediator in resolving various dispute in the middle east , most notably it handling of the israelipalestinian conflict and the israelipalestinian peace process . egypt 's ceasefire and truce brokering effort in gazaisrael conflict have hardly been challenged following israel 's evacuation of it settlement from the strip in 2005 , despite increasing animosity towards the hamas government in gaza following the ouster of mohamed morsi , and despite recent attempt by country like turkey and qatar to take over this role . </s> tie between egypt and other non-arab middle eastern nation , including egyptiran relation and egyptturkey relation , have often been strained . tension with iran are mostly due to egypt 's peace treaty with israel and iran 's rivalry with traditional egyptian ally in the gulf . turkey 's recent support for the now-banned muslim brotherhood in egypt and it alleged involvement in libyan civil war ( 2014present ) also made both country bitter regional rival . </s> egypt is a founding member of the non-aligned movement and the united nation . it is also a member of the organisation internationale de la francophonie , since 1983 . former egyptian deputy prime minister boutros boutros-ghali served a secretary-general of the united nation from 1991 to 1996. </s> in 2008 , egypt wa estimated to have two million african refugee , including over 20,000 sudanese national registered with unhcr a refugee fleeing armed conflict or asylum seeker . egypt adopted `` harsh , sometimes lethal `` method of border control . </s> <section_title_start> law <section_title_end> </s> the legal system is based on sharia law and civil law ( particularly napoleonic code ) ; and judicial review by a supreme court , which accepts compulsory international court of justice jurisdiction only with reservation . </s> islamic jurisprudence is the principal source of legislation . sharia court and qadi are run and licensed by the ministry of justice ( egypt ) . the personal status law that regulates matter such a marriage , divorce and child custody is governed by sharia . in a family court , a woman 's testimony is worth half of a man 's testimony . </s> on 26 december 2012 , the muslim brotherhood attempted to institutionalise a controversial new constitution . it wa approved by the public in a egyptian constitutional referendum , 2012 held 1522 december 2012 with 64 % support , but with only 33 % electorate participation . it replaced the 2011 provisional constitution of egypt , adopted following the revolution . </s> the penal code wa unique a it contains a `` blasphemy law in egypt . `` the present court system allows a death penalty including against an absent individual tried in absentia . several american and canadian were sentenced to death in 2012. </s> on 18 january 2014 , the interim government successfully institutionalised a more egyptian constitution of 2014 . the president is elected to a four-year term and may serve 2 term . the parliament may impeach the president . under the constitution , there is a guarantee of gender equality and absolute freedom of religion . the military retains the ability to appoint the national minister of defence for the next two full presidential term since the constitution took effect . under the constitution , political party may not be based on `` religion , race , gender or geography `` . </s> <section_title_start> human right <section_title_end> </s> the egyptian organization for human right is one of the longest-standing body for the defence of [ right in egypt ] . in 2003 , the government established the national council for human right . shortly after it foundation , the council came under heavy criticism by local activist , who contend it wa a propaganda tool for the government to excuse it own violation and to give legitimacy to repressive law such a the emergency law . </s> the pew forum on religion & public life rank egypt a the fifth worst country in the world for religious freedom . the united state commission on international religious freedom , a bipartisan independent agency of the u government , ha placed egypt on it watch list of country that require close monitoring due to the nature and extent of violation of religious freedom engaged in or tolerated by the government . according to a 2010 pew research center global attitude survey , 84 % of egyptian polled supported the capital punishment for those who apostasy in islam ; 77 % supported whipping and cutting off of hand for theft and robbery ; and 82 % support stoning a person who commits adultery . </s> coptic christian face discrimination at multiple level of the government , ranging from underrepresentation in government ministry to law that limit their ability to build or repair church . intolerance towards follower of the bah faith , and those of the non-orthodox muslim sect , such a sufism , shia islam shi ' a and ahmadiyya , also remains a problem . when the government moved to computerise identification card , member of religious minority , such a bahs , could not obtain egyptian identification card controversy . an egyptian court ruled in early 2008 that member of other faith may obtain identity card without listing their faith , and without becoming officially recognised . </s> clash continued between police and supporter of former president mohamed morsi . during violent clash that ensued a part of the august 2013 egyptian raid august 2013 sit-in dispersal , 595 protester were killed with 14 august 2013 becoming the single deadliest day in egypt 's modern history . </s> egypt actively practice capital punishment . egypt 's authority do not release figure on death sentence and execution , despite repeated request over the year by human right organisation . the united nation human right office and various ngo expressed `` deep alarm `` after an egyptian minya criminal court sentenced 529 people to death in a single hearing on 25 march 2014 . sentenced supporter of former president mohamed morsi were to be executed for their alleged role in violence following his 2013 egyptian coup d'tat in july 2013 . the judgement wa condemned a a violation of international law . by may 2014 , approximately 16,000 people ( and a high a more than 40,000 by one independent count , according to the economist ) , mostly brotherhood member or supporter , have been imprisoned after morsi 's removal after the muslim brotherhood wa labelled a terrorist organisation by the post-morsi interim egyptian government . according to human right group there are some 60,000 political prisoner in egypt . </s> after morsi wa ousted by the military , the judiciary system aligned itself with the new government , actively supporting the repression of muslim brotherhood member . this resulted in a sharp increase in mass death sentence that arose criticism from then-u.s. president barack obama and the general secretary of the un , ban ki moon . </s> lgbt right in egypt is illegal in egypt . according to a 2013 survey by the pew research center , 95 % of egyptian believe that [ should not be accepted by society . </s> in 2017 , cairo wa voted the most dangerous megacity for woman with more than 10 million inhabitant in a poll by thomson reuters foundation . sexual harassment wa described a occurring on a daily basis . </s> <section_title_start> freedom of the press <section_title_end> </s> reporter without border ranked egypt in their 2017 press freedom index at 160 out of 180 nation . at least 18 journalist were imprisoned in egypt , . a new anti-terror law wa enacted in august 2015 that threatens member of the medium with fine ranging from about u $ 25,000 to $ 60,000 for the distribution of wrong information on act of terror inside the country `` that differ from official declaration of the egyptian department of defense `` . </s> some critic of the government have been misinformation related to the covid-19 pandemic # effort to combat misinformation for allegedly spreading false information about the covid-19 pandemic in egypt . </s> <section_title_start> administrative division <section_title_end> </s> egypt is divided into 27 governorates . the governorates are further divided into region . the region contain town and village . each governorate ha a capital , sometimes carrying the same name a the governorate . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> { class= `` wikitable `` style= `` float : right ; margin-left : 10px `` </s> ! style= `` text-align : center ; background : # cfb ; `` colspan= `` 2 `` share of world gdp ( ppp ) </s> - </s> ! style= `` background : # cfb ; `` year </s> ! style= `` background : # cfb ; `` share </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 1980 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 0.69 % </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 1990 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 0.83 % </s> - </s> 2000 </s> style= `` text-align : right ; `` 0.86 % </s> - </s> 2010 </s> style= `` text-align : right ; `` 0.96 % </s> - </s> style= `` text-align : left ; `` 2017 style= `` text-align : right ; `` 0.95 % </s> } </s> egypt 's economy depends mainly on agriculture , medium , petroleum import , natural gas , and tourism ; there are also more than three million egyptian working abroad , mainly in libya , saudi arabia , the persian gulf and europe . the completion of the aswan high dam in 1970 and the resultant lake nasser have altered the time-honoured place of the nile river in the agriculture and ecology of egypt . a rapidly growing population , limited arable land , and dependence on the nile all continue to overtax resource and stress the economy . </s> the government ha invested in communication and physical infrastructure . egypt ha received united state foreign aid since 1979 ( an average of $ 2.2 billion per year ) and is the third-largest recipient of such fund from the united state following the iraq war . egypt 's economy mainly relies on these source of income : tourism , remittance from egyptian working abroad and revenue from the suez canal . </s> egypt ha a developed energy market based on coal , oil , natural gas , and hydropower . substantial coal deposit in the northeast sinai are mined at the rate of about per year . oil and gas are produced in the western desert region , the gulf of suez , and the nile delta . egypt ha huge reserve of gas , estimated at , and liquefied natural gas up to 2012 exported to many country . in 2013 , the egyptian general petroleum co ( egpc ) said the country will cut export of natural gas and tell major industry to slow output this summer to avoid an energy crisis and stave off political unrest , reuters ha reported . egypt is counting on top liquid natural gas ( lng ) exporter qatar to obtain additional gas volume in summer , while encouraging factory to plan their annual maintenance for those month of peak demand , said egpc chairman , tarek el barkatawy . egypt produce it own energy , but ha been a net oil importer since 2008 and is rapidly becoming a net importer of natural gas . </s> economic condition have started to improve considerably , after a period of stagnation , due to the adoption of more liberal economic policy by the government a well a increased revenue from tourism and a booming stock market . in it annual report , the international monetary fund ( imf ) ha rated egypt a one of the top country in the world undertaking economic reform . some major economic reform undertaken by the government since 2003 include a dramatic slashing of custom and tariff . a new tax law implemented in 2005 decreased corporate tax from 40 % to the current 20 % , resulting in a stated 100 % increase in tax revenue by the year 2006. </s> foreign direct investment ( fdi ) in egypt increased considerably before the removal of hosni mubarak , exceeding $ 6 billion in 2006 , due to liberal theory of economics and privatisation measure taken by minister of investment mahmoud mohieddin . since the fall of hosni mubarak in 2011 , egypt ha experienced a drastic fall in both foreign investment and tourism revenue , followed by a 60 % drop in foreign exchange reserve , a 3 % drop in growth , and a rapid devaluation of the egyptian pound . </s> although one of the main obstacle still facing the egyptian economy is the limited trickle down of wealth to the average population , many egyptian criticise their government for higher price of basic good while their standard of living or purchasing power remains relatively stagnant . corruption is often cited by egyptian a the main impediment to further economic growth . the government promised major reconstruction of the country 's infrastructure , using money paid for the newly acquired third mobile license ( $ 3 billion ) by emirate telecommunication corporation in 2006 . in the corruption perception index 2013 , egypt wa ranked 114 out of 177. </s> egypt 's most prominent multinational company are the orascom group and raya contact center . the information technology ( it ) sector ha expanded rapidly in the past few year , with many start-ups selling outsourcing service to north america and europe , operating with company such a microsoft , oracle and other major corporation , a well a many small and medium size enterprise . some of these company are the xceed contact center , raya , e group connection and c3 . the it sector ha been stimulated by new egyptian entrepreneur with government encouragement . </s> an estimated 2.7 million egyptian abroad contribute actively to the development of their country through remittance ( u $ 7.8 billion in 2009 ) , a well a circulation of human and social capital and investment . remittance , money earned by egyptian living abroad and sent home , reached a record u $ 21 billion in 2012 , according to the world bank . </s> egyptian society is moderately unequal in term of income distribution , with an estimated 3540 % of egypt 's population earning le than the equivalent of $ 2 a day , while only around 23 % may be considered wealthy . </s> <section_title_start> tourism <section_title_end> </s> tourism is one of the most important sector in egypt 's economy . more than 12.8 million tourist visited egypt in 2008 , providing revenue of nearly $ 11 billion . the tourism sector employ about 12 % of egypt 's workforce . tourism minister hisham zaazou told industry professional and reporter that tourism generated some $ 9.4 billion in 2012 , a slight increase over the $ 9 billion seen in 2011. </s> the giza necropolis is one of egypt 's best-known tourist attraction ; it is the only one of the seven wonder of the ancient world still in existence . </s> egypt 's beach on the mediterranean and the red sea , which extend to over , are also popular tourist destination ; the gulf of aqaba beach , safaga , sharm el-sheikh , hurghada , luxor , dahab , ra sidr and marsa alam are popular site . </s> <section_title_start> energy <section_title_end> </s> egypt produced 691,000 ; bbl/d of oil and 2,141.05 ; tcf of natural gas in 2013 , making the country the largest non-opec producer of oil and the second-largest dry natural gas producer in africa . in 2013 , egypt wa the largest consumer of oil and natural gas in africa , a more than 20 % of total oil consumption and more than 40 % of total dry natural gas consumption in africa . also , egypt posse the largest oil refinery capacity in africa 726,000 ; bbl/d ( in 2012 ) . </s> egypt is currently planning to build it first nuclear power plant in el dabaa , in the northern part of the country , with $ 25 billion in russian financing . </s> <section_title_start> transport <section_title_end> </s> transport in egypt is centred around cairo and largely follows the pattern of settlement along the nile . the main line of the nation 's railway network run from alexandria to aswan and is operated by egyptian national railway . the vehicle road network ha expanded rapidly to over , consisting of 28 line , 796 station , 1800 train covering the nile valley and nile delta , the mediterranean and red sea coast , the sinai , and the western oasis . </s> the cairo metro in egypt is the first of only two full-fledged metro system in africa and the arab world . it is considered one of the most important recent project in egypt which cost around 12 billion egyptian pound . the system consists of three operational line with a fourth line expected in the future . </s> egyptair , which is now the country 's flag carrier and largest airline , wa founded in 1932 by egyptian industrialist talaat harb , today owned by the egyptian government . the airline is based at cairo international airport , it main hub , operating scheduled passenger and freight service to more than 75 destination in the middle east , europe , africa , asia , and the america . the current egyptair fleet includes 80 aeroplane . </s> <section_title_start> suez canal <section_title_end> </s> the suez canal is an artificial sea-level waterway in egypt considered the most important centre of the maritime transport in the middle east , connecting the mediterranean sea and the red sea . opened in november 1869 after 10 year of construction work , it allows ship transport between europe and asia without navigation around africa . the northern terminus is port said and the southern terminus is port tawfiq at the city of suez . ismailia lie on it west bank , from the half-way point . </s> the canal is long , deep and wide . it consists of the northern access channel of , the canal itself of and the southern access channel of . the canal is a single lane with passing place in the ballah by-pass and the great bitter lake . it contains no lock ; seawater flow freely through the canal . in general , the canal north of the bitter lake flow north in winter and south in summer . the current south of the lake change with the tide at suez . </s> on 26 august 2014 a proposal wa made for opening a new suez canal . work on the new suez canal wa completed in july 2015 . the channel wa officially inaugurated with a ceremony attended by foreign leader and featuring military flyover on 6 august 2015 , in accordance with the budget laid out for the project . </s> <section_title_start> water supply and sanitation <section_title_end> </s> the piped water supply in egypt increased between 1990 and 2010 from 89 % to 100 % in urban area and from 39 % to 93 % in rural area despite rapid population growth . over that period , egypt achieved the elimination of open defecation in rural area and invested in infrastructure . access to an improved water source in egypt is now practically universal with a rate of 99 % . about one half of the population is connected to sanitary sewer . </s> partly because of low sanitation coverage about 17,000 child die each year because of diarrhoea . another challenge is low cost recovery due to water tariff that are among the lowest in the world . this in turn requires government subsidy even for operating cost , a situation that ha been aggravated by salary increase without tariff increase after the arab spring . poor operation of facility , such a water and wastewater treatment plant , a well a limited government accountability and transparency , are also issue . </s> <section_title_start> irrigated land and crop <section_title_end> </s> due to the absence of appreciable rainfall , egypt 's agriculture depends entirely on irrigation . the main source of irrigation water is the river nile of which the flow is controlled by the high dam at aswan . it release , on average , 55 cubic kilometre ( 45,000,000 acreft ) water per year , of which some 46 cubic kilometre ( 37,000,000 acreft ) are diverted into the irrigation canal . </s> in the nile valley and delta , almost 33,600 square kilometre ( 13,000 sq mi ) of land benefit from these irrigation water producing on average 1.8 crop per year . </s> <section_title_start> demographic <section_title_end> </s> egypt is the most populated country in the arab world and the third most populous on the african continent , with about 95 million inhabitant . it population grew rapidly from 1970 to 2010 due to history of medicine # modern medicine and increase in agricultural productivity enabled by the green revolution . egypt 's population wa estimated at 3 million when napoleon i of france invaded the country in 1798. </s> egypt 's people are highly urbanised , being concentrated along the nile ( notably cairo and alexandria ) , in the delta and near the suez canal . egyptian are divided demographically into those who live in the major urban centre and the fellah , or farmer , that reside in rural village . the total inhabited area constitutes only 77,041 km , putting the physiological density at over 1,200 people per km2 , similar to bangladesh . </s> while emigration wa restricted under nasser , thousand of egyptian professional were dispatched abroad in the context of the arab cold war . egyptian emigration wa liberalised in 1971 , under president sadat , reaching record number after the 1973 oil crisis . an estimated 2.7 million egyptian live abroad . approximately 70 % of egyptian migrant live in arab country ( 923,600 in saudi arabia , 332,600 in libya , 226,850 in jordan , 190,550 in kuwait with the rest elsewhere in the region ) and the remaining 30 % reside mostly in europe and north america ( 318,000 in the united state , 110,000 in canada and 90,000 in italy ) . the process of emigrating to non-arab state ha been ongoing since the 1950s . </s> <section_title_start> ethnic group <section_title_end> </s> ethnic egyptian are by far the largest ethnic group in the country , constituting 99.7 % of the total population . ethnic minority include the abaza people , turkish people , greek , bedouin arab tribe living in the eastern desert and the sinai peninsula , the berber language-speaking siwis ( berber people ) of the siwa oasis , and the nubian people community clustered along the nile . there are also tribal beja people community concentrated in the southeasternmost corner of the country , and a number of dom people clan mostly in the nile delta and faiyum who are progressively becoming assimilated a urbanisation increase . </s> some 5 million immigrant live in egypt , mostly sudanese , `` some of whom have lived in egypt for generation . `` smaller number of immigrant come from iraq , ethiopia , somalia , south sudan , and eritrea . </s> the office of the united nation high commissioner for refugee estimated that the total number of `` people of concern `` ( refugee , asylum seeker , and stateless people ) wa about 250,000 . in 2015 , the number of registered syrian refugee in egypt wa 117,000 , a decrease from the previous year . egyptian government claim that a half-million syrian refugee live in egypt are thought to be exaggerated . there are 28,000 registered sudanese refugee in egypt . </s> the once-vibrant and ancient greek in egypt and history of the jew in egypt have almost jewish exodus from arab land , with only a small number remaining in the country , but many egyptian jew visit on religious or other occasion and tourism . several important jewish archaeological and historical site are found in cairo , alexandria and other city . </s> <section_title_start> language <section_title_end> </s> the official language of the republic is modern standard arabic . the spoken language are : egyptian arabic ( 68 % ) , sa'idi arabic ( 29 % ) , bedawi arabic ( 1.6 % ) , sudanese arabic ( 0.6 % ) , domari language ( 0.3 % ) , nobiin language ( 0.3 % ) , beja language ( 0.1 % ) , siwi language and others . additionally , greek language , armenian language and italian language , and more recently , african language like amharic language and tigrinya language are the main language of immigrant . </s> the main foreign language taught in school , by order of popularity , are english language , french language , german language and italian language . </s> historically egyptian language wa spoken , of which the latest stage is coptic language . spoken coptic wa mostly extinct by the 17th century but may have survived in isolated pocket in upper egypt a late a the 19th century . it remains in use a the liturgical language of the coptic orthodox church of alexandria . it form a separate branch among the family of afroasiatic language . </s> <section_title_start> religion <section_title_end> </s> egypt ha the largest muslim population in the arab world , and the islam by country sixth world 's largest muslim population , and home for ( 5 % ) of the world 's muslim population . egypt also ha the christianity in the middle east in the middle east and north africa . </s> egypt is a predominantly sunni muslim country with islam a it state religion . the percentage of adherent of various religion is a controversial topic in egypt . an estimated 8590 % are identified a muslim , 1015 % a coptic christian , and 1 % a other christian denomination , although without a census the number can not be known . other estimate put the christian population a high a 1520 % . non-denominational muslim form roughly 12 % of the population . </s> egypt wa a christian country before the 7th century , and after islam arrived , the country wa gradually islamised into a majority-muslim country . it is not known when muslim reached a majority variously estimated from c. 1000 ce to a late a the 14th century . egypt emerged a a centre of politics and culture in the muslim world . under anwar sadat , islam became the official state religion and sharia the main source of law . it is estimated that 15 million egyptian follow sufism tariqah , with the sufi leadership asserting that the number are much greater a many egyptian sufi are not officially registered with a sufi order . at least 305 people were killed during a 2017 sinai mosque attack on a sufi mosque in sinai . </s> there is also a shi ' a minority . the jerusalem center for public affair estimate the shia population at 1 to 2.2 million and could measure a much a 3 million . the ahmadiyya population is estimated at le than 50,000 , whereas the salafi ( ultra-conservative sunni ) population is estimated at five to six million . cairo is famous for it numerous mosque minaret and ha been dubbed `` the city of 1,000 minaret `` . </s> of the christianity in egypt over 90 % belong to the native coptic orthodox church of alexandria , an oriental orthodox christian church . other native egyptian christian are adherent of the coptic catholic church , the evangelical church of egypt ( synod of the nile ) and various other protestantism denomination . non-native christian community are largely found in the urban region of cairo and alexandria , such a the syro-lebanese in egypt syro-lebanese , who belong to melkite greek catholic church , greek orthodox , and maronite catholic denomination . </s> ethnic greek also made up a large greek orthodox population in the past . likewise , armenian made up the then larger armenian orthodox and armenian catholic community . egypt also used to have a large roman catholicism in egypt community , largely made up of italian egyptian and maltese in egypt . these non-native community were much larger in egypt before the nasser regime and the nationalisation that took place . </s> egypt host the coptic orthodox church of alexandria . it wa founded back in the first century , considered to be the largest church in the country . </s> egypt is also the home of al-azhar university ( founded in 969 ce , began teaching in 975 ce ) , which is today the world 's `` most influential voice of establishment sunni islam `` and is , by some measure , the second-oldest continuously operating university in world . </s> egypt recognises only three religion : islam , christianity , and judaism . other faith and minority muslim sect practised by egyptian , such a the small bah faith and ahmadiyya community , are not recognised by the state and face persecution by the government , which label these group a threat to egypt 's national security . individual , particularly bahs and atheist , wishing to include their religion ( or lack thereof ) on their mandatory state issued identification card are denied this ability ( see egyptian identification card controversy ) , and are put in the position of either not obtaining required identification or lying about their faith . a 2008 court ruling allowed member of unrecognised faith to obtain identification and leave the religion field blank . </s> <section_title_start> largest city <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> culture <section_title_end> </s> egypt is a recognised cultural trend-setter of the arabic-speaking world . contemporary arabic and middle-eastern culture is heavily influenced by egyptian literature , music , film and television . egypt gained a regional leadership role during the 1950s and 1960s , giving a further enduring boost to the standing of egyptian culture in the arabic-speaking world . </s> egyptian identity evolved in the span of a long period of occupation to accommodate islam , christianity and judaism ; and a new language , arabic language , and it spoken descendant , egyptian arabic which is also based on many ancient egyptian word . </s> the work of early 19th century scholar rifa ' a al-tahtawi renewed interest in ancient egypt and exposed egyptian society to age of enlightenment principle . tahtawi co-founded with education reformer ali mubarak a native egyptology school that looked for inspiration to medieval egyptian scholar , such a suyuti and maqrizi , who themselves studied the history of ancient egypt , egyptian language and ancient egyptian architecture of egypt . </s> egypt 's renaissance peaked in the late 19th and early 20th century through the work of people like muhammad abduh , ahmed lutfi el-sayed , muhammad loutfi goumah , tawfiq el-hakim , louis awad , qasim amin , salama moussa , taha hussein and mahmoud mokhtar . they forged a liberalism path for egypt expressed a a commitment to personal freedom , secularism and faith in science to bring progress . </s> <section_title_start> art <section_title_end> </s> the egyptian were one of the first major civilisation to codify design element in art and ancient egyptian architecture . egyptian blue , also known a calcium copper silicate is a pigment used by egyptian for thousand of year . it is considered to be the first synthetic pigment . the wall painting done in the service of the pharaoh followed a rigid code of visual rule and meaning . egyptian civilisation is renowned for it colossal egyptian pyramid , egyptian temple and monumental tomb . </s> well-known example are the pyramid of djoser designed by ancient architect and engineer imhotep , the sphinx , and the temple of abu simbel . modern and contemporary egyptian art can be a diverse a any work in the world art scene , from the vernacular architecture of hassan fathy and ramses wissa wassef , to mahmoud mokhtar 's sculpture , to the distinctive coptic art of isaac fanous . the cairo opera house serf a the main performing art venue in the egyptian capital . </s> <section_title_start> literature <section_title_end> </s> egyptian literature trace it beginning to ancient egypt and is some of the earliest known literature . indeed , the egyptian were the first culture to develop literature a we know it today , that is , the book . it is an important cultural element in the life of egypt . egyptian novelist and poet were among the first to experiment with modern style of arabic literature , and the form they developed have been widely imitated throughout the arab world . the first modern egyptian novel zaynab ( novel ) by muhammad husayn haykal wa published in 1913 in the egyptian arabic . egyptian novelist naguib mahfouz wa the first arabic-language writer to win the nobel prize in literature . egyptian woman writer include nawal el saadawi , well known for her feminism activism , and alifa rifaat who also writes about woman and tradition . </s> vernacular poetry is perhaps the most popular literary genre among egyptian , represented by the work of ahmed fouad negm ( fagumi ) , salah jaheen and abdel rahman el-abnudi . </s> <section_title_start> medium <section_title_end> </s> medium of egypt are highly influential throughout the arab world , attributed to large audience and increasing freedom from government control . freedom of the medium is guaranteed in the constitution ; however , many law still restrict this right . </s> <section_title_start> cinema <section_title_end> </s> egyptian cinema became a regional force with the coming of sound . in 1936 , studio misr , financed by industrialist talaat pasha harb , emerged a the leading egyptian studio , a role the company retained for three decade . for over 100 year , more than 4000 film have been produced in egypt , three quarter of the total arab production . egypt is considered the leading country in the field of cinema in the arab world . actor from all over the arab world seek to appear in the egyptian cinema for the sake of fame . the cairo international film festival ha been rated a one of 11 festival with a top class rating worldwide by the international federation of film producer ' association . </s> <section_title_start> music <section_title_end> </s> music of egypt is a rich mixture of indigenous , mediterranean , african and western element . it ha been an integral part of culture of egypt since antiquity . the ancient egyptian credited one of their god hathor with the invention of music , which osiris in turn used a part of his effort to civilise the world . egyptian used music instrument since then . </s> contemporary egyptian music trace it beginning to the creative work of people such a abdu al-hamuli , almaz and mahmoud osman , who influenced the later work of sayed darwish , umm kulthum , mohammed abdel wahab and abdel halim hafez whose age is considered the golden age of music in egypt and the whole arab world . prominent contemporary egyptian pop singer include amr diab and mohamed mounir . </s> <section_title_start> dance <section_title_end> </s> today , egypt is often considered the home of belly dance . egyptian belly dance ha two main style raqs baladi and raqs sharqi . there are also numerous folkloric and character dance that may be part of an egyptian-style belly dancer 's repertoire , a well a the modern shaabi street dance which share some element with raqs baladi . </s> <section_title_start> museum <section_title_end> </s> egypt ha one of the oldest civilisation in the world . it ha been in contact with many other civilisation and nation and ha been through so many era , starting from prehistoric age to the modern age , passing through so many age such a ; pharonic , roman , greek , islamic and many other age . because of this wide variation of age , the continuous contact with other nation and list of conflict in egypt egypt had been through , at least 60 museum may be found in egypt , mainly covering a wide area of these age and conflict . </s> the three main museum in egypt are the egyptian museum which ha more than 120,000 item , the egyptian national military museum and the 6th of october panorama . </s> the grand egyptian museum ( gem ) , also known a the giza museum , is an under construction museum that will house the largest collection of ancient egyptian artifact in the world , it ha been described a the world 's largest archaeological museum . the museum wa scheduled to open in 2015 and will be sited on of land approximately from the giza necropolis and is part of a new master plan for the plateau . the minister of antiquity mamdouh al-damaty announced in may 2015 that the museum will be partially opened in may 2018. </s> <section_title_start> festival <section_title_end> </s> egypt celebrates many festival and religious carnival , also known a mulid . they are usually associated with a particular coptic or sufi saint , but are often celebrated by egyptian irrespective of creed or religion . ramadan ha a special flavour in egypt , celebrated with sound , light ( local lantern known a fawanees ) and much flare that many muslim tourist from the region flock to egypt to witness during ramadan . </s> the ancient spring festival of sham el nessim ( coptic language : shom en nisim ) ha been celebrated by egyptian for thousand of year , typically between the egyptian calendar of paremoude ( april ) and pashons ( may ) , following easter sunday . </s> <section_title_start> cuisine <section_title_end> </s> egyptian cuisine is notably conducive to vegetarian diet , a it relies heavily on legume and vegetable dish . although food in alexandria and the coast of egypt tends to use a great deal of fish and other seafood , for the most part egyptian cuisine is based on food that grow out of the ground . meat ha been very expensive for most egyptian throughout history , so a great number of vegetarian dish have been developed . </s> some consider kushari ( a mixture of rice , lentil , and macaroni ) to be the national dish . fried onion can be also added to kushari . in addition , ful medames ( mashed fava bean ) is one of the most popular dish . fava bean is also used in making falafel ( also known a `` ta miya `` ) , which may have originated in egypt and spread to other part of the middle east . garlic fried with coriander is added to mulukhiyya , a popular green soup made from finely chopped jute leaf , sometimes with chicken or rabbit . </s> <section_title_start> sport <section_title_end> </s> association football is the most popular national sport of egypt . the cairo derby is one of the fiercest derby in africa , and the bbc picked it a one of the 7 toughest derby in the world . al ahly sc is the most successful club of the 20th century in the african continent according to caf , closely followed by their rival zamalek sc . they 're known a the `` caf club of the 20th century `` . with twenty title , al ahly is currently the world 's most successful club in term of international trophy , surpassing italy 's a.c. milan and argentina 's boca junior , both having eighteen . </s> the egypt national football team , known a the pharaoh , won the african cup of nation seven time , including three time in a row in 2006 , 2008 , and 2010 . considered the most successful african national team and one which ha reached the top 10 of the fifa world ranking , egypt ha qualified for the fifa world cup three time . two goal from star player mohamed salah in their last qualifying game took egypt through to the 2018 fifa world cup . the egyptian youth national team young pharaoh won the bronze medal of the 2001 fifa world youth championship in argentina . egypt wa 4th place in the football tournament in the 1928 summer olympics and the 1964 summer olympics olympics . </s> squash ( sport ) and tennis are other popular sport in egypt . the egyptian squash team ha been competitive in international championship since the 1930s . amr shabana and ramy ashour are egypt 's best player and both were ranked the world 's number one squash player . egypt ha won the squash world championship four time , with the last title being in 2017 men 's world team squash championship . </s> in 1999 , egypt 1999 world men 's handball championship the ihf world men 's handball championship , and will host it again in 2021 world men 's handball championship . in 2001 , the egypt men 's national handball team achieved it best result in the tournament by reaching fourth place . egypt ha won in the african men 's handball championship five time , being the best team in africa . in addition to that , it also championed the egypt at the 2013 mediterranean game in handball at the 2013 mediterranean game , the beach handball world championship in 2004 beach handball world championship and the egypt at the 2010 summer youth olympics in handball at the 2010 summer youth olympics boy ' tournament . </s> among all african nation , the egypt national basketball team hold the record for best performance at the fiba basketball world cup and at the basketball at the summer olympics . further , the team ha won a record number of 16 medal at the fiba africa championship . </s> egypt at the olympics in the summer olympic game since 1912 and ha hosted : category : international sport competition hosted by egypt including 1951 mediterranean game mediterranean game in 1951 , the 1991 all-africa game , the 2009 fifa u-20 world cup and the 1953 pan arab game , 1965 pan arab game and 2007 pan arab game edition of the pan arab game . </s> <section_title_start> telecommunication <section_title_end> </s> the wired and wireless telecommunication industry in egypt started in 1854 with the launch of the country 's first telegram line connecting cairo and alexandria . the first telephone line between the two city wa installed in 1881 . in september 1999 a national project for a technological renaissance wa announced reflecting the commitment of the egyptian government to developing the country 's it-sector . </s> <section_title_start> post <section_title_end> </s> egypt post is the company responsible for postal service in egypt . established in 1865 , it is one of the oldest governmental institution in the country . egypt is one of 21 country that contributed to the establishment of the universal postal union , initially named the general postal union , a signatory of the treaty of bern . </s> <section_title_start> social medium <section_title_end> </s> in september 2018 , egypt ratified the law granting authority the right to monitor social medium user in the country a part of tightening internet control . </s> <section_title_start> education <section_title_end> </s> the illiteracy rate ha decreased since 1996 from 39.4 to 25.9 percent in 2013 . the adult literacy rate wa estimated at 73.9 % . the illiteracy rate is highest among those over 60 year of age being estimated at around 64.9 % , while illiteracy among youth between 15 and 24 year of age wa listed at 8.6 percent . </s> a european-style education system wa first introduced in egypt by the ottoman in the early 19th century to nurture a class of loyal bureaucrat and army officer . under british occupation investment in education wa curbed drastically , and secular public school , which had previously been free , began to charge fee . </s> in the 1950s , president nasser phased in free education for all egyptian . the egyptian curriculum influenced other arab education system , which often employed egyptian-trained teacher . demand soon outstripped the level of available state resource , causing the quality of public education to deteriorate . today this trend ha culminated in poor teacherstudent ratio ( often around one to fifty ) and persistent gender inequality . </s> basic education , which includes six year of primary and three year of preparatory school , is a right for egyptian child from the age of six . after grade 9 , student are tracked into one of two strand of secondary education : general or technical school . general secondary education prepares student for further education , and graduate of this track normally join higher education institute based on the result of the thanaweya amma , the leaving exam . </s> technical secondary education ha two strand , one lasting three year and a more advanced education lasting five . graduate of these school may have access to higher education based on their result on the final exam , but this is generally uncommon . </s> cairo university is ranked a 401500 according to the academic ranking of world university ( shanghai ranking ) and 551600 according to q world university ranking . american university in cairo is ranked a 360 according to q world university ranking and al-azhar university , alexandria university and ain sham university fall in the 701+ range . </s> egypt is currently opening new research institute for the aim of modernising research in the nation , the most recent example of which is zewail city of science and technology . </s> <section_title_start> health <section_title_end> </s> egyptian life expectancy at birth wa 73.20 year in 2011 , or 71.30 year for male and 75.20 year for female . egypt spends 3.7 percent of it gross domestic product on health including treatment cost 22 percent incurred by citizen
